[\[22a.3\]]de'i mtshan gyur te/_dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma zhig gis dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs pa las de'i mtshan gyur te/_dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 
[\[22a.4\]]'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma 
[\[22a.5\]]rdzogs par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[22a.6\]]pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes pas gzhis mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mi'i dge slong la mir 'du shes pas gzhi ma 
[\[22a.7\]]mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]pas pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_dang 
[\[22b.2\]]po mtha' dang mtshams med pa/_/lhag ma dang ni gcig la gcig_/bris pa dang ni bag tsam nyid/_/rgya cher bya ba nyid yin no/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa las byung ba'i chos bsten to zhes khas len pa de la/_dge slong zhig gis gzhi 
[\[22b.3\]]ma mchis par rku ba'am/_gsod pa dang /_bla mar gyur pa'i chos smras pas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong bdag nyid ngas yo byad chen po brkus so zhes khas len pa de la dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par gsod 
[\[22b.4\]]pa'am/_bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra ba'am/_mi tshangs par spyod pas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi srog dang phral lo zhes khas len pa de la/_dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par bla mar gyur pa'i 
[\[22b.5\]]chos smra ba'am/_mi tshangs par spyod pa'am/_rku bas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi'i chos bla mar gyur pa smras so zhes khas len pa de la dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par mi tshangs par 
[\[22b.6\]]spyod pa'am/_rku ba'am/_srog gcod pas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 'dun lhag mar 
[\[22b.7\]]'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par mtshams med pas skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_gal te ma dang /_pha dang /_dgra bcom pa gsod pas skur pa btab na/_dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]'on te gzhi med par dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang /_ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pas skur pa btab na nyes byas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nye ba 'khor gang gis pha dang /_ma dang /_dgra bcom pa gsod pas skur pa btab pa des ni pham pa'i chos kyis 
[\[23a.2\]]skur pa btab pa yin no/_/gang gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang /_ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pas skur pa btab pa des ni nyes pa sbom por skur pa btab pa yin te/_nyes pa sbom pos ni dge slong ma yin par mi 'gyur gyi/_de ni bshags par 'os pa yin no/_/btsun 
[\[23a.3\]]pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na/_dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur na/_gal te gzhi ma mchis par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gzhi ma mchis par 
[\[23a.4\]]so sor bshags par bgyi ba dang /_nyes byas kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du gzhi ma mchis par nyes pa sbom pos skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge slong 
[\[23a.5\]]la gzhi med par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[23a.6\]]nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slob mas dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong la pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_dge 'dun lhag mar 
[\[23a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slob mas dge slong ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge tshul gyis dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur 
[\[23b.2\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge tshul mas dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bdag nyid kyis bris 
[\[23b.3\]]nas 'di skad ces yi ge 'di las ni 'di skad du khyod la mi tshangs par spyod pa'i pham pa byung ngo zhes zer ro zhes mchi na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab kyang dge 'dun 
[\[23b.4\]]lhag mar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_yod de sngar ltung ba byung ba dang /_rku thabs su gnas pa dang /_dang po mi mthun pa can dang /_ma ning dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba la ni nyes byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_
[\[23b.5\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang khros shing zhe sdang bar gyur nas/_ci nas kyang 'di tshangs par spyod pa dang dbral lo snyam nas/_dge slong dag la ltung ba med pa la gzhan gyi cha dang mthun pa ma yin par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa btab 
[\[23b.6\]]pa las/_de dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung /_ma dris kyang rung /_rtsod pa de yang gzhan gyi cha dang mthun pa ma yin la/_rtsod pa de yang gzhan gyi cha dang mthun pa ma yin pas/_bag tsam las bsams pa tsam gyis chos 'ga' zhig blangs par gyur la/_dge slong yang zhe sdang 
[\[23b.7\]]la gnas pas zhe sdang gis smras so zhe na/_dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste/_gzhung lhag ma ni gzhi med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bag tsam la rgya cher brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_bshes pa dang ni gsol ba dang /_/glen pa 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dang ni dran pa gnyis/_/bzhi pa 'dug dang ma bskos dang /_/'dun pas gcig dang nam mkha' la/_/'dug pa rgyas pa nyid du bya/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang /_dge 
[\[24a.2\]]'dun mthun pa de dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par gyur pa'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug na/_dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge slong mthun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig_/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag 
[\[24a.3\]]par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun dang mthun par gyis shig_/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed/_kun tu dga'/_mi rtsod mchog gcig_/'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed pa bde ba dang reg 
[\[24a.4\]]par gnas par 'gyur gyis tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu thong shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na gal te gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtang bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum 
[\[24a.5\]]du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/_yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo/_/yang dag par bstan pa na/_gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge 
[\[24a.6\]]slong gis bshes pa'i tshig gis ma bsgo bar gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bgyid na/_bsgo ba zhes bgyi'am 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_ma bsgo ba zhes bya'o/_/bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi 'chags te/_dge 'dun la 
[\[24a.7\]]yang des 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo nas gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi'am/_'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bsgo ba zhes bya'o/_/bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/_/nye ba 'khor 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]'chags te/_dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bskrad pa'i las ma bgyis par bshes pa'i bsgo bar bgyid na bsgo ba zhes bgyi'am/_'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bsgo ba zhes mi bya'o/_/bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/_nye ba 
[\[24b.2\]]'khor mi 'chags te/_dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bskrad pa'i las bgyis te/_bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo bar bgyid na bsgo ba zhes bgyi'am/_'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bsgo ba zhes bya'o/_/bsgo ba 'chags lags 
[\[24b.3\]]sam/_nye ba 'khor 'chags te/_dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bskrad pa'i las ma bgyis par dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro'o zhes mchi zhing zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[24b.4\]]byas so/_/bsgo bar bgyi 'am/_'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bsgo bar mi bya'o/_/bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi 'chags te/_dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bskrad pa'i las bgyis nas/_dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o zhes 
[\[24b.5\]]mtsho zhing zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsgo bar bgyi'am/_'on te bsgo bar mi bgyid lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bsgo bar bya'o/_/bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/_nye ba 
[\[24b.6\]]'khor 'chags te/_dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig ma glengs dran par ma bgyis par bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsgo bar bgyi'am/_'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/_
[\[24b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_bsgo bar mi bya'o/_/bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi 'chags so/_/btsun pa re zhig glengs shing dran par bgyis pa las bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsgo bar bgyi'am/_'on te 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bsgo bar bya'o/_/bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/_nye ba 'khor 'chags so/_/mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag gis mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ma 
[\[25a.2\]]yin no/_/mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa dag gis mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ma yin no/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong las bgyid pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis pas mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa dag la bsgo na bsgo 
[\[25a.3\]]ba zhes bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ma yin no/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong las bgyid pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ma yin no/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong las bgyid pas mtshams 
[\[25a.4\]]mnan cing /_mtshams non par bgyis te/_mtshams su mchis nas bsgo na bsgo zhes bgyi'am/_ma bsgo zhes bgyi lags/_nye ba 'khor bsgo ba zhes bya'o/_/bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/_nye ba 'khor 'chags so/_/btsun pa dge slong las bgyid par ma bskos pa 
[\[25a.5\]]zhig gis mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa'i gang zag bzhi bskrad na/_bskrad pa zhes bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ma yin no/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong las bgyid par bskos pas mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa'i gang zag bzhi zhig bskrad na/_bskrad pa zhes bgyi lags sam/_
[\[25a.6\]]gal te des re re dang /_gnyis gnyis dang /_gsum gsum nas bskrad kyi bzhir ma yin na bskrad pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong las bgyid pas mtshams kyi nang phyogs bzhi na mtshungs par gnas pa'i dge slong bzhi zhig la bsgo na bsgo bar yang chud la ltung ba gang du 
[\[25a.7\]]yang mi 'gyur zhing /_des dge 'dun mi mthun par yang mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor gal te phan tshun 'dun pa byin pas re re dang /_gnyis gnyis dang /_gsum gsum la bsgo'i bzhi bzhi la ma yin na yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshogs kyis tshogs kyi las 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]dag byar mi rung bas so/_/las bgyid pa phyogs gcig na mchis pas gnas bzhi'i las thams cad bgyir rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong las byed pas gnas bzhi car gyi mtshams kyi mdo/_khri'am khri'u'am/_re lde'am/_re ljong [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]mnan te 
[\[25b.2\]]'dug par gyur la/_gnas de dag na yang las 'di lta bu 'di lta ste/_bzhi'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang /_lnga'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang /_bcu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang /_nyi shu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las nye bar gnas par gyur na rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[25b.3\]]zhe na/_de dag kha cig ni las byed pa yin la/_kha cig gi ni tshogs skyong ba yin no/_/sa la mchis pas nam mkha' la mchis pa rnams la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ma yin no/_/btsun pa re zhig las bgyid pa nam mkha' la mchis la/_sa la mchis 
[\[25b.4\]]pa rnams la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ma yin no/_/ji ltar dge slong la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa dang /_dge slong ma la yang dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma rnams 
[\[25b.5\]]la ni nyes byas so/_/sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la yang nyes byas kho na ste/_snga ma bzhin no/_/de ltar na gzhung 'di ni dge 'dun lhag ma gsum la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya ba yin no/_nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa kha che ba las/_dge 'dun lhag ma rdzogs so//_//
[\[25b.6\]]sdom la/_mtha' dang lam dang rgyal rigs dang /_/phung po de bzhin lhag ma dang /_/kha dang sha ka ra dang hwags/_/bu ram mar sar ma nges gnyis/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang bud 
[\[25b.7\]]med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang /_dben pa skyabs yod pa na/_'dod pa byar rung bar stan la 'dug par byed cing /_de la gal te dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas chos gsum po pham par 'gyur ba'am/_dge 'dun lhag ma'am/_ltung byed 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]las gang yang rung bas smras par gyur la/_dge slong gis 'dug pas khas blangs na chos gsum po pham par 'gyur ba'am/_dge 'dun lhag ma'am/_ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bas byed du gzhug cing /_dge slong de la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang 
[\[26a.2\]]ldan pas chos gang dang gang gis smras par gyur pa'i chos de dang des dge slong de byed du bcug ste/_de ni ma nges pa'i chos so/_/yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu gcig dang /_dben pa skyabs yod pa na/_'dod pa byar mi rung bar stan la 'dug par byed cing /_de 
[\[26a.3\]]la gal te dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas chos gnyis po dge 'dun lhag ma'am/_ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bas smras par gyur la/_dge slong gis 'dug par khas blangs na/_chos gnyis po dge 'dun lhag ma'am/_ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bar 
[\[26a.4\]]byed du gzhug cing dge slong la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas chos gang dang gang gis smras par gyur pa'i chos de dang des dge slong de byed du bcug ste/_de yang ma nges pa'i chos so zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang 
[\[26a.5\]]ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/_'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong mtha' dang po 'byin par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/_dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol 
[\[26a.6\]]du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/_gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i ngo bo nyid du tshol du gzhug 
[\[26a.7\]]go/_/'on te de 'di skad ces 'di mtha' dang po ni ma byung gi 'on kyang bdag gis mtha' gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa byung ba mthong ngo zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/_/dang po ji ltar mtha' gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa rnams la yang 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis kha'i lam du nyams par bgyis pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/_dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig 
[\[26b.2\]]gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/_gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i 
[\[26b.3\]]tshig gis byed du bcug cing /_de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/_/'on te de 'di skad ces 'dis kha'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas te/_'on kyang bshang ba'i lam dang /_gci ba'i lam du nyams par byas so zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/_/kha'i lam du ji lta bar bshang 
[\[26b.4\]]ba'i lam dang /_gci ba'i lam du de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/_btsun pa dag dge slong zhig rgyal rigs ma zhig dang lhan cig tu nyams par bgyid pa bdag gis 
[\[26b.5\]]mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid du tshol du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te de 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/_
[\[26b.6\]]gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/_/gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i ngo bo nyid du tshol du gzhug go/_/'on te de 'di skad ces 'dis rgyal rigs dang lhan cig tu nyams par ni ma byas na/_'on kyang bram ze mo dang lhan cig tu 
[\[26b.7\]]nyams par gyur to zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/_/rgyal rigs mo dang ji lta bar bram ze mo'i rigs dang /_rje'u rigs mo dang /_dmangs rigs mo dang /_dkar mo dang /_sngon mo dang /_sngo bsangs mo dang /_ring mo dang /_thung ngu ma dang /_sdug gu ma dang /_
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]skyem mo dang /_tshon mo dang /_lus ran pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_'gyel ba dang /_yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/_'di skad 
[\[27a.2\]]ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig mtha' dang po'i phung po 'byin par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la che zhe zla 
[\[27a.3\]]'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/_gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/_gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig tu byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/_/'on te de 'di skad ces 'di mtha' dang po'i 
[\[27a.4\]]phung po ni ma byung gi 'on kyang ltung ba'i phung po gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa byung ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par brjod do/_/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/_'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag 
[\[27a.5\]]gis dge slong zhig dge 'dun lhag ma dang po 'byin par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal 
[\[27a.6\]]te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/_gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/_gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/_/'on te de 'di skad ces dge 'dun lhag ma dang po ni ma byung gi 'on kyang dge 'dun lhag ma 
[\[27a.7\]]gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa nas/_bcu gsum pa'i bar byung ngo zhes zer na/_dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/_/dang po la ji lta bar dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa nas bcu gsum pa'i bar la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis khar nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[27b.2\]]tshol du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/_gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/_gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i rang bzhin tshol du 
[\[27b.3\]]gzhug go/_/'on te 'di skad ces khar ni nyams par ma byas kyi 'on kyang 'dis so'i phyi rol mchu'i nang du khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/_/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge 
[\[27b.4\]]slong zhig gis gci ba'i lam du nyams par bgyi ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri 
[\[27b.5\]]bar bya'o/_/gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/_gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i/_tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/_/'on te de 'di skad ces gci ba'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas 
[\[27b.6\]]kyi 'on kyang 'dis brla phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na de dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/_/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis bshang ba'i lam du nyams par bgyis pa 
[\[27b.7\]]mthong ngo zhes mchi na/_dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/_gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/_/'on te 'di skad ces bshang ba'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas kyi 'on kyang 'dis rkub tsos kyi phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo 
[\[28a.2\]]zhes zer na/_dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/_/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/_'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma yin par skyo ma 'thung ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig 
[\[28a.3\]]dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya'o/_/gal te mthun na dge bsnyen 
[\[28a.4\]]ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/_/'on te de 'di skad ces dus ma yin par skyo ma ni ma 'thungs kyi 'on kyang 'dis sha kha ra'i chu 'thungs so zhes zer na/_dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/_/btsun pa dge 
[\[28a.5\]]bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/_'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig bu ram chang 'thung ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/
[\[28a.6\]]de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te 'di skad ces dus yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/_gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i ngo bo 
[\[28a.7\]]nyid tshol du gzhug go/_/'on te 'di skad ces dus ma yin par bu ram gyi chang ma 'thungs mod kyi/_'on kyang 'dis hwags kyi chu 'thungs so zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go//_//'dul ba gzhung bla ma/_bam po bzhi pa/_btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/_'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus ma yin par sha za ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal 
[\[28b.2\]]tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/_gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/_/'on te 
[\[28b.3\]]de 'di skad ces dus ma yin par sha ni ma zos kyi/_'on kyang 'dis bu ram zhig zos so zhes zer na/_dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/_/btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/_'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong 
[\[28b.4\]]zhig dus ma lags par kha zas za ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na/_dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/_byed du mi gzhug go/_/de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/_mi gzhug ste/_re zhig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal 
[\[28b.5\]]te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/_gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing /_de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/_/'on te 'di skad ces dus ma yin pa'i zas ni ma zos kyi/_'on kyang 'dis mar 
[\[28b.6\]]zos so zhes zer na/_dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/_/de lta bu'i dngos po ma nges pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa bden pa mthong ba smra ba gang dag yin pa de dag la dge slong rmed du gzhug go/_/nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa kha che ba las ma nges pa dang ldan pa 
[\[28b.7\]]rdzogs so//_//sdom la/_de nyid stor dang tshig pa dang /_/sems 'khrugs byin gyis ma brlabs dang /_/rung ba dang ni dus las 'das/_/mtshan dang gzhi dang bting ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos zin pas chos gos sra brkyang phyung nas zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa rung bar ma byas pa bcang bar bya'o/_/de las 'das par bcangs na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa chos gos de nyid dgung 
[\[29a.2\]]bcu 'das pa yang lags la de nyid dgung gcig bral ba yang lags pa lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong gis zhag bcu 'das pa'i chos gos byin gyis brlabs nas/_chos gos med par mtshams kyi phyi rol du skya rengs 'char bar byed na/_chos gos 
[\[29a.3\]]'di ni zhag bcu 'das pa yang yin la/_zhag gcig bral ba yang yin no/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gi spang ba'i chos gos nyams par gyur na/_ltung ba bshags par bgyi'am/_nye ba 'khor 'ba' zhig pa'i bshags par bya'o/_/gal te ltung ba bshags lags 
[\[29a.4\]]nas slar rnyed na spang bar bgyi'am/_nye ba 'khor ma yin no/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gi spang ba'i chos gos mes tshig gam zos par gyur na dum bu'am/_de dag spang bar bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ma yin no/_/'ba' zhig pa'i ltung ba bshags par bya'o/_/'on 
[\[29a.5\]]te kun nas khru gang ba zhig yin na spang bar bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas dgung lnga lon pa dang /_sems 'khrugs par gyur na gang nas bzung ste/_de'i dgung bcu bgrang bar bgyi lags/_gang nas bzung ste rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so/_/
[\[29a.6\]]btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos brgyad dam dgu zhig byin gyis ma brlabs/_rung bar ma bgyis par nam 'tsho'i bar du bcangs na nongs par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de 'di ltar dge slong gis nyi ma re re zhing chos gos las phyung ste/_gzhan byin gyis rlob na'o/_/
[\[29a.7\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bcu las 'das pa'i chos gos spang ba'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos lhag pa dgung bcu las 'das par bcangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]ltar gos kyi spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang /_rgyu rung bar gyur la/_spun mi rung bar gyur pa dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur te/_mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /_ra bal dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_'dres pa dang /_thags su ma btags pa 
[\[29b.2\]]ste/_de lta bu'i chos gos can ni zhag bcu las lhag par bcangs na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zhag bcu'i bar du chos gos lhag pa bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa dge slong gis nam 'tsho'i bar du chos 
[\[29b.3\]]gos lhag mar bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_zhag bcu tshun chad du dus las 'das par gyur na'o/_/btsun pa chos gos de nyid bcangs na ltung bar yang mi 'gyur la/_chos gos de nyid bcangs na ltung bar yang 'gyur ba lta mchis 
[\[29b.4\]]lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong de chos gos rin chen po 'chang na ltung ba med la/_mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red de 'chang na ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas dgung bcu lags pa dang /_de'i mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red 
[\[29b.5\]]nas dgung bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas chos gos shig rnyed nas dgung bcu lags pa dang /_mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas dgung bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun 
[\[29b.6\]]pa re zhig dge slong gis dgung bcu la dgung bcur 'du shes te skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dgung bcu la dgung bcu ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/dgung bcu ma lags pa la dgung 
[\[29b.7\]]bcur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dgung bcu ma lags pa la dgung bcu ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas su chos gos shig rnyed la/_chos gos de 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]yang spang bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong gi chos gos spang ba yin la/_dge slong des kyang chos gos de ma spangs/_bral bar ma byas/_nyes pa ma bshags par gyur pa'i skabs su dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting bar 
[\[30a.2\]]gyur la/_sra brkyang bting nas dge slong des chos gos gzhan zhig rnyed na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas dgung bcu las lhag par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas dgung bcu 
[\[30a.3\]]las lhag par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul mas dgung bcu las 'das par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa ni nyes 
[\[30a.4\]]byas te/_snga ma bzhin no//_//sdom la/_dge 'dun gyi dang sa dang mtshams/_/mnan pa dang ni ma gnang dang /_/mtshams ma bcad dang ma g.yogs dang /_/bzhi tshan dang ni de bzhin mtshan/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa 
[\[30a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos zin pas sra brkyang phyung na gal te nub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba dang /_mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang 
[\[30a.6\]]lags pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun gyi chos gos byin gyis brlab par gnang lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi gnang ngo /_/btsun pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig mchis na gnang lags sam/_nye ba 'khor gnang ngo /_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi chos gos byin gyis brlabs 
[\[30a.7\]]te/_chos gos ma mchis par mtshams kyi slad rol du bral bar bgyid na/_chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi'am/_chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/_bka' stsal ba/_chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/chos gos de spang bar bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ma 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]yin no/_/'ba' zhig pa'i ltung byed bshags par bya'o/_btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos sa la bzhag ste/_nam mkha' la skya rengs 'char bar bgyid dam/_chos gos nam mkha' la bzhag ste/_sa la skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi'am/_chos 
[\[30b.2\]]gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos mtshams kyi nang du bzhag ste/_mtshams kyi slad rol du skya rengs 'char bar bgyid dam/_chos gos mtshams kyi slad rol du bzhag ste/_
[\[30b.3\]]mtshams kyi nang du skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/_chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mtshams mnan tam/_mtshams bzung ngam/_mtshams 
[\[30b.4\]]su 'greng ngam mchis te/_mtshams kyi bar du chos gos bzhag nas skya rengs 'char bar bgyi na chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi'am/_chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/_bka' stsal ba/_chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong yang mtshams kyi nang 
[\[30b.5\]]na mchis la/_chos gos kyang mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa las/_chos gos de dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_mtshams bcad par byas pa chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa ma byin na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig mtshams ma bcad pa'i 
[\[30b.6\]]gnas su gang tshun chad dge slong chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi/_nye ba 'khor ji tsam gtsug lag khang gi nyen kor chab kung sa'am/_sgo khyams sam/_khang phran nam/_kun dga' ra ba'am/_dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'am/_ra ba'am/_'greng rib bam/_'obs yod pa'o/_/
[\[30b.7\]]btsun pa dge slong yang gnas gcig la steng g.yogs kyang gcig pa zhig na mchis la/_de nyid na chos gos kyang mchis na chos gos de dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar gnas te mu stegs can sna tshogs dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu rnams sam/_spun nor bgos pa rnams kyi yin na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad rol la/_mtshams kyi slad rol du 'du shes pa las skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[31a.2\]]ro/_/mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi slad rol du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mtshams kyi slad rol na mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/
[\[31a.3\]]btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mtshams kyi nang du chos gos bzhag ste/_mtshams kyi slad rol du skya rengs 'char bar bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma zhig gis mtshams kyi slad rol du skya 
[\[31a.4\]]rengs 'char bar bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te/_dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge slong gis gang gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyi/_nye ba 'khor dge slong gis ni dge slong gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab 
[\[31a.5\]]par bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong mas gang gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyi/_nye ba 'khor dge slong mas ni dge slong ma'i mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bya ste/_dbyung ba dang rung bar bya ba yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal pa chos gos ma 
[\[31a.6\]]mchis par mtshams kyi slad rol du skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te/_de bzhin du dge slong ma la ni chos gos lngas spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes pa med do/_/
[\[31a.7\]]sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga ma bzhin no//_//sdom la/_sems 'khrugs pa dang dus las 'das/_/de bzhin rung ba nyid dang ni/_/mi rung ba dang gding ba dang /_/tshad dang bzhi tshan dag dang mtshan/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos zin pas/_chos gos sra brkyang phyung nas dus ma yin pa'i gos rnyed la/_'dod na dge slong des chos gos de blang bar bya'o/_/blangs nas gal te langs na myur ba kho nar chos gos su byas te bcang 
[\[31b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/gal te mi langs la kha ma langs pa kha skong ba'i chos gos la re ba yod na yang dge slong des chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o/_/de las 'das par 'jog na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gos 
[\[31b.3\]]shig rnyed ma thag tu sems 'khrugs par gyur na/_gang nas bzung ste de'i zla ba bgrang bar bgyi/_gang nas bzung ste rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis zla ba gcig gi bar du chos gos gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_
[\[31b.4\]]btsun pa dge slong gis nam 'tsho'i bar du chos gos bzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_zla ba gcig tshun chad du dus byas na'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa 
[\[31b.5\]]gang lags pa/_chos gos de ji lta bu zhig lags/_bdun po dag las brtags pa gang yang rung ba ngas rjes su gnang zhing ma bkag pa gang yin pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_
[\[31b.6\]]btsun pa dge slong dgung zla gcig las lhag par bzhag kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_de 'di ltar chos gos kyi spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang /_spun mi rung bar gyur la/_rgyu rung bar gyur pa dang /_gnyi ga 
[\[31b.7\]]mi rung bar gyur pa ste/_mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_thags su ma btags pa ste/_de lta bu'i chos gos ni zla ba gcig las lhag par bzhag kyang nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa dge slong gis dgung zla drug tu chos gos bzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_chos gos de 
[\[32a.2\]]rnyed nas zhag sum bcu lon pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting bar gyur na'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum du ma tshang na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag go zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa dge slong chos gos gsum par gyur pa des chos 
[\[32a.3\]]gos mi langs pa zhig rnyed na des kyang dgung zla gcig gi bar du gzhag par bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nye ba 'khor chos gos gsum tshang na chos gos gzhan rnyed pa gang yin pa ni langs kyang rung /_mi langs kyang rung ste thams cad ni zhag bcu pa 
[\[32a.4\]]yin no/_/chos gos gsum du ma tshang ba las gal te chos gos su langs pa zhig rnyed na de yang zhag bcu pa yin no/_/'on te ma langs pa zhig rnyed na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o/_/de las 'das par bzhag na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 
[\[32a.5\]]dgung zla gcig la dgung zla gcig tu 'du shes pas skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dgung zla gcig la dgung zla gcig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung 
[\[32a.6\]]zla gcig tu 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas dgung zla gcig lags pa las mtshan gyur te/_
[\[32a.7\]]dge slong mar red nas dgung zla gcig las 'da' bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas chos gos rnyed nas dgung zla gcig lags pa las mtshan gyur te/_dge slong du red nas zla ba gcig las 'da' bar bgyid na cir 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas chos gos dgung zla gcig pas ring du bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas chos gos dgung zla gcig pas ring du 
[\[32b.2\]]bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul mas chos gos dgung zla gcig gi bar du bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga ma bzhin 
[\[32b.3\]]no//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon ma dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on ma glen ma dang /_/khyim pa mo la sogs pa ste/_/bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[32b.4\]]dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug gam/_'tshed du 'jug gam/_'chag tu 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge 
[\[32b.5\]]slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la pho nya las gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud de dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[32b.6\]]nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa smyon ma la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa/_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_'on ma dang /_
[\[32b.7\]]glen ma la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim pa mo nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du dge slong ma tha dad du gnas pa dang /_dge slong ma khas 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]len pa dang /_ma ning mo dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_ma 'gums pa dang /_pha 'gums pa dang /_dgra bcom pa 'gums pa dang /_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can du zhugs pa dang /_rku thabs su gnas pa dang /_tha dad du gnas pa dang /_dang po 
[\[33a.2\]]mi mthun pa can dang /_/sngar ltung ba byung ba nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 
[\[33a.3\]]'byin pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba'i dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_bsgrub par bya dang bkrus pa dang /_/dge 'dun gyi dang mtshan gnyis dang /_/mi rung ba dang spangs pa 
[\[33a.4\]]dang /_/gzhan gyi dang ni gyon pa dang /_/bzhi tshan dag tu byas pa dang /_/dge slong ma ni tha ma yin/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa bsgrub par bgyi ba zhig 'khrur stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge slong ma nye 
[\[33a.5\]]du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa bkrus pa zhig 'khrur stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la dge 'dun gyi chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_gal te gang zag gis yongs su spyad pas 
[\[33a.6\]]yongs su spyad de/_dri ma can du gyur pa zhig na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'on te gnas mal gyi dngos po zhig 'khrur bcug na ni ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 
[\[33a.7\]]'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong ma la chos gos rnying pa 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'khrur stsal ba las/_dge slong ma de'i mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas bkrus na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas te/_de bzhin du dge slong ma la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsal kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du 
[\[33b.2\]]mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur pa la/_rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang /_rgyu rung bar gyur la/_spun mi rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/_mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi 
[\[33b.3\]]bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_ma btags pa'o/_/de lta bu'i chos gos 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos rnying pa spang ba zhig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_gal 
[\[33b.4\]]te ma spangs pa zhig 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'on te spangs pa zhig 'khrur 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la gzhan gyi chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun 
[\[33b.5\]]pa re zhig dge slong gis gos rung ba dang /_grong du 'jug pa spang ba 'byung ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong khyim du zhugs pa'i chos gos bshang ba'am/_gci ba'am/_'dam rdzab bam/_ljan ljin nam/_mi gtsang ba gzhan gyis sbags par 
[\[33b.6\]]gyur na'o/_/des de dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'khrur stsol ba'i sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[33b.7\]]bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas 
[\[34a.2\]]sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs te lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 
[\[34a.3\]]dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la/_bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 
[\[34a.4\]]'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la/_bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[34a.5\]]btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/_nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/_nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/
[\[34a.6\]]nye du la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du lags pa la nye du lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur 
[\[34a.7\]]'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_khyim pa mo dang /_gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu rnams la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]so/_/de bzhin du 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas dge slong dang /_dge tshul dang /_gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu dang /_'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la 
[\[34b.2\]]'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/khyim pa dang /_khyim pa mo la 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la ni nyes byas so/_/sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te/_snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[34b.3\]]de bzhin du 'tshed pa dang /_'chag pa la yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon ma dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on ma glen ma dang /_/gnyid log ra ro rab myos dang /_/
[\[34b.4\]]snyoms 'jug de bzhin 'gro ba dang /_khas len 'dod pa la sogs pa/_/bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las chos gos len na 
[\[34b.5\]]brjes pa ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa pho nya las gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/de bzhin du yi 
[\[34b.6\]]ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pas nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong ma de la chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa smyon ma la gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[34b.7\]]byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen ma dang /_'on ma dang /_gnyid log pa dang /_phyag las kham pa dang /_rab tu myos pa dang /_snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_'gro ba 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]gzhan du gnas pa dang /_tha dad du gnas pa dang /_khas len pa dang /_ma ning mo dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas/_rgyas par dang po mi mthun pa can gyi bar la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[35a.2\]]nyes byas kho na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang /_dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[35a.3\]]byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan ni/_/gnyis dang de bzhin mtshan dang ni/_/dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/_/tshogs su yang dag bshad pa yin/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong 
[\[35a.4\]]ma nye du ma lags pa las chos gos blangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_spun mi rung bar gyur la/_rgyu rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/_mi rung ba ni 
[\[35a.5\]]rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_ma btags pa'o/_/de lta bu'i chos gos shig blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung 
[\[35a.6\]]ba med do/_/dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge slong ma nye du la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig 
[\[35a.7\]]dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas chos gos blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]nyes byas so/_/nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par 
[\[35b.2\]]ma rdzogs pas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la chos gos blangs nas bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par blangs la 
[\[35b.3\]]bsnyen par rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[35b.4\]]bsnyen par rdzogs nas bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pas bslangs la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa 
[\[35b.5\]]las chos gos len pa las mtshan gyur te/_dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa las chos gos len pa las dge slong ma de mtshan gyur te/_dge slong du red nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas 
[\[35b.6\]]so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong las chos gos len pa las dge slong de mtshan gyur te/_dge slong mar red pa las blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa'i dge slong las chos gos len pa las dge 
[\[35b.7\]]slong de'i mtshan gyur te/_dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa las chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las chos gos len na brjes pa ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul ma las len na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge slong mas dge slong dang /_dge tshul las 
[\[36a.2\]]len na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul ma las blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge tshul gyis dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul ma las chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/sngar 
[\[36a.3\]]ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga ma bzhin no//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa glen pa dang /_/gnyid log ra ro rab myos dang /_/snyoms zhugs 
[\[36a.4\]]'gro dang phyi rol pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste chos gos slong na dus ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed 
[\[36a.5\]]do/_/de la dus ni 'di yin te/_dge slong chos gos phrogs sam/_chos gos nyams sam/_chos gos tshig gam/_chos gos khyer ram/_chos gos rnyed na/_de la de ni dus yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis pho nya las khyim bdag gam/_khyim 
[\[36a.6\]]bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/de bzhin du yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[36a.7\]]byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang smyon ma las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/de bzhin du khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]du ma lags pa sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_'on pa dang glen pa dang /_gnyid kyis log pa dang /_phyag las khom pa dang /_rab tu myos pa dang /_snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[36b.2\]]nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu nye du ma lags pa la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur 
[\[36b.3\]]lags/_nyes byas kho na'o//_//sdom la/_mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan ni/_/gnyis dang de bzhin mtshan dang ni/_/za ma ma ning nyid de bzhin/_/ma ning mo dang dge slong ma/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa la chos 
[\[36b.4\]]gos blangs te thob kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_rgyu rung bar gyur la/_spun mi rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/_mi rung ba ni rnga mo'i bal dang /_ba 
[\[36b.5\]]lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_thags su ma btags pa de lta bu'i chos gos shig slong na slong ba de la nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na yang nyes byas kho na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 
[\[36b.6\]]'brang nye du ma lags pa la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/nye du la nye du ma lags par 'du 
[\[36b.7\]]shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/nye du la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mi'i khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang la mir 'du shes 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]pas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas 
[\[37a.2\]]kho na'o/_/mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 
[\[37a.3\]]bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[37a.4\]]bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs la bsnyen par rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs la bsnyen par ma rdzogs 
[\[37a.5\]]par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa la gos slong ba las mtshan gyur te/_dge slong mar red nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 
[\[37a.6\]]re zhig dge slong ma khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa la chos gos slong ba las mtshan gyur te/_dge slong du red nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong nye du ma lags pa'i khyim bdag la chos 
[\[37a.7\]]gos slong ba las khyim bdag de'i mtshan gyur te bud med du red pa las blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa las chos gos slong ba la khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang de'i mtshan gyur te/_
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]skyes par red pa las blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dge slong ma la yang brjod do//_//'dul ba gzhung bla ma/_bam po lnga pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis za ma nyid du ma lags pa las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[37b.2\]]nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/de bzhin du ma ning dang /_ma ning mo nas/_dge slong dang /_dge tshul gyi bar la blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/btsun pa 
[\[37b.3\]]re zhig dge slong mas khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa las blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma la ji lta bar bslab pa byin pa la yang de dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[37b.4\]]dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te rgyas par brjod do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos phrogs sam/_chos 
[\[37b.5\]]gos nyams sam/_chos gos tshig gam/_chos gos red dam/_chos gos khyer na khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i gan du song la chos gos blang bar bya'o/_/gal te de la bram ze'am/_khyim bdag dad pa zhig gis dus kyis gos mang po stobs la 'dod na 
[\[37b.6\]]dge slong des de la gos stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'i mthar thug pa blang bar bya'o/_/de las lhag par len na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_snga ma slong ba'i spang ba'i ltung byed ji lta bar stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa la yang de dang 'dra'o/_/tha 
[\[37b.7\]]dad du bya ba ci yod ce na/_stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa ni gnyis te/_khyim pa'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa dang /_dge slong gi stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'o/_/dge slong gis khyim pa'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]bcas pa blangs te/_khyim pa'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pa las lhag par slong na/_lhag par slong ba de la nyes byas so/_/thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong gi stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa blangs te/_dge 
[\[38a.2\]]slong gis stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs thob pa las lhag par slong na lhag par slong ba de la nyes byas so/_/thob na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis khyim pa'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa blangs te/_khyim pa'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas 
[\[38a.3\]]pa thob pas gal te ma langs par gyur na yang ma slongs shig_/lhag par gyur na yang ma sbyin cig_/dge slong gis khyim pa'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa las lhag par blangs na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong gi stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas 
[\[38a.4\]]pa blangs te/_dge slong gi stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa thob pas gal te ma chog par gyur na yang bslang bar bya'o/_/lhag par gyur na yang sbyin no/_/dge slong gis stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa las lhag pa ma byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[38a.5\]]gzhung lhag ma ni bslab pa'i gzhi snga ma la ji ltar bslab pa'i gzhi 'di la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa glen pa dang /_/gnyid log ra 
[\[38a.6\]]ro rab myos dang /_/snyoms zhugs 'gro dang phyi rol pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas chos gos kyi rin dag 
[\[38a.7\]]spags nas/_bdag gi chos gos kyi rin 'di dag gis chos gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'ongs pa dang de la chos gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las/_de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs pas rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig rig ste bzang 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]po 'dod pa'i phyir khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pas bdag gi phyir chos gos kyi rin gang dag spags pa'i chos gos kyi rin de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis chos gos thag pa 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la bdag la 
[\[38b.2\]]chos gos rung ba dus su skon cig ces smras te/_chos gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong pho nya las khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa la rnam par rtog pa rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[38b.3\]]chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/de bzhin du yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa/_
[\[38b.4\]]smyon pa la rnam par rtog pa rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_'on pa dang /_glen pa dang /_gnyid kyis log pa dang /_
[\[38b.5\]]phyag las khom pa dang /_rab tu myos pa dang /_snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu rnams rnam par rtog pa reg nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos 
[\[38b.6\]]gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o//_//sdom la/_mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan gnyis/_/de bzhin du ni mtshan yang dang /_/za ma ma ning mo nyid dang /_/ma ning dang ni dge slong nyid/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang 
[\[38b.7\]]nye du ma lags pa la/_rnam par rtog pa rig nas/_chos gos bslangs nas thob kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_rgyu rung bar gyur la/_spun mi rung ba dang /_gnyi ga 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]mi rung bar gyur pa ste/_mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_ma btags pa'o/_/de lta bu'i chos gos kyi phyir rnam par rtog pa rig nas/_chos gos bslangs te thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[39a.2\]]byas so/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa la nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas rnam par rtog par rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed 
[\[39a.3\]]du 'gyur ro/_/nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/nye du la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/nye du la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas 
[\[39a.4\]]khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa la mir 'du shes pas rnam par rtog par rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mi la mi ma lags par 'du 
[\[39a.5\]]shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par rnam par 
[\[39a.6\]]rtog par rig nas bslangs la/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs par rnam par rtog par rig nas bslangs la/_bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par ma 
[\[39a.7\]]rdzogs par rnam par rtog par rig nas bslangs la/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar rnam par rtog par rig nas bslangs la/_bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]par rdzogs kar rnam par rtog par rig nas bslangs la/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs te rnam par rtog par rig nas bslangs la/_bsnyen par rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen 
[\[39b.2\]]par rdzogs te rnam par rtog par rig nas bslangs la/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa la rnam par rtog par rig nas dge slong las mtshan gyur te dge 
[\[39b.3\]]slong mar red nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa la rnam par rtog par rig nas slong ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang 
[\[39b.4\]]ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa la/_rnam par rtog par rig nas slong ba la khyim bdag de'i mtshan gyur te bud med du red nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[39b.5\]]btsun pa re zhig dge slong khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pa la rnam par rtog par rig nas slong ba las khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang de'i mtshan gyur te skyes par red nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 
[\[39b.6\]]dge slong ma la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong khyim bdag za ma la rnam par rtog par rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du ma ning dang /_ma ning mo la yang nyes 
[\[39b.7\]]byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i yo byad rnams kyi phyir rnam par rtog par rig nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong dge slong 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]gi slad dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma'i slad du rnam par rtog par rig nas chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/ji ltar 
[\[40a.2\]]dge slong gis rnam par rtog par rig nas bslangs pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa dang /_dge slong ma la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas 
[\[40a.3\]]te rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin so so bdag spags nas/_bdag 
[\[40a.4\]]cag gnyis kyis gos kyi rin so so ba 'di dag gis chos gos 'di dang 'di lta bu so so ba nyos la dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang bdag cag gnyis kyis so so nas de la chos gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las/_de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par 
[\[40a.5\]]rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig rig ste/_bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir khyim bdag dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de dag drung du song nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag gis bdag gi phyir chos gos kyi rin so sor gang dag spags pa'i chos gos kyi rin so so ba de dag gis tshe dang 
[\[40a.6\]]ldan pa dag chos gos 'di dang 'di lta bu so so ba nyos la gnyis ka 'dus te/_bdag la chos gos rung ba gcig dus su legs par bskon ces smras te/_chos gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags zhes bya ba ste/_gzhung lhag ma ni bslab 
[\[40a.7\]]pa'i gnas 'das ma thag pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du bslab pa'i gnas 'di la yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa glen pa dang /_/
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]gnyid log ra ro rab myos dang /_/snyoms zhugs 'gro dang phyi rol pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gi phyir rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po'am/_bram ze'am/_khyim 
[\[40b.2\]]bdag gam/_grong rdal gyi mi'am/_yul mi'am/_nor can nam/_ded dpon gyis pho nya'i lag tu chos gos kyi rin dag bskur bar gyur la/_de nas pho nya de chos gos kyi rin dag khyer nas dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_dge slong de la 'di skad ces 
[\[40b.3\]]yang 'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'di lta ste yang khyod la rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po'am/_bram ze'am/_khyim bdag gam/_grong rdal gyi mi'am/_yul mi'am/_nor can nam/_tshong dpon nam/_ded dpon che ge mos chos gos kyi rin 'di dag bskur 
[\[40b.4\]]gyis 'phags pa thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes zhes zer na/_dge slong des pho nya de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa pho nya dge slong dag ni chos gos kyi rin dag len du mi rung ste/_bdag cag chos gos rung ba dus su rnyed na ni len to zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te pho nya de la 'di skad 
[\[40b.5\]]ces 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal ta bgyid pa 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len pa gang lags pa 'ga' mchis sam zhes zer na/_dge slong chos gos 'dod pas pho nya 'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta byed pa ste/_'di ni dge slong rnams kyi zhal ta nyams su len pa'o zhes kun 
[\[40b.6\]]dga' ra ba'am/_dge bsnyen zhal ta byed pa bstan par bya'o/_/de nas pho nya des chos gos kyi rin de dag khyer nas zhal ta byed pa ga la ba der 'gro zhing phyin nas zhal ta byed pa la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa shes par gyis shig_/khyod kyi chos gos kyi rin 'di dag gis 
[\[40b.7\]]chos gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs pa dang /_de la chos gos rung ba dus su skon cig ces brjod nas/_de nas pho nya des zhal ta byed pa de la legs par shin tu yang dag par bsgo zhing yang dag par bstan nas/_dge slong 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]de ga la ba der 'gro zhing phyin nas/_dge slong de la 'di skad ces 'phags pas zhal ta bgyid pa gang lags pa de la bdag gis yang dag par bstan lags kyis de'i gan du bzhud cig dang /_des khyed la chos gos rung ba dus su bskon par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/_dge 
[\[41a.2\]]slong chos gos 'dod pas zhal ta byed pa'i gan du song la/_tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag chos gos 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa bdag chos gos 'dod do zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul bar bya/_dran par bya'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul 
[\[41a.3\]]zhing dran par byas pa na/_gal te chos gos de grub na de lta na legs/_gal te ma grub na lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdad par bya'o/_/lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi bar du phyogs su cang mi smra bar bsdad pa na gal te chos gos de grub na de lta 
[\[41a.4\]]na legs/_gal te ma grub na de'i 'og tu chos gos grub pa'i phyir brtsal te/_chos gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma grub na phyogs gang nas chos gos kyi rin 'ongs pa der bdag 'gro bar bya'o/_/yang na yid brten pa'i pho nya las tshe dang ldan pa dag 
[\[41a.5\]]gis dge slong che ge mo zhig gi phyir chos gos kyi rin dag pho nya'i lag tu bskur ba de dag ni dge slong de'i don cir yang ma grub kyis shes par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gis rang gi nor chud ma gzan cig ces spring bar bya ste/_de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa 
[\[41a.6\]]btsun pa re zhig dge slong chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du pho nya las zhal ta bgyid pa lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la 
[\[41a.7\]]snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pas zhal ta bgyid pa lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid pa smyon pa la lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du zhal ta bgyid pa sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'on pa la lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos 
[\[41b.2\]]grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid pa gnyid kyis log pa la lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du chos 
[\[41b.3\]]gos bsgrub pa'i slad du phyag las khom pa dang /_rab tu myos pa dang /_snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa dang /_'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu rnams la lan bzhi lan 
[\[41b.4\]]lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan dang /_/de bzhin du ni mtshan dang yang /_/za ma ma ning nyid dang ni/_/ma ning mo ni tha ma yin/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos 
[\[41b.5\]]gos bsgrub pa'i slad du lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_spun mi rung ba la/_rgyu rung ba 
[\[41b.6\]]dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/_mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_ma btags pa'o/_/de lta bu'i chos gos kyi phyir lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos grub na cir 'gyur 
[\[41b.7\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid pa mi la mir 'du shes pas lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_mi la mi ma 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par 
[\[42a.2\]]ma rdzogs par slong bar bgyid cing bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par slong bar bgyid cing bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par slong bar bgyid cing 
[\[42a.3\]]bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar slong bar bgyid cing bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar slong bar bgyid cing bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 
[\[42a.4\]]'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas slong bar bgyid cing bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas slong bar bgyid cing /_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur 
[\[42a.5\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma lan bzhi lan 
[\[42a.6\]]lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du zhal ta pa la lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid pa las 
[\[42a.7\]]zhal ta pa de'i mtshan gyur te bud med du red nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyis pa'i mod la lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid pa zhal ta bgyid pa mo'i mtshan 
[\[42b\]]
