[\[42b.1\]]gyur te skyes par red nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dge slong ma la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid pa za ma la lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing 
[\[42b.2\]]chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du ma ning dang ma ning mo la cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong dge slong gi don dang dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma rnams kyi don du chos 
[\[42b.3\]]gos bsgrub pa'i slad du lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong chos gos la ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i yo byad rnams kyi slad du lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu 
[\[42b.4\]]slong bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i 
[\[42b.5\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du lan bzhi lan lnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung 
[\[42b.6\]]ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas su brjod do//_//sdom la/_gzhan gyis gzhan gyi 'phro dang ni/_/khyim pa nyid dang mu stegs 'gro/_/mi rung ba dang mtshan dang ni/_/bzhi tshan bde gshegs bdun tshan no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[42b.7\]]pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang srin bal gyi stan sar pa byed pa spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gzhan la srin bal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/gzhan dag gi slad du bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gzhan gyis srin bal gyi stan bgyis pa'i 'phro lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mdun du 
[\[43a.2\]]khyim pa la bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_bslab pa stsal pa dang /_dang po mi mthun pa can dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba dang /_rku thabs su gnas pa dang /_tha dad du gnas pa 
[\[43a.3\]]dang /_gnas par mi bya ba nas/_khas len pa'i bar la bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu rnams 
[\[43a.4\]]la srin bal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la srin bal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa dge 
[\[43a.5\]]slong gis srin bal gyi stan sar pa bgyis kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar stan de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_rgyu rung bar gyur la/_spun mi rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur na'o/_/mi 
[\[43a.6\]]rung ba la rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang 'dres pa rnams las bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bal lam/_sha na'am/_ras bal lam/_gso bal dang 'dres pa rnams las bgyid du 
[\[43a.7\]]stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis srin bal dul ma'am/_kha che dar dang 'dres pa las bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/ma btags pa las bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]pa re zhig dge slong srin bal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma srin bal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/_dge slong du 
[\[43b.2\]]red nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma srin bal gyi stan sar pa la srin bal du 'du shes pas bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/srin bal la srin bal ma lags par 
[\[43b.3\]]'du shes pas bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_srin bal ma lags pa la srin bal du 'du shes pas bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/srin bal ma lags pa la srin bal ma lags par 'du shes pas bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur 
[\[43b.4\]]lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi stan bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa stan gyi tshad ni ji tsam lags/_nye ba 'khor stan la ni tshad gsum ste/_chen po dang /_'bring 
[\[43b.5\]]dang /_chung ngu'o/_/de la chen po'i tshad ni khru phyed dang lnga'o/_/chung ngu'i tshad ni phyed dang gsum pa'o/_/de'i bar ma ni 'bring po'o/_/btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par stan bgyi bar sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[43b.6\]]nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[43b.7\]]nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur 
[\[44a.2\]]lags/_nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa glen pa'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis pho nya las srin bal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsol na cir 'gyur 
[\[44a.3\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pa dang /_smyon pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_'on pa dang glen pa la cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/ji ltar dge slong gis srin bal 
[\[44a.4\]]gyi stan byed du bcug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa dang /_dge slong ma la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[44a.5\]]'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste/_gzhung lhag ma ni srin bal gyi spang ba'i ltung byed la 
[\[44a.6\]]ji lta bar bal nag po 'ba' zhig pa'i ltung byed la yang de kho na bzhin du rgyas par brjod do/_/de la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na/_bzhi tshan la lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig la nag po 'ba' zhig par 'du shes pas stan sar pa bgyid du stsol na zhes bzhi tshan du bya'o/_/sangs 
[\[44a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stan sar pa byed pas cha gnyis ni lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las gzhug par bya/_gsum pa ni dkar po las/_bzhi pa ni 'khob bal las gzhug par bya'o/_/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]gal te dge slong gi cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig las ma bcug gam/_gsum pa dkar po las bzhi pa 'khob bal las ma bcug par stan sar pa byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste/_gzhung lhag ma ni srin bal gyi spang ba la ji 
[\[44b.2\]]lta bar cha gnyis kyi spang ba la yang brjod par bya'o/_/de la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na/_dge slong gis lug bal dkar po dang /_'khob bal nyung ba la yang nyung bar 'du shes/_lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig mang ba la yang mang bar 'du shes pas stan sar pa bgyid du stsol 
[\[44b.3\]]na zhes bzhi tshan du brjod par bya'o/_/gnyi gar yang dge slong ma la ni nyes byas su brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_gzhan las gzhan gyi 'phro dang ni/_/khyim pa mu stegs can 'gro dang /_mi rung ba dang mtshan dang ni/_/bzhi tshan bde gshegs bdun tshan no/_/
[\[44b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stan sar pa byed pas mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du stan rnying pa de spangs kyang rung /_ma spangs kyang rung /_
[\[44b.5\]]stan sar pa gzhan byed na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gzhan las stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyi slad du stan sar 
[\[44b.6\]]pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gzhan gyi stan 'phro lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mdun du khyim pa la stan sar pa bgyid du stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[44b.7\]]du dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma rnams dang /_bslab pa stsal ba dang /_dang po mi mthun pa can dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba dang /_rku thabs su gnas pa dang /_tha dad du gnas pa dang /_gnas par mi bya ba nas khas len pa'i bar la stan sar pa bgyid du stsol na 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa la stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[45a.2\]]btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa la stan sar pa bgyid du stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du stan sar pa bgyid du stsal kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de 
[\[45a.3\]]'di ltar stan de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_rgyu rung bar gyur la/_spun mi rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur na'o/_/mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa las bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur 
[\[45a.4\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong dgung lo drug tshun chad du stan sar pa bgyid du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma dgung lo drug tshun chad du stan sar pa 
[\[45a.5\]]bgyid du stsol bas mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong dgung lo drug lon pa la lon par 'du shes pas stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/lon pa 
[\[45a.6\]]la ma lon par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/ma lon pa la lon par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/ma lon pa la ma lon par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dgung lo 
[\[45a.7\]]drug tshun chad du bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs par dgung lo drug tshun chad du stan sar pa bgyid par sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/zhes bcu tshan rgyas par brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa glen pa'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dgung 
[\[45b.2\]]lo drug tshun chad du pho nya las stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du pho nya dang /_yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pa dang /_smyon pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen 
[\[45b.3\]]pa dang /_'on pa la stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/ji ltar dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad stan sar pa byas na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma la ni nyes byas so/_dge 
[\[45b.4\]]slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas su brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_gzhan las gzhan gyi 'phro dang ni/_/khyim pa mu stegs 'gro ba dang /_/mi rung ba dang mtshan dang ni/_/de bzhin bzhi tshan bdun tshan no/_/
[\[45b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi gding ba sar pa byed pas sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas glan par bya'o/_/gal te dge 
[\[45b.6\]]slong gis sar pa kha dog mi sdug par bya ba'i phyir gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang 'khor bas ma glan par gding ba sar pa spyod na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho sor 
[\[45b.7\]]gcig gam/_sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar gzhan zhig las gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/gzhan gyi slad du gding ba sar pa bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/gzhan gyi 'phro lags par bgyis te spyod na cir 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mdun du khyim pa la gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_bslab pa stsal ba dang /_dang po 
[\[46a.2\]]mi mthun pa can dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba dang /_rku thabs su gnas pa dang /_tha dad du gnas pa dang /_gnas par mi bya ba nas/_khas len pa'i bar la gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re 
[\[46a.3\]]zhig dge slong gis phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu la gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod na 
[\[46a.4\]]cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bde bar gshegs pa'i mthor sor gcig gam/_sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar 
[\[46a.5\]]gding ba sar pa de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_spun mi rung bar gyur la/_rgyu rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur na'o/_/mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_ma btags pa ste de lta bu'i gding ba 
[\[46a.6\]]sar pa byed du 'jug cing spyod na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba gzhung bla ma/_bam po drug pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong bde bar gshegs pa'i mthor sor gcig gam/_sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar 
[\[46a.7\]]red nas spyod na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma bde bar gshegs pa'i mthor sor gcig gam/_sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas spyod na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang du mi 'tshal ba la mi 'tshal bar 'du shes pas glan te gding ba sar pa spyad na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mi 'tshal ba la lhag par 'du shes pas glan te spyad na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[46b.2\]]ltung ba med do/_/lhag par 'tshal ba la mi 'tshal bar 'du shes pas glan te spyad na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhag pa la lhag par 'du shes pas glan te spyad na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bde bar gshegs pa'i 
[\[46b.3\]]mthor sor gcig gam/_sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsal ba'i sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar 
[\[46b.4\]]lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na cir 
[\[46b.5\]]'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i 
[\[46b.6\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor 
[\[46b.7\]]ba 'on pa glen pa'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bde bar gshegs pa'i mthor sor gcig gam/_sor phyed las mi 'tshal bar pho nya las gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pa dang /_smyon pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'on pa la gding ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/ji ltar dge slong gding ba sar pa byed du 'jug 
[\[47a.2\]]cing spyod na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba ltar bslab pa byin pa la yang de dang 'dra'o/_/dge slong ma ni byed du 'jug cing spyod na nyes byas so/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_nam mkha' 
[\[47a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul sprul pa dang /_/de bzhin sngags rnams gzhan gsum dang /_/mi rung gnyis tshan mtshan dang ni/_/bzhi tshan pa ni tha ma yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lam du zhugs pas 
[\[47a.4\]]lug bal dag rnyed la 'dod na dge slong des blang bar bya'o/_/blangs nas khyer ba med na dpag tshad gsum gyi mtha'i bar du bdag nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o/_/de las 'das par khyer na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[47a.5\]]re zhig dge slong gis dpag tshad gsum las 'das par nam mkha' las lug bal 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/_rdzu 'phrul gyis khyer na ltung ba med do/_/'on te rnam pa gzhan gyis khyer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/rung ba bgyid pa sprul pas dpag tshad gsum las 'das par 
[\[47a.6\]]'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gsang sngags sam/_sman gyis bdag nyid mi gda' bar bgyis te dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/gzhan gyi slad du dpag tshad 
[\[47a.7\]]gsum las 'das par lug bal 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/gzhan las dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal bskur na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]'tshal kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong lam du zhugs pa zhig gis lug bal dag rnyed nas des de dag dpag tshad gsum gyi bar du bdag nyid kyis khyer khyer ba las/_des yang lug bal gzhan zhig rnyed nas 
[\[47b.2\]]des snga ma bor te phyi ma khyer nas 'gro na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lug bal ma gtogs pa de las gzhan mi rung ba rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dpag tshad gsum las 'das par 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas 
[\[47b.3\]]so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das par 'tshal ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas mtshams las 'das na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das par 'tshal ba las 
[\[47b.4\]]mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas mtshams las 'das na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das pa na rgyang grags la rgyang grags su 'du shes pas 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/_/spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[47b.5\]]rgyang grags la rgyang grags ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/rgyang grags ma lags pa la rgyang grags su 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/rgyang grags ma lags pa la rgyang grags ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[47b.6\]]byas so//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa glen pa'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das par pho nya la bkur na cir 'gyur 
[\[47b.7\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pa dang /_smyon pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'on pa la dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]bkur na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/ji ltar dge slong gis lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das par khyer na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_
[\[48a.2\]]dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa 'gro ba'o/_/khyim pa dag la 
[\[48a.3\]]sogs pa ste/_/bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la lug bal 'khrur 'jug gam/_'tshed du 'jug gam/_rmel du 
[\[48a.4\]]'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis pho nya las dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la 
[\[48a.5\]]snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa smyon ma la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin 
[\[48a.6\]]du dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa sems g.yengs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'on pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim pa mo nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur 
[\[48a.7\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du dge slong ma khas len pa dang /_ma ning dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_ma 'gums pa dang /_pha 'gums pa dang /_dgra bcom pa 'gums pa dang /_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can du zhugs pa dang /_rku thabs 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]su gnas pa dang /_gnas par mi bya ba dang /_dang po mi mthun pa can la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang /_
[\[48b.2\]]tha dad du gnas pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur 
[\[48b.3\]]ro//_//sdom la/_bsgrub bya shas tsam bkrus pa dang /_/dge 'dun gyi dang mtshan gnyis dang /_mi rung ba dang spangs pa dang /_/de bzhin du ni gnyen nyid dang /_/bzhi tshan dag tu byas pa dang /_/dge slong ma ni tha ma yin/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 
[\[48b.4\]]dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal bsgrub par bgyi ba zhig 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal shas tsam bkrus pa zhig 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 
[\[48b.5\]]dge 'dun gyi lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_gal te gang zag gir yongs su spyad pas yongs su spyad de dri ma can du byas pa zhig na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/'on te gnas mal gyi dngos po zhig 'khrur bcug na ni ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge 
[\[48b.6\]]slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur stsal ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red na cir 'gyur 
[\[48b.7\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]'khrur stsal kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_mi rung ba dang 'dres pa 'khrur 'jug pa ste/_mi rung ba rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa zhig 'khrur bcug na nyes 
[\[49a.2\]]byas su 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis spang ba'i lug bal 'khrur stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_gal te ma spangs pa zhig yin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'on te spangs pa zhig yin na ni nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gzhan gyi lug bal zhig 
[\[49a.3\]]'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lug bal 'khrur stsal ba'i sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la 
[\[49a.4\]]bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par 
[\[49a.5\]]rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/_bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[49a.6\]]nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la nye du ma 
[\[49a.7\]]lags par 'du shes pas lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/nye du la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/nye du la nye dur 'du 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas lug bal de 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 
[\[49b.2\]]'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge slong gis nye du 
[\[49b.3\]]ma lags la dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_khyim pa mo dang /_gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu ba rnams dang /_'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la 'khrur stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[49b.4\]]dge slong mas dge slong dang /_dge tshul dang /_'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu ba rnams dang /_'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la 'khrur stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/khyim pa 
[\[49b.5\]]dang /_khyim pa mo la 'khrur stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te/_de bzhin du 'tshed pa dang /_rmel ba yang brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_
[\[49b.6\]]pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa 'gro ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang 
[\[49b.7\]]rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len nam/_len du 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis pho nya las gser dang dngul len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yi ge dang /_lag 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pas gser dang dngul len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis smyon pa gser dang dngul len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du sems 
[\[50a.2\]]'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'on pa dang /_'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa gser dang dngul len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_lkog dang mtshan dang ma sha dang /_/bzhi tshan bdun tshan dben pa'o/_/khyim 
[\[50a.3\]]pa la sogs lus dang skad/_/len dang gzhag gi dge slong ma/_/btsun pa dge slong gis gser dngul blangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_lkog gi phyogs nas len du 'jug gam/_yo byad gzhan du 'du shes na'o/_/
[\[50a.4\]]btsun pa re zhig dge slong gser dang dngul len pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma gser dang dngul len pa las mtshan gyur te/_dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung 
[\[50a.5\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gser gyi ma sha 'am dngul gyi ma sha len tam/_len du stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te khar ba'i ma sha 'am zangs kyi ma sha len tam/_len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[50a.6\]]nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gser dang dngul la gser dang dngul du 'du shes te blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gser dang dngul la gser dang dngul ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/
[\[50a.7\]]gser dang dngul ma lags pa la gser dang dngul ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/gser dang dngul ma lags pa la gser dang dngul ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par ma 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]rdzogs par gser dang dngul len pa'i sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 
[\[50b.2\]]sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs na 
[\[50b.3\]]cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par blangs na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[50b.4\]]nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dben par 'du shes pas gser dngul blang bar bsko na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dben pa la mi dben par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi dben pa la dben par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[50b.5\]]nyes byas so/_/mi dben pa la mi dben par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gser dang dngul mngon sum du khyim pa len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du za ma 
[\[50b.6\]]dang ma ning dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_ma 'gums pa dang /_pha 'gums pa dang /_dgra bcom pa 'gums pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa'am/_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can 
[\[50b.7\]]du zhugs pa dang /_rku thabs su gnas pa dang /_tha dad du gnas pa dang /_gnas par mi bgyid pa dang /_khas len pa dang /_dang po mi mthun pa can dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba dang /_bslab pa stsal ba gser dang dngul mngon sum du len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyis gser dang dngul len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dbus pa'i dge slong gis mtha' 'khob kyi skad du dbus pa la gser dang 
[\[51a.2\]]dngul len du stsal la/_dbus pas kyang mtha' 'khob kyi skad de ma 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mtha' 'khob pas dbus pa'i skad du mtha' 'khob pa la gser dang dngul len du stsal na/_mtha' 'khob pas kyang dbus pa'i skad de ma 'tshal na cir 'gyur 
[\[51a.3\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dbus pa la gser dang dngul len du stsal na/_dbus pas kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad de ma 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dbus pas dbus pa'i skad du mtha' 'khob pa 
[\[51a.4\]]las gser dang dngul len du stsal la/_mtha' 'khob pas kyang dbus pa'i skad de ma 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa dge slong gis rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len tam/_len du stsal kyang ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags 
[\[51a.5\]]sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar gser dang dngul len pa na rang gir byed pa'i sems mi bskyed cing mi rung ba'i dngos po gzhan zhig rang gir bya'o/_/des tshig tu yang smra na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gzhan gyi slad du gser dang dngul len tam/_len du stsal 
[\[51a.6\]]na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung byed do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas gser dang dngul len tam/_len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len tam/_len du stsal 
[\[51a.7\]]na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slob mas rang gi lag gis gser dang dngul len tam/_len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/sngar ltung ba byung ba 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa 'gro ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_
[\[51b.2\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis pho nya las mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[51b.3\]]byas so/_/de bzhin du yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan gyi slad du dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pa la yang brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis smyon pa dang lhan cig mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[51b.4\]]byas so/_/de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_'on pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so//_//
[\[51b.5\]]sdom la/_mtshan dang bzhi tshan kho na dang /_/bdun tshan dang ni gzhan phyir dang /_/bslab dang nye du 'dra ba dang /_/dge slong ma ni tha ma yin/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te/_dge slong 
[\[51b.6\]]mar red nas rnyed pa grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas rnyed pa grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[51b.7\]]btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mi la mir 'du shes pas mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi ma lags pa la mir 'du 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 
[\[52a.2\]]lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 
[\[52a.3\]]'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[52a.4\]]bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun 
[\[52a.5\]]pa re zhig dge slong gis gzhan gyi slad du mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal ba mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[52a.6\]]btsun pa nye du dang lhan cig mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_
[\[52a.7\]]'dra bas 'dra ba brjes na ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]pa la nyes byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste/_gzhung lhag ma ni 
[\[52b.2\]]mngon mtshan can gyi spyod pa la bshad pa ji lta ba de bzhin du nyo tshong 'di la yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_de nyid nyams dang yul gzhan dang /_/mu stegs so btang min dkar dang /_/smyon pa mtshan dang pho nya dang /_/yod dam 'tsho ba dge slong ma/_/sangs 
[\[52b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcang bar bya'o/_/de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa 
[\[52b.4\]]lhung bzed de nyid bcangs na ltung bar yang 'gyur la de nyid bcangs na ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong lhung bzed chen po 'chang ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas bcangs na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re 
[\[52b.5\]]zhig dge slong gis spangs pa'i lhung bzed nyams na ltung ba bshags par bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor bshags par bya'o/_/ltung ba bshags nas slar rnyed na spang bar bgyi 'am/_nye ba 'khor ma yin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung 
[\[52b.6\]]bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa dgung bcu'i bar bas thal bar bcangs la/_'di las ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge 
[\[52b.7\]]slong gis yul gzhan nas dge slong zhig la dge slong gi lag tu lhung bzed gcig bskur na/_des lhung bzed de yun shin tu ring por bcangs kyang ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mu stegs can gyi snod bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lhung bzed so ma btang ba lhag par bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lhung bzed skya bo zhig bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa dge slong gis 
[\[53a.2\]]lhung bzed rnyed ma thag tu sems 'khrugs par gyur na/_gang nas bzung ste dgung bcur bgrang bar bgyi/_gang nas rang gi sems sor chud pa nas so/_/btsun pa dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa dgung bcu las 'das par bcangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba mchis 
[\[53a.3\]]lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong gis lhung bzed rnyed nas zhag bcu lon pa dang mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas 'chang na'o/_/btsun pa dge slong mas lhung bzed lhag pa dgung gcig las lhag par bcangs kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags 
[\[53a.4\]]sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong mas lhung bzed rnyed ma thag tu mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas 'chang na'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis yun shin tu ring mo zhig tu lhung bzed lhag pa bcangs na 'di la ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_
[\[53a.5\]]'di ltar dge slong gis dge slong zhig la lhung bzed kyi phyir dge slong mang lags na/_des lhung bzed de blangs te yun shin tu ring mo zhig tu bcangs kyang ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa dge slong la lhung bzed gcig cig bdog cing mchis la de nyid kyang spang bar 'gyur ba lta 
[\[53a.6\]]mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_byin gyis ma brlabs par bcangs na'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis nam 'tsho'i bar du lhung bzed lhag pa bcangs kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong de zhag bcu tshun chad 
[\[53a.7\]]du dus las 'das na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal ba lhung bzed lhag pa dgung bcu las 'das par 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma ni lhung bzed lhag pa zhag gcig las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/tshor ba 
[\[53b.2\]]'on pa 'gro ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang lhung bzed lhan pa lnga med pa spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol zhing lhung bzed 
[\[53b.3\]]grub nas spang ba'i ltung byed de/_dge slong des lhung bzed de dge slong gi 'khor la dbul bar bya zhing dge slong gi 'khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la phyis dge slong khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/_gtang bar mi bya gzhan la sbyin par 
[\[53b.4\]]mi bya bar chag pa'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal bus dal bus spyod par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste/_de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis pho nya las lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung 
[\[53b.5\]]bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/pho nya las ji ltar yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pas lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/
[\[53b.6\]]btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis smyon pa las lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'on pa dang /_'gro 
[\[53b.7\]]ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams las lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o//_//sdom la/_mu stegs can dang za ma nyid/_/de bzhin du ni mtshan dang yang /_/thun mong dang ni 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]bzhi tshan nyid/_/yo byad rnams dang dge slong ma/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu ba rnams las lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur 
[\[54a.2\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mu stegs can gyi snod bslangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/snod thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o//_//
[\[54a.3\]]'dul ba gzhung bla ma/_bam po bdun pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis za ma las lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/de bzhin du ma ning dang /_ma ning mo dang /_mtshan 
[\[54a.4\]]gnyis pa las lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du lhung bzed gnyis pa bslangs pa las mtshan gyur 
[\[54a.5\]]te dge slong mar red nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du lhung bzed gnyis pa bslangs pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[54a.6\]]spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang las lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal ba las de gnyi ga mtshan gyur te/_mtshan gyur nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang 
[\[54a.7\]]ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi mchis 'brang nye du ma lags pas lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal ba las de gnyi ga'i mtshan gyur te/_mtshan gyur nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs 
[\[54b.2\]]par bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur 
[\[54b.3\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas bslangs la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa 
[\[54b.4\]]re zhig dge slong gnyis kyis lhung bzed gcig bslangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mi la mir 'du shes pas lhung bzed gnyis pa bslangs na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[54b.5\]]nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes na 
[\[54b.6\]]cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig 
[\[54b.7\]]dge slong gis dge slong gi yo byad dag gam/_rim gyis lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i 
[\[55a.2\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma rnams kyis lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/sngar ltung ba byung ba la 
[\[55a.3\]]sogs pa la nyes byas su 'gyur te/_snga ma bzhin no//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems g.yengs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa 'gro ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[55a.4\]]pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang rang gis bslangs pa'i dog pas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la chos gos 'thag tu 'jug na chos gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge 
[\[55a.5\]]slong gis pho nya las thag pa nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pa dang /_gzhan gyi slad du thag pa nye du ma 
[\[55a.6\]]lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis tha ga pa smyon pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du tha ga pa sems g.yengs pa dang /_tshor bas 
[\[55a.7\]]nyam thag pa dang /_'on pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_ma ning za ma nyid dang ni/_/de bzhin thun mong mtshan dang ni/_/mi rung ba 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]dang bdun tshan nyid/_/bzhi tshan slob dang dge slong ma/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis tha ga pa ma ning nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du tha ga pa za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_mtshan gnyis pa 
[\[55b.2\]]nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis thun mong gi chos gos shig tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun 
[\[55b.3\]]pa re zhig dge slong gis tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal ba 
[\[55b.4\]]las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge slong gis tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_
[\[55b.5\]]nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_rgyu rung bar gyur la/_spun mi rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/_mi rung ba rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa tha ga pa nye du 
[\[55b.6\]]ma yin pa la 'thag tu bcug nas chos gos grub na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal ba'i sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par 
[\[55b.7\]]ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang 
[\[56a.2\]]ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis tha ga pa mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes pas chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub 
[\[56a.3\]]na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi la mir 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[56a.4\]]btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/nye 
[\[56a.5\]]du la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/nye du la nye du lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub na cir 
[\[56a.6\]]'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal nas chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul mas tha 
[\[56a.7\]]ga pa nye du ma lags pa la chos gos 'thag tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la chos gos 'thag tu bcug pa las de la gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig rig nas tha ga pa nye 
[\[56b.2\]]du ma yin pa'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa shes par gyis shig_/chos gos 'di kho bo'i phyir 'thag gis tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa chos gos 'di bzang po zheng che ba dang /_khrun ring ba dang /_thar gyis zhag pa dang /_thag ran bzang bar legs par 
[\[56b.3\]]gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa tha ga pa 'di ltar kho bos gla rngan 'di lta ste/_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_bza' rgyu cung zad cig sbyin no zhes smras nas/_de la gal te dge slong des chos gos bsgrub pa'i phyir gla rngan 'di lta ste/_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_bza' rgyu 
[\[56b.4\]]cung zad cig sbyin zhing grub na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa ste/_gzhung lhag ma ni 'thag tu 'jug pa'i spang ba la ji skad du bshad pa de bzhin du lhag pa 'thag tu 'jug pa'i spang ba 'di la brjod par bya'o/_/tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na/_btsun pa re zhig dge 
[\[56b.5\]]slong gis rnam par rtog pa rig nas pho nya las bslangs na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis rnam par rtog pa rig nas tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa mi la 
[\[56b.6\]]mir 'du shes pas slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/
[\[56b.7\]]mi ma lags pa la lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/grub na snga ma bzhin no/_/mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/grub na snga ma bzhin no/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis rnam par rtog par rig nas tha ga pa nye du ma 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]lags pa la nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/
[\[57a.2\]]nye du la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/nye du la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas rnam par rtog par rig nas tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[57a.3\]]chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas rnam par rtog par rig nas tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[57a.4\]]dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul mas rnam par rtog par rig nas tha ga pa nye du ma lags pa la slong na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga 
[\[57a.5\]]ma bzhin no//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems g.yengs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa glen pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[57a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge slong la chos gos byin nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/_yi ma rangs nas/_'phrog gam/_'phrog tu 'jug cing /_de la 'di skad ces dge slong khyod la chos gos mi sbyin gyis phyir byin cig ces zer na dge slong 
[\[57a.7\]]des chos gos de lhag ma yod na phyir sbyin par bya zhing btang na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos byin pa pho nya las 'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du dge slong ma chos gos 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]stsal nas yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pa dang /_gzhan gyi slad du 'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong smyon pa la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 
[\[57b.2\]]'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du sems g.yengs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'on pa la chos gos stsal nas/_'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 'di las phyi 
[\[57b.3\]]rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu rnams la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa la chos gos stsal 
[\[57b.4\]]nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang /_/de bzhin thun mong mtshan dang ni/_/ma chod pa dang mi rung nyid/_/bzhi tshan pa ni tha ma yin/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 
[\[57b.5\]]khyim pa la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/de bzhin du khas blangs pa dang /_dge slong za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_ma 'gums pa dang /_pha 'gums pa dang /_dgra bcom pa 
[\[57b.6\]]'gums pa dang /_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can du zhugs pa dang /_rku thabs su gnas pa dang /_dang po mi mthun pa can dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge 
[\[57b.7\]]slong gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa'i dge slong la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang /_tha dad du gnas pa dang /_bslab pa 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]stsal ba la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la chos gos stsal nas 
[\[58a.2\]]'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos stsal nas khyim pa 'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_dge slong ma 
[\[58a.3\]]sun phyung ba dang /_ma 'gums pa dang /_pha 'gums pa dang /_dgra bcom pa 'gums pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang /_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can du zhugs pa dang /_rku thabs 
[\[58a.4\]]su gnas pa dang /_tha dad du gnas pa dang /_gnas par mi bgyi ba dang /_dang po mi mthun pa can dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba dang /_khas blangs pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul 
[\[58a.5\]]ma 'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gnyis kyis dge slong la chos gos thun mong ba zhig stsal te/_de nas slad kyis gcig gis 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re 
[\[58a.6\]]zhig dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas dge slong ma la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red nas grub na cir 'gyur 
[\[58a.7\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos khru gang bas chung ba zhig stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog kyang spang ba'i 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_spun mi rung bar gyur la/_rgyu rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/_mi rung ba rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[58b.2\]]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_ma btags pa'o/_/de lta bu'i chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes te chos gos 
[\[58b.3\]]stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes te stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma 
[\[58b.4\]]rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes te stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes te stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[58b.5\]]btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'phrog pa'i sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'phrog na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'phrog pa'i sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar 'phrog na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[58b.6\]]bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs te 'phrog na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar 'phrog pa'i sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar 'phrog na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar 'phrog 
[\[58b.7\]]pa'i sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas 'phrog na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas 'phrog pa'i sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas 'phrog na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas 'phrog pa'i 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'phrog na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal ba la dge slong la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re 
[\[59a.2\]]zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas dge slong ma la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 
[\[59a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong mas dge slong dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul ma la chos gos stsal nas 'phrog gam/_'phrog tu stsal na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung ba byung 
[\[59a.4\]]ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas su rgya cher brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_sems g.yengs pa dang dus las 'das/_/de bzhin mtshan dang thun mong dang /_/mi rung bzhi tshan dus ma yin/_/dge slong ma ni tha ma yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[59a.5\]]nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ston zla 'bring po nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du brtad pa las byung ba'i chos gos shig rnyed la 'dod na dge slong des chos gos de blang bar bya'o/_/blangs na chos gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi tshe'i bar 
[\[59a.6\]]du bcang bar bya'o/_/de las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa dge slong gis brtad pa las byung ba'i chos gos shig chos gos stsal ba'i dus kyi tshe las 'das par bzhag kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis 
[\[59a.7\]]lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong gis chos gos rnyed ma thag tu sems g.yengs par gyur na'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtad pa las byung ba'i chos gos bcangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]'khor yod de/_chos gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi nang rol du dus byas na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis brtad pa las byung ba'i chos gos shig chos gos stsal ba'i dus kyi bar las 'da' bar bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/
[\[59b.2\]]btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma brtad pa las byung ba'i chos gos shig chos gos stsal ba'i dus kyi bar las 'da' bar bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis brtad pa las byung ba'i chos gos thun mong ba zhig 
[\[59b.3\]]chos gos stsal ba'i dus las 'das par bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa dge slong gis brtad pa las byung ba'i chos gos stsal ba'i dus kyi bar las 'das par bzhag kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_
[\[59b.4\]]'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_rgyu rung bar gyur la/_spun mi rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur na'o/_/mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_ma btags pa ste/_de 
[\[59b.5\]]lta bu'i chos gos shig chos gos sbyin pa'i dus las 'das par bzhag na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos stsal ba'i dus las 'das pa la 'das par 'du shes pas chos gos bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[59b.6\]]'das pa la ma 'das par 'du shes pas bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/ma 'das pa la 'das par 'du shes pas bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/ma 'das pa la ma 'das par 'du shes pas bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba 
[\[59b.7\]]med do/_/btsun pa dgag dbye ma bgyis par rgyal pos shol bor na dge slong gis brtad pa'i chos gos ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_nye ba 'khor ji ltar gnas par dam bcas pa bzhin no/_/brtad pa las byung ba'i chos gos dgung bcu 'das pa zhes bgyi'am/_dgung 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]bcu 'das pa zhes mi bgyi bka' stsal pa/_zhag bcu 'das pa zhes mi bya'o/_/btsun pa brtad pa las byung ba'i chos gos dus ma lags pa'i chos gos su bgyir rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis brtad pa las byung ba'i chos 
[\[60a.2\]]gos sbyin pa'i dus kyi bar du chongs shig ces gsungs pa gang lags/_btsun pa chos gos stsal ba'i dus gang lags/_nye ba 'khor dus ni dgag dbye ste/_dgag dbye ma byas pas ni thams cad du dus ma yin pa kho na'o/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas brtad pa 
[\[60a.3\]]las byung ba'i chos gos shig chos gos stsal ba'i bar las 'das par bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas brtad pa las byung ba'i chos gos shig chos gos stsal ba'i dus las 'das par bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i 
[\[60a.4\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas su rgya cher brjod par bya'o//_//sdom la/_mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan nyid/_/de bzhin du ni bar chad dang /_/sdom pa dge 'dun nam 
[\[60a.5\]]mkha' dang /_/de bzhin mtshan dang dge slong ma/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po gnas mal dgon pa dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa/_'jigs pa dang bcas 
[\[60a.6\]]par grags pa/_'jigs pa tha dad par 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa dag tu dbyar phyi mar gyur la/_dge slong dgon pa pas 'dod na chos gos gsum las chos gos gang yang rung ba khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya ste/_dge slong dgon pa pa la chos gos de dang 
[\[60a.7\]]mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral dgos pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na dge slong dgon pa pa des zhag drug gi mtha' tshun chad du chos gos dang mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar bya'o/_/de las 'das par 'bral na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa dge slong dgung drug las chos gos de dang mtshams kyi slad rol du 'bral bar bgyid kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_rgyu rung bar gyur la/_spun mi 
[\[60b.2\]]rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur na'o/_/mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_ma btags pa ste/_de lta bu'i chos gos dang zhag drug 'das par mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'bral bar byed na 
[\[60b.3\]]nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dgung drug 'das pa las 'das par 'du shes pas chos gos dang mtshams kyi slad rol du 'bral bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'das pa la ma 'das par 'du shes pas 'bral bar 
[\[60b.4\]]bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/ma 'das pa la 'das par 'du shes pas 'bral bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/ma 'das pa la ma 'das par 'du shes pas 'bral bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa 
[\[60b.5\]]dge slong dgung drug las 'das par chos gos de dang mtshams kyi slad rol du 'bral bar bgyid kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong de 'ong na bar chad brgyad las bar chad gang yang rung ba zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na'o/_/
[\[60b.6\]]btsun pa dge slong dgung drug las 'das par chos gos de dang mtshams kyi slad rol du 'bral bar bgyid kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar dge slong des chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa thob par gyur na'o/_btsun 
[\[60b.7\]]pa re zhig dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi chos gos shig byin gyis brlabs te bzhag nas dgung drug las 'das par chos gos de dang mtshams kyi slad rol du 'bral bar bgyid na bral zhes bgyi 'am ma bral ba zhes bgyi/_nye ba 'khor bral ba zhes bya'o/_/chos gos de spang 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bar bgyi'am/_nye ba 'khor ma yin te/_ltung byed 'ba' zhig pa'i bshags par bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim gyi nang du chos gos bzhag nas de nam mkha' la mchis te dgung drug las 'das par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i 
[\[61a.2\]]ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis khyim gyi nang du chos gos bzhag ste/_de dgung drug las 'das par chos gos de dang bral bar gyur pa las mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas khyim gyi nang 
[\[61a.3\]]du chos gos bzhag ste/_de dgung drug las 'das par chos gos de dang bral bar bgyid pa na mtshan gyur te dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas dgung drug las 'das par chos gos de dang bral bar 
[\[61a.4\]]bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma 'bral bar byed na nyes byas so/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge tshul ma la ni ltung ba med do/_/sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//_//sdom la/_pho nya 
[\[61a.5\]]yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems g.yengs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa glen pa'o/_/gnyid log ra ro rab myos dang /_/snyoms zhugs 'gro dang phyi rol pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor 
[\[61a.6\]]gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa na dbyar gyi gos ras chen btsal bar bya'o/_/dbyar gyi zla ba dag zla phyed lus par bya ste/_bcang bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gis so ga rnams kyi zla ba gcig lus pa de'i 
[\[61a.7\]]sngon rol du dbyar gyi gos ras chen tshol bar byed dam/_dbyar gyi zla ba dag zla phyed lus par byas pa'i 'og tu 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa//_//'dul ba gzhung bla ma/_bam po brgyad pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen pho nya las shin tu ring ba btsal te chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/pho nya las ji lta bar yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan 
[\[61b.2\]]la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pas kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/ji tsam du dge slong cung zad shin tu rings par tshol zhing shin tu yun ring du 'chang na thams cad du spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis smyon pa las dbyar gyi gos ras chen shin tu 
[\[61b.3\]]rings par btsal te gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/smyon pa la ji lta bar de bzhin du sems g.yengs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen pa dang /_
[\[61b.4\]]'on pa dang /_gnyid kyis log pa dang /_phyag las khom pa dang /_rab tu myos pa dang /_snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa dang /_'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu 
[\[61b.5\]]las shin tu rings par btsal te gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_mi rung ba dang mtshan nyid dang /_/de bzhin thun mong nyid dang ni/_/ma langs pa dang 
[\[61b.6\]]seng ras dang /_/bzhi tshan ji ltar dge slong ngo /_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen shin tu rings par btsal la/_shin tu yun ring du 'chang yang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/_nye ba 'khor yod de/_'di ltar gos de'i spun rung 
[\[61b.7\]]bar gyur la/_rgyu mi rung ba dang /_rgyu rung bar gyur la/_spun mi rung ba dang /_gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur na'o/_/mi rung ba rnga bal dang /_ba lang gi spu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bal dang /_ra bal dang 'dres pa dang /_ma btags pa de lta bu'i dbyar gyi gos ras chen shin tu 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]rings par btsal te shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen shin tu rings par 'tshal te shin tu yun ring du 'chang ba las mtshan gyur te/_dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/_
[\[62a.2\]]nyes byas so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dbyar gyi gos ras chen shin tu rings par btsal te shin tu yun ring du 'chang ba las mtshan gyur te dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen 
[\[62a.3\]]thun mong ba zhig shin tu rings par btsal nas shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig bsnyen par ma rdzogs par dbyar gyi gos ras chen bslangs la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub ste shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[62a.4\]]byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub ste shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub ste shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes 
[\[62a.5\]]byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub nas shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs kar bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub ste shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas 
[\[62a.6\]]so/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas bslangs la bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub ste shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas bslangs la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub nas shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur 
[\[62a.7\]]lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dbyar gyi gos ras chen ma 'tshal ba zhig shin tu rings par btsal nas shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dbyar gyi gos ras chen seng ras shig shin tu rings par btsal nas shin 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mi las mir 'du shes pas dbyar gyi gos ras chen zhig shin tu rings par btsal nas gos thob ste shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[62b.2\]]mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi ma lags pa la mir 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/mi ma lags pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 
[\[62b.3\]]dgag dbye'i 'og zla ba phyed las 'das par 'du shes pas dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'das pa la ma 'das par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/ma 'das pa la 'das par 'du shes na 
[\[62b.4\]]cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/ma 'das pa la ma 'das par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/_ltung ba med do/_/btsun pa re zhig dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa dang rgyal pos shol bor na dge slong de dag gis ji ltar dgag dbye bgyi/_nye ba 'khor ji ltar 
[\[62b.5\]]gnas par khas blangs pa bzhin no/_/dbyar gyi gos ras chen ji ltar bcang bar bgyi/_ji ltar dgag dbye byas pa bzhin no/_/btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas dbyar gyi gos ras chen shin tu rings par btsal nas shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_spang 
[\[62b.6\]]ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas dbyar gyi gos ras chen shin tu rings par btsal nas shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/zhag bcu las 'das par 'chang na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge 
[\[62b.7\]]tshul dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pas dbyar gyi gos ras chen shin tu rings par btsal nas shin tu yun ring du 'chang na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas su 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_pho nya yi ge lag brda dang /_/gzhan la snyad 'dogs 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]brgyud pa dang /_/smyon pa dang ni sems g.yengs dang /_/tshor ba 'on pa glen pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa shes 
[\[63a.2\]]bzhin du gang zag bdag la sgyur du 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa shes bzhin du pho nya las gang zag bdag la sgyur du stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/rnyed pa grub na cir 
[\[63a.3\]]'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/pho nya las ji lta bar yi ge dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang /_brgyud pas kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge 'dun smyon pa las bsngos pa'i rnyed pa shes bzhin du gang zag bdag la sgyur du 
[\[63a.4\]]stsol na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/rnyed pa grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/smyon pa las ji lta ba de bzhin du sems g.yengs pa dang /_tshor bas nyam thag pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'on pa la cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas so//_//
[\[63a.5\]]sdom la/_mi chog pa dang mi rung dang /_/pha ma bzhi tshan mtshan dang ni/_/khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang /_/'gro dang slob pa dge slong ma/_/btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i chos gos khru gang du mi tshang ba zhig gang zag bdag la sgyur du stsal na cir 
[\[63a.6\]]'gyur lags/_nyes byas so/_/chos gos grub na cir 'gyur lags/_nyes byas kho na'o/_/'on te de kun nas khru gang ba'am/_lhag pa zhig yin na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge slong gis dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa 'tshal bzhin du gang zag
