[\[241b.4\]]bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/de bzhin du mkhan po za ma dang /_ma ning nas rgyas par bslab pa stsal ba'i bar du de rnams kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na 
[\[241b.5\]]bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'dul ba gzhung dam pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dngos po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor na/_phyed 
[\[241b.6\]]dang gsum dang bskor ba dang /_/bzhi pa dang ni mtshams dang mtshan/_/zhig dang snga ma mtshams dang shing /_/dbyung dang mi rung khyim pa dang /_/dbyung ba tha ma smras pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[241b.7\]]kyis mtshams chen po chod cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa mtshams chen po tshad ji tsam/_u pA li dpag tshad phyed dang gsum mo/_/de tshun chad ni thams cad kyang chung ngu ste/_dkyil 'khor gang du grangs bzhi bcu bskor bar shong ba'o/_/btsun pa dpag tshad phyed 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]dang gsum las 'das par mtshams bkum na de mtshams zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_dpag tshad phyed dang gsum ni mtshams so/_/de las 'das pa ni mtshams ma yin no/_/de ste mtshams bcad na yang ma bcad pa zhes 
[\[242a.2\]]bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa ste/_de bzhin du thams cad shes par bya'o/_/btsun pa 'og gi mtshams gang lags/_u pA li chu yod pa'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa dpag tshad phyed dang gsum las 'das pa na chab mchis na de mtshams 
[\[242a.3\]]zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_dpag tshad phyed dang gsum ni mtshams so/_/de man chad ni mtshams ma yin no/_/btsun pa steng gi nam mkha' la mtshams gang lags/_u pA li ji tsam rtsig rgal lam shing gi rtse mo yod pa'o/_/btsun pa dpag tshad phyed 
[\[242a.4\]]dang gsum las 'das pa na rtsig rgal lam shing gi rtse mo mchis na de mtshams zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_dpag tshad phyed dang gsum ni mtshams zhes bya'i/_de yan chad ni mtshams ma yin no/_/btsun pa ri'i rtse mo'i mtshams gang lags/_u pA li chu mig 
[\[242a.5\]]yod pa'o/_/btsun pa dpag tshad phyed dang gsum las 'das pa na chab mig mchis na de mtshams zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_dpag tshad phyed dang gsum ni mtshams so/_/de yan chad ni mtshams ma yin no/_/btsun pa mtshams la yang mtshams kyis 
[\[242a.6\]]bskor bar gnang ngam/_u pA li mi gnang ste/_rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang /_rtsig pa'i mtshams dang /_chus bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ma gtogs so/_/btsun pa las bgyid pa 'phags pas 'phags pa'i skad du mtshams bkum pa dang /_dge slong de dag 
[\[242a.7\]]gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/_las byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa 'phags pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du mtshams bkum pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bcad pa zhes bya ste/_las byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du mtshams bkum pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob 
[\[242b.2\]]pa'i skad ma 'tshal na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/_las byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa mtha' 'khob pas 'phags pa'i skad du mtshams bkum pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 
[\[242b.3\]]'tshal na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/_las byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa steng gi nam mkha' la mtshams dgum par rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ste/_u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtshams bstan 
[\[242b.4\]]du med pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar mas mtshams dgum du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_skar ma ni mi brtan zhing g.yo ba'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa chu rlabs dang /_chu rlabs kyi rgyud 
[\[242b.5\]]dam/_klung gi 'gram du mtshams dgum du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chu rlabs dang /_chu rlabs kyi rgyud dang /_klung gi 'gram ni g.yo zhing mi brtan pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa de ste klung gi 'gram brtan par gyur na mtshams dgum 
[\[242b.6\]]du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa rdzu 'phrul lam sgyu mas mtshams dgum du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul dang sgyu ma ni tha snyad du mi 'dogs pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa klung ngam/_yur ba las mtshams bzlar 
[\[242b.7\]]rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ste/_de klung ngam yur chu rtag tu mi 'bab par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa rtag tu 'bab pa'i chu gting zab pa las mtshams bzla bar rung ngam/_u pA li rung ste/_'di ltar yang klung dang yur chu de las shing ngam rtsig pa 'am re lde rnams kyis bkab par gyur 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]pa'o/_/btsun pa de ste shing ngam re lde 'jig pa'i chos su gyur na zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_de ste sbyor ba btang na zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/'on te slar dgab par sbyor ba ma btang na ma zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa las bgyid pa mtshams gcod pa na mtshan gyur na mtshams 
[\[243a.2\]]bcad pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa mtshams kyis mtshams dgrol du rung ngam/_u pA li rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang /_rtsig pa'i mtshams ma gtogs pa gzhan mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa mtshams 'jig pa rnam pa du mchis/_u pA 
[\[243a.3\]]li lnga ste/_mtshams med pa dang /_dge slong med pa dang /_re ba med pa dang /_gsol ba dang /_las dang lnga yin no/_/btsun pa sngon gyi mtshams ma bkrol bar mtshams gzhan dgum du rung ngam/_u pA li rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang /_rtsig pa'i mtshams dang /_
[\[243a.4\]]dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams ma gtogs par mi rung ngo /_/u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsol ba dang las kyis mtshams bcad do/_/gsol ba dang las kyis mtshams dgrol lo/_/btsun pa mtshams bkum pas mtshams dgrol ba'am/_mtshams bkrol bas mtshams 
[\[243a.5\]]bkum par 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_las kyis mtshams bcad na rgyang grags dang /_rtsig pa'i mtshams dgrol ba zhes bya'o/_/las kyis mtshams bkrol na rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang /_rtsig pa'i mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa mchi 
[\[243a.6\]]ba'i rjes su mchi ba gang u pA li mtshams so/_/btsun pa mchis pa'i rjes su mchis pa gang /_u pA li mtshams so/_/btsun pa gnas bzhi 'am/_lnga 'am/_de las mang yang rung shing gcig gis mtshams dgum par rung ngam/_u pA li rung ste/_ji tsam du mtshams 
[\[243a.7\]]bsgrags shing gzhag par nus pa'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa mtshams nas mtshams spo bar rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ste/_rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang /_rtsig pa'i mtshams ni ma gtogs so/_/btsun pa spo mi 'tshal ba'i mtshams du/_u pA li gcig ste/_las kyi 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]mtshams sam chu mig gam khron pa'o/_/btsun pa rung ba'i sa dang /_mi rung ba'i sa'o zhes bgyi na/_btsun pa rung ba'i sa gang lags u pA li gnas gang na mtshams kyi nang na rung ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa 'di ni rung ba'i sa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa mi rung 
[\[243b.2\]]ba'i sa gang lags/_u pA li mtshams kyi nang du rung ba'i gnas byin gyis ma rlabs par gyur pa 'di ni mi rung ba'i sa zhes bya'o/_/u pA li dam pa'i chos yod pa'i bar du mi rung ba'i sa yang yod do/_/u pA li dam pa'i chos med par gyur na thams cad kyang rung ba'i 
[\[243b.3\]]sa'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na dam pa'i chos mchis pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li gang gi tshe nan tan byed pa rnams nan tan byed cing las kyang byed de nan tan du bya bas nan tan byed la las kyang byed pa'i bar du ni dam pa'i chos yod pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na 
[\[243b.4\]]dam pa'i chos ma mchis par gyur pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li gang gi tshe nan tan byed pa rnams ni nan tan mi byed cing las kyang mi byed de nan tan byed pas nan tan mi byed la las kyang mi byed pa'i tshe/_dam pa'i chos med par gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa las bgyid pa khyim 
[\[243b.5\]]pas mtshams bkum na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de bzhin du las byed pa za ma dang ma ning dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_pha dang /_ma dang dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_
[\[243b.6\]]mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can du song ba dang /_rkun gnas dang /_mi gnas pa dang /_so sor gnas pa dang /_sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyis mtshams bkum na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa las bgyid pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen 
[\[243b.7\]]bgyis pa dang /_nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba rnams kyis mtshams bkum na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li mtshams bcad pa zhes ni bya la/_dge 'dun rnams ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa las bgyid pa smyon pas mtshams 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]bkum na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li de ste dge slong gi 'du shes dang ldan la mtshan ma rnams kyang ston nus shing gsol ba yang byas te las ma nyams na mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du las byed pa sems 'khrugs pa dang /_nad kyis 
[\[244a.2\]]gzir ba dang /_glen pa dang /_'on pa rnams kyang brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa las byed pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pas mtshams bkum na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa mtshams bkum pa na las bgyid pa'i dge slong dus las 'das 
[\[244a.3\]]na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li de ste mtshams bsgrags par yang rtogs la/_las kyang mang du byas par gyur na mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o/_/u pA li de ste mtshams bsgrags par yang ma rtogs la las kyang mang du ma byas par gyur na mtshams ma bcad 
[\[244a.4\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du khyim pa yin par shes pa dang /_ma ning yin pa dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_pha dang ma dang /_dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba yin pa dang /_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can 
[\[244a.5\]]du song ba yin pa dang /_rkun gnas dang /_mi gnas pa yin pa dang /_so sor gnas pa yin pa dang /_sngar nyes pa byung ba yin pa dang /_sngar 'khrugs pa yin par shes pa nas/_de bzhin du 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa bdag nyid yin par shes pa'ang rgyas par brjod par 
[\[244a.6\]]bya'o/_/btsun pa mtshams 'gums pa na dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis par 'tshal ba dang nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba lags par 'tshal na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/
[\[244a.7\]]btsun pa khyim pas grangs su bskangs te mtshams bkum na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de bzhin du ma ning nas sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyi bar du de dag gis grangs su bskangs te mtshams bkum na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]ma yin no/_/btsun pa dge slong za mas grangs su bskangs te mtshams bkum na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bcad pa zhes mi bya ste/_dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /_nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab 
[\[244b.2\]]pa stsal ba rnams kyis grangs su bskangs te mtshams bkum na mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o//_//mdor na/_mtshams dang rung ba'i gnas dag dang /_/las gcig 
[\[244b.3\]]klung yang de bzhin te/_/zhig pa dang ni gling gsum dang /_/grong dang gsum pa de bzhin no/_/btsun pa mtshams kyi mtshan ma mchis par gyur na mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa mtshams zhig na rung ba'i gnas kyang zhig 
[\[244b.4\]]pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa las gcig dang gsol ba gcig gis las bgyid pa phyogs gcig tu mchis te gnas bzhir mtshams dgum par rung ngam/_u pA li rung ste/_ji ltar yang las byed pa'i dge slong des gnas bzhi'i 
[\[244b.5\]]mtshams su shing ngam/_dbyig pa 'am/_re lde la mnan te mtshams bcad pa'o/_/btsun pa mtshams dgum pa'i gnas su klung ngam yur chus mtshams non na mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li de ste mtshams kyi mtshan ma brtan pa yod na ma zhig pa zhes 
[\[244b.6\]]bya'o/_/de ste mtshams kyi mtshan ma med par gyur na zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa mtshams zhig na chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa yang ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'am/_mchis pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li yod pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pas ni las kyi mtshams su chos 
[\[244b.7\]]gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa skos shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang /_rtsig pa'i mtshams la yang chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa bsko bar bgyi'am/_de ste dgos par gyur na skos shig_/btsun pa grong dang gtsug lag khang 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]lhan cig tu mchis te mtshams 'brel bar gyur na de la chos gos dang mi 'bral bar gang tshun chad bsko bar bgyi/_grong gi nyen kor ma gtogs pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni grong ngam grong gi nyen kor ma gtogs par chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i 
[\[245a.2\]]sdom pa'o zhes gsungs na/_chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa bskos pa las grong zhig der btsugs na de phyogs su chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa zhig par 'gyur ram/_u pA li zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa bskos 
[\[245a.3\]]pa las grong gud du 'phos na btsun pa ci'i phyir phyogs der yang chos gos dang mi 'bral bar sdom par bsko bar bgyi'am/_u pA li mi dgos te/_sngon gyi sdom pa gsos pas chog go//_//mdor na/_dran pa bzhi pa gsum pa dang /_/lnga pa dang ni gnyis mtshan 
[\[245a.4\]]dang /_/nyes pa gnyis dang skabs 'byed dang /_/sems pa 'dug pa langs pa dang /_/khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang /_/smyon pa 'chad dang mang po'o/_/btsun pa dge 'dun gyis skya rengs shar ba'i tshe deng ni bdag cag gi gso sbyong ngo zhes dran par gyur na/_dge 
[\[245a.5\]]slong de dag gis gso sbyong ji ltar bgyi/_deng bdag cag gi gso sbyong ngo zhes sems las tshig tu brjod cing /_'on te de na so sor thar pa klog na bklags pa zhes bya ste/_dge slong de dag gis gso sbyong yang byas mod kyi 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/btsun 
[\[245a.6\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong gi las la rnam pa bzhi ste/_chos bzhin ma yin par byed cing ma 'dus pa dang /_chos bzhin ma yin pa la 'dus pa dang /_chos bzhin la ma 'dus pa dang /_chos bzhin la 'dus pa rnams so zhes gsungs na/_chos bzhin ma yin 
[\[245a.7\]]par byed cing ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/_gang gi tshe so sor thar pa bklag par bya ba de'i tshe mi klog_/gang gis bklag par bya ba des mi klog_/ji ltar bklag par bya ba de ltar mi klog_/ji srid du bklag par bya ba de srid du mi klog pa dang ma 'dus par gyur pa'o/_/chos bzhin 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]ma yin pa la 'dus pa gang zhe na/_gang gi tshe na so sor thar pa bklag par bya ba de'i tshe mi klog pa nas rgyas par ji srid du bklag par bya ba de srid du mi klog cing 'dus par gyur pa'o/_/chos bzhin la ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/_gang gi tshe so sor thar pa bklag par bya ba de'i tshe 
[\[245b.2\]]klog_/gang gis bklag par bya ba des klog_/ji ltar bklag par bya ba de ltar klog_/ji tsam du bklag par bya ba de tsam du bklags pa dang ma 'dus par gyur pa'o/_/chos bzhin la 'dus pa gang zhe na/_gang gi so sor thar pa bklag par bya ba de'i tshe klog pa nas rgyas 
[\[245b.3\]]par ji srid du bklag pa de srid du klog cing 'dus par gyur pa'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa 'phags pas 'phags pa'i skad du so sor thar pa bklags pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes 
[\[245b.4\]]bya ste/_so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/mtha' 'khob pas 'phags pa'i skad du so sor thar pa bklags pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes 
[\[245b.5\]]bya ste/_so sor thar pa klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'phags pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du so sor thar pa bklags pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes mi bya ste/_
[\[245b.6\]]so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du so sor thar pa'i mdo bklags pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes mi bya ste/_
[\[245b.7\]]so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa sa la gnas pa'i grangs nam mkha' la gnas pas bskangs te so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bklags na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa nam mkha' la gnas pa'i grangs sa la gnas pas bskangs te so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bklags na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun 
[\[246a.2\]]pa sa la gnas pa rnams la nam mkhar gnas pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog cing gso sbyong bgyis na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams la sa 
[\[246a.3\]]la gnas pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog cing gso sbyong bgyis na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na 'dug pa dang /_mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug par lhan cig 
[\[246a.4\]]rgyas par bzhir bya'o/_/btsun pa so sor thar pa bklag pa la rnam pa du mchis/_u pA li rnam pa lnga ste/_gsol ba byas nas gleng gzhi bklags te lhag ma rnams thos par zad do zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni so sor thar pa'i mdo bklag pa dang po'o/_/gsol ba byas nas gleng gzhi 
[\[246a.5\]]bklags te phas pham pa bzhi bklags nas lhag ma rnams thos pa'o zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa gnyis pa'o/_/gsol ba byas te gleng gzhi bklags te phas pham pa bzhi bklags/_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum bklags la lhag ma rnams thos 
[\[246a.6\]]pa'o zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni so sor thar pa'i mdo bklag pa gsum pa'o/_/gsol ba byas te gleng gzhi bklags/_phas pham pa bzhi dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang /_mi mngon pa gnyis bklags nas lhag ma rnams thos pa'o zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni so sor 
[\[246a.7\]]thar pa'i mdo bklag pa bzhi pa ste/_rgyas par klog pa dang 'di lnga'o/_/btsun pa gso sbyong gi las la rnam pa du/_u pA li lnga ste/_bklags pa dang /_mi bklag par sems bskyed pa dang /_byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_skabs 'byed pa dang rnam 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]pa lnga'o/_/btsun pa so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pas klog pa'i tshe mtshan gyur na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong phyogs gcig tu mchis pas gnas bzhir so sor thar pa'i mdo bklags la gso sbyong yang bgyis na dge slong de 
[\[246b.2\]]dag 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa'i dge slong de gnas pa'i mtshams su shing ngam/_dbyig pa'am/_re ldes mnan te so sor thar pa'i mdo bklags pa'o/_/btsun pa gnas gcig pa'i 
[\[246b.3\]]mtshams kyi nang du gnas gcig pa'i dge slong rnams kyis phyogs bzhir so sor gso sbyong bgyis na gso sbyong kyang bgyis la/_dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_gcig gi gcig dad pa byin pa'o/_/btsun pa so sor 
[\[246b.4\]]thar pa'i mdo klog pa'i dge slong phyogs gcig tu mchis pa mtshams kyi nang dang mtshams kyi slad rol na gnas pa rnams la so sor thar pa bklags na gso sbyong kyang bgyis la/_dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_/u pA li yod de/_'di 
[\[246b.5\]]ltar yang so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa'i dge slong gis mtshams non te mnan nas mtshams su 'greng ngam 'dug la mtshams kyi nang dang mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pa rnams la so sor thar pa bklags pa'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa lnga 
[\[246b.6\]]las gang yang rung ste/_so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa ma bklags kyang gso sbyong bgyis par 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de skabs 'byed pa'i tshe skabs 'byed pas skabs phye ba'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis tshig tu ma smras kyang gso sbyong bgyis par 'gyur ba 
[\[246b.7\]]mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_sems bskyed pas so/_/btsun pas 'khor rnams ma langs dge slong rnams ni ma dong pa'o zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na 'khor ma langs pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li gang du dge slong bzhi 'am/_de las mang du 'dug par gyur 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]na ma langs pa zhes bya'o/_/bzhir ma tshang na ni langs pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bklags pa dang stan las langs te mchis nas dge slong mchis bzhin du 'tshal bar ma bgyis kyang kun du ltung bar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_
[\[247a.2\]]u pA li yod de/_bshang ba dang gci ba'i sar song ste de na yang thos pa'i nye 'khor las ma 'das pa'o/_/khyim pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis te gso sbyong bgyis na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li gso sbyong ma byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun yang 
[\[247a.3\]]'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/de bzhin du za ma dang /_ma ning dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_mi gnas pa dang /_so sor gnas pa dang /_'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa nas/_sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag ni/_u pA li gso sbyong ma byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun 
[\[247a.4\]]yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /_nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba rnams kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis te gso sbyong bgyis na bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun rnams ni 'das pa 
[\[247a.5\]]dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa smyon pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun rnams ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /_nad kyis gzir ba dang /_'on pas

[\[251b.5\]]pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa chad pa dang bra bas dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li phul ba zhes bya ste/_dge slong de dag ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa dad pa dang skabs dbye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de smras na dad pa 
[\[251b.6\]]dang skabs phye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li phul ba zhes bya ste/_dge slong de dag ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/dad pa dang skabs dbye ba phul nas khyim pa lags par khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma phul ba zhes bya'o/_/de 
[\[251b.7\]]bzhin du ma ning lags par khas blangs pa nas rgyas par sngar 'khrugs pa lags pa'i bar du khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma phul ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dad pa dang skabs 'byed pa 'bul ba'i dge slong dad pa dang skabs dbye ba 'bul ba'i tshe za ma 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]lags par khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs dbye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma phul ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa lags par khas blangs pa dang /_nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba lags par khas blangs na dad pa dang 
[\[252a.2\]]skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa dad pa dang skabs dbye ba len pa'i dge slong gis dad pa dang skabs phye ba blangs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du mchis te khyim pa lags par khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA 
[\[252a.3\]]li ma phul ba zhes mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du ma ning lags par khas blangs pa nas rgyas par sngar 'khrugs pa lags pa'i bar du khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma phul ba zhes mi bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste za ma lags par khas blangs na 
[\[252a.4\]]dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa nas bslab pa stsal ba lags pa'i bar du khas blangs na dad pa dang skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/skabs 'byed pa'i dngos po 
[\[252a.5\]]rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor na/_gru dang nam mkha' gsum pa dang /_/spyod yul the tshom song ba dang /_/mtshan dang gsum pa gnas rnams dang /_/dbyar gsum pa'am de bzhin no/_/btsun pa dge slong gis phur pa la btags pa'i grur dbyar tshul du zhugs na tshul 
[\[252a.6\]]du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste dbyar gyi nang logs su gru btang na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong zhig zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te steng gi nam mkha' 
[\[252a.7\]]las mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_dbyar ma zhig pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li dbyar ma zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis steng gi nam mkha' la dbyar tshul du zhugs na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]pa dge slong gis steng gi nam mkha' la gzhal med khang du dbyar tshul du zhugs na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste gzhal med khang de nas gnas gzhan du mchis na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/
[\[252b.2\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang spyod yul la rten te tshul du zhugs shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong gi spyod yul ma mchis par dbyar tshul du zhugs na tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis spyod yul la 
[\[252b.3\]]brten te dbyar tshul du zhugs par gyur na ci des der zhag bdun du byin gyis rlabs te mchi bar bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_des de nyid la brten nas dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa dge slong gis dbyar tshul du zhugs te bdag tshul du zhugs sam ma zhugs zhes 
[\[252b.4\]]the tshom za zhing dogs par gyur na/_tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste the tshom dang dogs pa las the tshom dang dogs pa bsal ma nus na des slar yang dbyar tshul du 'jug par bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du 'jug par 
[\[252b.5\]]bya'o/_/btsun pa de'i dbyar gyi tshul gang lags/_u pA li snga ma'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis gnas 'dir dbyar gnas par bya'o snyam du song ste des der phyin pa dang skya rengs shar nas dbyar phyi mar gyur na dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du zhugs pa 
[\[252b.6\]]zhes bya ste/_des der tshul du 'jug par bsams pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa dge slong gis gtsug lag khang zhig tu song ste gnas 'dir bdag tshul du 'jug go zhes bsams nas des rkang pa ya gcig ni mtshams kyi nang du bzhag_/rkang pa gcig ni mtshams kyi phyi rol du bzhag 
[\[252b.7\]]pa dang skya rengs shar nas dbyar phyi mar gyur na dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/_des der tshul du 'jug par bsams pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa dge slong gis dbyar tshul du zhugs pa na mtshan gyur na tshul du zhugs pa zhes 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des gnas der gnas par bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du song la gnas par gyis shig_/btsun pa dge slong gis gnas bzhir dbyar tshul du zhugs kyang dbyar tshul 
[\[253a.2\]]du zhugs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar dge slong des gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/_'od ma'am/_re ldes mnan te dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'o/_/de gang du gnas par bgyi/_gang dga' bar ro/_/btsun pa de ste shing ngam/_'od 
[\[253a.3\]]ma'am/_re ldes ni 'jig pa'i chos can du 'gyur na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/des dbyar gang du gnas par bgyi/_gar dga' ba'i gnas gcig tu'o/_/de'i dbyar gang du gtogs sems kyis gang du bsams pa'o/_/lhag ma rnams 
[\[253a.4\]]ni btang ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste phan chad zhag bdun du byin gyis ma brlabs par gnas de nas gnyis por mchis na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis gnas bzhi'am de las mang ba'i gnas rnams mtshams gcig tu 
[\[253a.5\]]bgyis te dbyar tshul du zhugs na gnas de dag thams cad du dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des gang du gnas par bgyi/_gang dga' bar ro/_/btsun pa dge slong gis gnas gcig tu dbyar tshul du zhugs te de slan chad gnas 
[\[253a.6\]]gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi par dbyar tshul du zhugs na zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/gnas gang du/_phyi mar ro/_/btsun pa gang la dbyar gyi tshul snga ma yang ma mchis/_phyi ma yang ma mchis na de'i ming ji skad ces bgyi/_
[\[253a.7\]]u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gang la snga ma dang phyi ma'i dbyar gyi tshul mchis la des kyang zhag bdun du byin gyis ma brlabs par mtshams kyi slad rol du don cig gi slad du mchis te slar mchi bar bsams na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li dbyar zhig pa 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/ci des kyang slar dbyar tshul du 'jug par bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_de'i yi dam las 'gal bas na nyes pa 'chags su chug shig_/btsun pa ji srid du dbyar tshul du 'jug_/u pA li zla ba gsum mo/_/btsun pa gang dbyar slad mar tshul du zhugs 
[\[253b.2\]]par gyur pa des ji ltar tshul nas 'byung bar bgyi/_nam zhugs pa na zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i grangs tshang ba'am/_yang na rkyen cig byung na yang rung ngo //_//mdor na/_skya rengs bsam pa spang ba dang /_/gnas dang shing rta ba lang khyim/_/shing dang grog po 
[\[253b.3\]]phug de bzhin/_/zhig pa 'gro yang de bzhin te/_/sde lnga dang ni bsam pa dang /_/bdun po dang ni mi gnas pa'o/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun 'khrugs nas der yang dge slong gis bsams bzhin du chos kyi phyogs dang /_chos ma lags pa'i 
[\[253b.4\]]phyogs la gnas na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li de ste lta ba sgrogs bzhin pa las skya rengs shar na ni dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gi mdun du dbyar tshul du zhugs shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong gis 
[\[253b.5\]]dge slong ma mchis nas sems bskyed de dbyar tshul du zhugs na dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/_dge slong yod bzhin na ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa dge slong dbyar gyi nang logs su spangs pa de dang lhan cig dbyar gyi 
[\[253b.6\]]gnas su gnas par bgyi'am/_u pA li gnas par bya ste/_skabs phye nas ma gnas shig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni gang dge slong gis gnas 'di na bdag la dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_ma lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong de lta bu dag gis the tshom ma skyes pa dag 
[\[253b.7\]]ni mi skyed/_skyes pa ni sel bar byed pa yod dam med pa'i gnas rtogs la dbyar tshul du zhugs shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_ma lta bu 'dzin pa ma mchis par dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/btsun pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]mchis par dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/de ste btsun pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma mchis na so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa'i dge slong btsal 'tshal lam/_so sor thar pa 'don pa med na dbyar tshul du 'jug tu mi gnang ngo /_/btsun 
[\[254a.2\]]pa shing rta spyod pa'i khyim mam/_ba lang rdzi'i khyim du gnas te dbyar tshul tu 'jug tu rung ngam/_u pA li de ste des 'di snyam du dbyar gnas 'di nas gud du mi 'dong bar des bsams na rung ngo /_/btsun pa de ste tshul du zhugs pa las dong na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA 
[\[254a.3\]]li ma yin no/_/btsun pa shing drung ngam/_ri phrag gam/_phug gam/_spyil bur dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa dge slong gis don zhig gi slad du zhag bdun nam/_bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te mchis pa las de yang dus 'das 
[\[254a.4\]]par gyur na zhag bdun nam/_zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs pa de zhig ces bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_don gzhan gyis zad par gyis shig_/btsun pa dge slong gis zhag bdun na skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas byin gyis brlabs par mchis na dbyar zhig 
[\[254a.5\]]pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste zhag drug gam/_lnga 'am/_bzhi 'am/_gcig nas tshul nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas byin gyis brlabs par mchis na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa 
[\[254a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun du byin gyis rlobs la song shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa gang gis byin gyis brlab par bgyi/_u pA li sde lngas so/_/gang du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/_mtshams kyi nang du'o/_/ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/_
[\[254a.7\]]sems bskyed la tshig tu brjod par bya ste bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mtshams kyi nang gi gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma tshul du zhugs te/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba don 'di lta bu'i phyir mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi bar byin gyis brlabs te/_bdag gi dbyar ni 'di nyid de dbyar ni 'di nyid 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]du gnas so/_/btsun pa gang gi don du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/_u pA li sde bdun gyi phyir ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa stsol cig ces gsungs na/_gang la stsal bar bgyi/_u pA li sde lnga la'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[254b.2\]]'das kyis ni dge 'dun gyi don gyi slad du ni zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa byin cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_dge tshul pha dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_dge bsnyen pha dang /_gnyen gnas dang /_
[\[254b.3\]]'di las slad rol gyi mu stegs can dge sbyong gzhan bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu ba rnams kyi don gyi slad du zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni zhag bzhi bcur bsgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa 
[\[254b.4\]]zhag sum bcu rtsa dgu'am/_zhag sum bcu'am/_zhag nyi shur bsgo bar rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/btsun pa zhag bzhi bcu'i steng du yang zhag sum bcu rtsa dgu'am/_zhag sum bcu'am/_zhag nyi shu'am/_zhag bcu'am/_zhag bdun du bsgo bar rung ngam/_
[\[254b.5\]]u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa zhag sum bcu rtsa dgu'i steng du zhag sum bcu'am/_zhag nyi shu'am/_zhag bcu'am/_zhag bdun du bsgo bar rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa zhag bzhi bcu'i steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/_u pA li 
[\[254b.6\]]mi rung ngo /_/u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na mtshams kyi nang du ni zhag mang du gnas par bya'o/_/mtshams kyi phyi rol du ni zhag nyung du gnas par bya'o/_/btsun pa zhag sum bcu rtsa dgu'i steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa 
[\[254b.7\]]zhag sum bcu'am/_zhag nyi shu'am/_zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/btsun pa zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag bzhi bcur bsgo bar rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtshams kyi nang du 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]ni zhag mang du gnas par bya'o/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du ni zhag nyung du gnas par bya'o/_/btsun pa zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag sum bcu rtsa dgur bsgo bar rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag sum bcu'am/_zhag nyi shu'am/_
[\[255a.2\]]zhag bcu'am/_zhag bdun du bsgor rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/btsun pa zhag bdun gyi steng du yang zhag bdun du bsgor rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/btsun pa dge slong dbyar tshul du zhugs pa las slob dpon dang mkhan po dus bgyis nas des gnas bca' ba ma 
[\[255a.3\]]rnyed de mchis na dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/dbyar gyi dngos po rdzogs so//_//mdor na/_lham gnyis pags pa rnam gnyis dang /_/dom lpags yang na mjug ma dang /_/mal stan mtho dang mal stan che/_/lham 
[\[255a.4\]]yu can dang shing lham mo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lham mi rung ba rnam pa lnga ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa gzhan yang gcan gzan mi srun pa dang /_bal glang ngan pa dang /_rta ngan pa gzhan dag mchis na de dag gi pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar 
[\[255a.5\]]mi bgyi'am/_u pA li lham de dag kyang ma bcang shig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pas bsgos pa'i lham sman ma bor ba chongs shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong khyim pas bor ba'i lham sman ma bcangs kyang nongs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchis 
[\[255a.6\]]sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar yang dge slong des thams cad ri mo can nam/_gser gyis brgyan pa'am/_dngul gyis brgyan pa bcangs pa'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di 
[\[255a.7\]]ltar yang des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phra mo'am/_klus 'jigs par gyur na'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis pags pa ma 'chang shig pags pa'i steng du ma 'dug shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis pags pa'i steng du 'dug pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li ji tsam rkub 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]tsos bzhag par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na nyal ba zhes bgyi/_u pA li lus kyis 'phres pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis pags pa ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong gis pags pa bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_
[\[255b.2\]]u pA li yod de/_na bas ni pags pa chongs shig_/mi na bas ni ma yin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dom gyi pags pa chongs shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa nad pas bcang bar bgyi'am/_'on te mi na bas kyang bcang bar bgyi/_u pA li na ba dang /_mi na 
[\[255b.3\]]ba gnyis kas chongs shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mjug ma lnga las 'jus te klung rgol cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa rkang pa bzhi pa gzhan dag kyang mchis na de dag gis las rgal bar yang rung ngam/_u pA li rgol cig_/btsun pa de ste pho ma mchis na mo'i las rgal bar 
[\[255b.4\]]bgyi'am/_u pA li de ni bar chad cig byung na rgal bar bya'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mal stan mthon por ma 'dug shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa mal stan mthon po'i tshad ji tsam/_bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad las lhag pa ni mal stan mthon 
[\[255b.5\]]po'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la mal stan mtho zhing che ba la ma 'dug ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong mal stan mtho zhing che bar mchis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_lha'i khyim dang /_klu'i khyim dang /_gnod 
[\[255b.6\]]sbyin gyi khyim dang /_rgyal po'i khyim dang /_blon po'i khyim de dag tu stan gzhan med na'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis bzhon pa la 'tshal na nongs pa gsum du 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar yang bzhon pa de mo yin pa dang /_gser gyis brgyan 
[\[255b.7\]]par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ljongs kha ba can du lham yu ba can chongs shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong gis de las gzhan pa'i ljongs su lham yu ba can bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_gang du lham yu 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]ba can med na 'tsho bar mi nus pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis shing lham ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong gis shing lham bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_chu yod pa'i 
[\[256a.2\]]yul chus gang bas shing lham med par 'gro mi nus pa der ro/_/pags pa'i dngos po rdzogs so//_//mdor na/_sman gnyis lan tshwa rnam pa gnyis/_/mar la rnam gnyis de bzhin te/_/sa dang btsos dang bu ram dang /_/'bru mar phan pa tha ma'o/_/
[\[256a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa sman de nyid snga dro'i lags la de nyid slad dro'i yang lags de nyid zhag bdun pa'i yang lags/_de nyid nam 'tsho'i bar du bcang ba lags pa 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_bu ram 
[\[256a.4\]]shing ni snga dro'i'o/_/khu ba ni phyi dro'i'o/_/bu ram ni zhag bdun pa'i'o/_/bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/_/u pA li zho ni snga dro'i'o/_/chu ni phyi dro'i'o/_/mar ni zhag bdun pa'i'o/_/bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/_/u pA li 
[\[256a.5\]]sha ni snga dro'i'o/_/zhag ni zhag bdun pa'i'o/_/bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/_/u pA li 'bru ni snga dro'i'o/_/'bru mar ni zhag bdun pa'i'o/_/bsregs pa'i thal ba ni nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa snga dro ba dang phyi dro ba dang /_zhag bdun pa'i dang /_nam 
[\[256a.6\]]'tsho'i bar gyi sman 'di dag rnams phan tshun 'dres na 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa blangs pa dang /_byin len ma bgyis pa dang /_blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang /_nang du bzhag pa dang /_nang du btsos pa dang /_rang gis btsos pa'i rnams 'tshal 
[\[256a.7\]]du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa dge slong gis snga dro'i dang /_slad dro'i dang /_zhag bdun pa'i dang /_nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman gang lags pa de dag blangs pa dang /_byin len ma bgyis pa dang /_blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang /_nang du bzhag pa dang /_
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]nang du btsos pa dang /_rang gis btsos pa dang /_dge slong gis btsos pa'i rnams 'tshal na cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa dge slong mas snga dro ba'i dang /_slad dro ba'i dang /_zhag bdun pa'i dang /_nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman gang lags pa de dag blangs pa dang /_byin 
[\[256b.2\]]len ma bgyis pa dang /_blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang /_nang du bzhag pa dang /_nang du btsos pa dang /_rang gis btsos pa dang /_dge slong mas btsos pa rnams 'tshal na cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa dge slong gis blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang /_nang du 
[\[256b.3\]]bzhag pa dang /_nang du btsos pa dang /_rang gis btsos pa dang /_dge slong gis btsos pa 'tshal ba na mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur na cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa dge slong mas blangs pa la byin len bgyi ba dang /_nang du bzhag pa dang /_nang du btsos pa dang /_
[\[256b.4\]]rang gis btsos pa dang /_dge slong mas btsos pa 'tshal ba na mtshan 'phos te dge slong phar gyur na cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_btsun pa snga dro ba gang lags pa dang /_slad dro ba gang lags pa dang /_zhag bdun pa gang lags pa dang /_nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman rnams 
[\[256b.5\]]gang lags pa phan tshun 'dres te ma phyed na nam 'tsho'i bar du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ste/_snga dro ba dang /_phyi dro ba dang /_zhag bdun pa de rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bya ba byar mi rung ste/_byin gyis brlab tu mi rung ngo /_/de ste snga dro ba'i dang /_phyi dro ba'i 
[\[256b.6\]]dang /_zhag bdun pa rnams dbye bar nus na byin gyis brlab tu rung ngo /_/btsun pa mi rung ba'i zhag gis lan tshwa btsos nas 'tshal bar bgyi'am/_u pA li mi na bas bza' bar mi bya'o/_/sha las btsos pa'am/_mar las btsos pa'am/_'bru mar las btsos pa yang de bzhin 
[\[256b.7\]]no/_/btsun pa mi rung ba'i lan tshwas 'bru mar ram mar btsos pa 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa mar ram 'bru mar chang dang lhan cig btsos pa 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li bzar rung ngo /_/btsun pa mar ram 'bru mar chang dang lhan cig tu 'dres par gyur pa 'tshal 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa chang gis spangs pa'i sman 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li na ba la ni rung gi mi na ba la ni ma yin no/_/btsun pa mi rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu zhig lhung na 'tshal du rung ngam/_u 
[\[257a.2\]]pA li mi rung ngo /_/mi rung ba'i sa las shing zhig skyes la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na 'tshal du rung ngam/_de ste zhag gcig ma lon par gyur na ni bza' bar bya'o/_/
[\[257a.3\]]rung ba'i sa las shing skyes la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li bzar rung ngo /_/rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la mi rung ba'i sa na mchis pas zhugs sam zhugs lce'am/_zhugs lce chad pas rung bar bgyid na rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_
[\[257a.4\]]bgyis pa zhes brjod dam/_'tshal bar bgyi'am/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la mi rung ba'i sa na mchis pas zhugs su bcug na rung zhes bgyi'am/_bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li ma yin no/_/mi rung 
[\[257a.5\]]ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa na mchis pa zhugs sam/_zhugs lce'am/_zhugs lce chad pas rung bar bgyid na rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li rung bar byas pa zhes bya ste/_bza' bar bya'o/_/mi rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i 
[\[257a.6\]]sa na mchis pas zhugs su stsal na rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_rung bar byas pa zhes bya'o/_/'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li bza' bar bya'o/_/mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gsum mchis la rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis pa'i zhugs lce des bsgral na 'tshal du 
[\[257a.7\]]rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/mi rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gnyis mchis pa dang /_mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gcig mchis pa'i zhugs lce des bsgral na 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gcig mchis 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]la rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis pa de'i zhugs lces bsgral na 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gnyis mchis pa dang /_mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gcig mchis la zhugs lce des bsgral na 'tshal du rung ngam/_
[\[257b.2\]]u pA li bza' bar bya'o/_/rung ba'i sa na sgyed po gsum mchis la rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis na zhugs lce des bsgral na 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/btsun pa dge slong gis sa bon gyi rigs lnga las zhugs sam mtshon tam sen mos rung bar bgyid na rung bar 
[\[257b.3\]]bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_rung bar byas pa zhes bya ste/_rung bar byas pas na bza' bar bya'o/_/mes rung bar byas pa ma gtogs te lhag ma rnams ni bza' bar bya'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis btung ba rnam pa brgyad 'thung shig ces gsungs na/_rtsa ba dang /_
[\[257b.4\]]sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_'bras bu dang /_bsngal bar bsres pa 'di dag 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/btsun pa bu ram chab dgung bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/ji srid du btung bar bgyi/_dngos po ma gyur pa'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa 
[\[257b.5\]]mi rung ba'i sman bu ram du bsgral ba 'tshal bar bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa nad pa'i g.yog ji ltar bgyi/_ston pa'i 'du shes pas sman phan pa dang mthun pas g.yog bya'o/_/btsun pa nad pa la ci stsal bar bgyi/_u pA li rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma 
[\[257b.6\]]gtogs par gang gis nad pa sos par 'gyur ba de dag byin cig/_//mdor na/_'ug pa 'ol ba bya rgod dang /_/bya rog kang ka chu skyar mo/_/mi ro za ba'i bya rnams dang /_/sen mo mchu stobs gang ldan pa'o/_/btsun pa 'ug pa'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li 
[\[257b.7\]]mi rung ngo /_/'ol pa'i sha dang /_bya rgod kyi sha dang /_bya rog gi sha dang /_bya kang ka'i sha dang /_chu skyar mo'i sha dang /_gzhan yang bya mi ro 'tshal ba rnams dang /_sen mo dang mchu stobs dang ldan pa'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo //_//mdor na/_srog 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]chags kan du sha dang pad pa dang /_/srin bu sbal pa'ang de bzhin te/_/sre mo sbrul dang go d+ha dang /_/sbal pa dkar po bong bu rnga mo sram/_/btsun pa srog chags kan du sha'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa pad pa'i sha dang /_sbal 
[\[258a.2\]]pa'i sha dang /_sre mo'i sha dang /_sbrul gyi sha dang /_go d+ha'i sha dang /_sbal pa dkar po'i sha dang /_sram gyi sha dang /_bya rog gi sha dang /_gzhan yang chu na gnas pa dang /_sen mo dang /_mche ba stobs dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan yang mi ro za ba de dag gi sha 
[\[258a.3\]]'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo //_//mdor na/_bal glang dang yang wa dang rta/_/spre'u dang mi yang de bzhin te/_/seng ge stag dang dom dag dang /_/sen mo mche ba gang mthu ldan/_btsun pa bal glang gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun 
[\[258a.4\]]pa rta dang wa'i sha dang /_spre'u'i sha dang /_mi'i sha dang /_seng ge'i sha dang /_stag gi sha dang /_dom gyi sha dang /_gzhan yang rkang bzhi pa sen mo dang mche ba stobs dang ldan pa de dag gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa gang gis sha 'tshal du mi rung ba 
[\[258a.5\]]de'i zhag dang /_'o ma 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/u pA li de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li gang gi sha mi rung ba de'i thams cad kyang mi rung ba'o/_/btsun pa sha rjen 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/bdag gi phyir bsad pa'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/_u pA li 
[\[258a.6\]]mi rung ngo /_/sman gyi dngos po rdzogs so//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_mdor na/_dbyar gnyis phye bar gyur pa'i gnas/_/rnyed dang dge 'dun dag gi gnyis/_/smyon pa chad pa gsum pa dang /_/sbyor ba 'gron pa mang po dbyar/_/btsun 
[\[258a.7\]]pa khyim bdag cig gis dbyar tshul du zhugs pa la chos gos 'di 'bul lo zhes mchi ste/_dbyar gnas pa rnams la chos gos shig phul na de la dbyar gyi zla ba tha mar yang ma gyur la/_gtan pa yang ma bting na gang gis 'thob/_u pA li dbyar gnas pa rnams kyis so/_/
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]btsun pa khyim bdag cig gis chos gos 'di ni dbyar tshul du zhugs pa rnams la 'bul lo zhes mchi ste/_dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge 'dun rnams la phul na der dbyar gyi zla ba yang tha mar gyur la gnas der gtan pa bting na gang gis 'thob/_dbyar gnas pa rnams kyis

[\[258b.3\]]par de dag la phul na gang gis 'thob/_gang la byin pas so/_/btsun pa khyim bdag cig gis dge 'dun la gos shig phul te/_gos 'di ni gnas 'dir sang phod gnas pa'i dge slong de dag la 'bul lo zhes mchi na gang gis 'thob/_gang la byin pas so/_/de bzhin du

[\[258b.6\]]ga la'o/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gis lhung bzed dang chos gos btsal te mchis na de'i dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur na/_de la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal tam/_

[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal tam/_u pA li byin cig_/su la/_gang la bsngos par gyur pa la'o/_/'on te su la'ang bsngos par gyur pa ma mchis na su la stsal/_dge 'dun la'o/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig dge tshul pha lags par 
[\[259a.2\]]khas blangs na/_de la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_sbyin par bya'o/_/de la ji tsam zhig stsal/_dge tshul pha'i skal ba'o/_/de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas dge tshul pha lags par khas blangs na ji tsam stsal bar bgyi/_dge slong gi 
[\[259a.3\]]skal ba'o/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/_de la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_mi sbyin no/_/de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/_de la dbyar gyi rnyed 
[\[259a.4\]]pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_byin cig_/su la/_gang la bsngos par gyur pa la'o/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig ma ning lags par khas blangs pa dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_pha dang /_ma dang /_dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi 
[\[259a.5\]]dbyen bgyis pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs can du song ba dang /_rkun gnas dang /_sngar nyes pa byung ba dang /_sngar 'khrugs pa rnams lags par khas blangs na de dag la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal

[\[259a.7\]]mi gnas pa dang /_so sor gnas pa dang /_nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba rnams lags par khas blangs na/_de dag la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_u pA li mi sbyin no/_/btsun pa de ste dbyar gyi gnas su ring du gnas sam dbyar rangs par gnas pa de 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]dag la khas blangs na de dag la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_u pA li sbyin par bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis gnas bzhi nas chos gos kyi skal ba bdag gir bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar yang dge slong des 
[\[259b.2\]]gnas bzhi char mtshams gcig tu byas nas dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na chos gos rnyed pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li 'di lta ste/_'di ni bdag gi chos gos so snyam nas mig gis mthong bar gyur pa'am/_lag pa'am/_phrag pa'am/_pang 
[\[259b.3\]]par bzhag par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gcig pus dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bdag gir bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar yang dge slong gcig pu gnas par gyur la/_der yang mi dag gis dge 'dun gyi phyir gos 
[\[259b.4\]]phul na'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa btags pa bdag gir bgyis kyang nongs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_dge 'dun la bsngos par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa dge slong smyon pa/_chos gos bged par bsko bar bgyi 'am/_
[\[259b.5\]]u pA li ma yin no/_/sems 'khrugs pa dang /_nad kyis gzir ba dang /_glen pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_'on pa 'ang de bzhin no/_/btsun pa dge slong dmus long chos gos bged par bsko bar bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa smyon pa'i chos 
[\[259b.6\]]gos gang nas bzung ste bsngo bar bgyi/_nam rang gi sems sor chud pa tshun chad do/_/btsun pa smyon pa las chos gos blang bar bgyi'am/_mi blang bar bgyi/_kha cig las ni blang bar bya/_kha cig las ni mi blang bar bya'o/_/gang las blang bar bya/_gang la 
[\[259b.7\]]pha'am/_ma'am/_spun nam/_sring mo gson pa 'am/_rang gi khyim nas byin yang rung ste/_yongs su gtong ba'i 'du shes kyang yod pa'o/_/btsun pa dbyar zhig pa las dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_kha cig la ni sbyin/_kha cig la ni mi sbyin no/_/gang la mi 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]sbyin zhe na/_gang dbyar snga ma'i tshul yang med la/_phyi ma'i tshul yang med par shes pa'o/_/gang la sbyin par bya zhe na/_gang la dbyar snga ma'i tshul yang yod la/_phyi ma'i yang yod par shes pa'o/_/btsun pa nad g.yog gis sbyor ba btang bar gyur 
[\[260a.2\]]te gzhan la yang spro bar bgyis la nad pa dus bgyis na nad g.yog gang la gos stsal bar bgyi/_phyi ma la'o/_/btsun pa nad g.yog mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis pa las nad pa dus bgyis na nad g.yog de la gos stsal bar bgyi'am/_de ste nad pa'i don cig la song bar 
[\[260a.3\]]gyur na de la nad g.yog la gos sbyin par bya'o/_/'on te gzhan gyi don cig la song na ni mi sbyin no/_/btsun pa nad g.yog gnas gzhan du dbyar tshul du zhugs par gyur na/_de la nad g.yog la gos stsal bar bgyi'am/_mi stsal bar bgyi/_sbyin par bya'o/_/btsun 
[\[260a.4\]]pa dge tshul phas nad g.yog bgyis na/_de la nad g.yog la gos stsal bar bgyi'am/_u pA li sbyin par bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong mas nad g.yog bgyis pa las nad pa dus bgyis na de la nad g.yog la gos stsal bar bgyi'am/_mi sbyin no/_/dge slob ma dang /_dge 
[\[260a.5\]]tshul ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/btsun pa 'gron pa mang po bcom pa'i gos rnyed na blang bar bgyi'am/_mi blang bar bgyi/_u pA li de ste tshong pas byin na blang bar bya'o/_/'on te rkun pos byin na de'i tshe mi blang ngo /_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gyi 
[\[260a.6\]]nang logs su dbyar gyi rnyed pa ma 'god cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa khyim bdag cig gis gnas mang zhig nas dge slong dag mgron du bos te gnas gcig tu 'tshal ma 'tshal nas dge 'dun de dag la mngon sum du gos phul na dge slong de dag gis gos bgo bar bgyi'am/_u 
[\[260a.7\]]pA li gos de dag ni rkyen 'byung ba'i gos pas bgo bar bya'o/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig dus bgyis na dge slong de dag gis gos de dag bgo bar bgyi'am/_shi ba'i gos pas na bgo bar bya'o//_//mdor na/_grong gnyis spu can phyi rol mtshams/_/
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]de bzhin du yang mchod rten no/_/mtshams las bsngos par byas pa dang /_/chad pa tha mar gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa grong gi nang na gtsug lag khang zhig mchis la der dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge 'dun rnams don cig gi slad du mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis par gyur pa dang /_de'i 
[\[260b.2\]]mtha' na 'khod pa'i dge slong dag grong khyer gyi mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa las der mi dag gis dge 'dun la dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhig phul na gang gis 'thob/_grong khyer gyi dge 'dun gyis so/_/btsun pa grong khyer du dge 'dun tshul du zhugs nas dbyar gyi nang logs su bye na dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang 
[\[260b.3\]]gis 'thob/_u pA li chos la phyogs pas so/_/btsun pa dge slong gis spu can las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs na byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bgyi'am/_gos gzhan yod na ni byin gyis ma brlab shig_/byin gyis brlabs na ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/btsun 
[\[260b.4\]]pa dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bdag nyid kyis bdag gir bgyis na cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/btsun pa dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge 'dun dbyar gyi nang logs su mchod rten gyi rnyed pa bgos kyang nongs par mi 'gyur zhing rung bar 'gyur ba 
[\[260b.5\]]mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_nyan thos kyi mchod rten la bsngos par gyur pa ni shi ba'i yo byad pas na bgo bar bya'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gum pa'i yo byad mtshams kyi nang na 'khod pas bgo bar gyis shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong gis gum 
[\[260b.6\]]pa'i yo byad byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis na gum pa'i yo byad kyi skal ba stsal tam/_u pA li sbyin no/_/de ste byin gyis ma brlabs par mchis na stsal tam/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa gum pa'i yo byad dang gos byin gyis ma brlabs par dge 
[\[260b.7\]]slong gzhan dag cig mchis na de dag la gum pa'i yo byad kyi skal ba stsal bar bgyi 'am/_u pA li sbyin par bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste byin gyis brlabs nas mchis na stsal bar bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gum pa'i yo byad rnams gsol 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]ba dang las kyis byin gyis rlobs shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa gnas gang na dge slong gcig pu mchis na des ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/_u pA li dge slong des sems bskyed nas tshig tu smra bar bya ste/_bgo ba las rdzas 'di ni bdag gis 'thob pas na 
[\[261a.2\]]bdag gis chos gos 'di bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/bdag gir bya'o/_/'di ni byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/gnas gang na dge slong gnyis sam gsum yang rung gnas na de dag kyang gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o/_/btsun pa gos ma dras pa la byin gyis 
[\[261a.3\]]brlab tu rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa de dang 'dra ba'i rkyen cig byung na rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/gos kyi dngos po rdzogs so//_//mdor na/_rnying pa gnyis dang bzhag pa dang /_/sar pa gtan pa zhigs pa dang /_/zin pa dang ni ma zin pa/_/dus su 
[\[261a.4\]]rnyed dang ma bgos gnyis/_/mi rung mtshams kyi phyi rol dang /_/ma bskos gang zag de bzhin bcu/_/btsun pa gos rnying pa gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gos rnying pa gang zhe na/_gang 
[\[261a.5\]]gis sngar dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting bar gyur pa'o/_/gos rnying pa bcangs pa gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gos rnying pa bcangs pa gang zhe na/_gang dge slong gis spyad pa'o/_/
[\[261a.6\]]btsun pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gos gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/nye bar bzhag pa'i gos gang zhe na/_spangs pa'o/_/btsun pa gos sar pa gtan par bting na bting ba zhes 
[\[261a.7\]]bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/_/gos sar pa gang zhe na/_dge 'dun gyis thog mar gtan par bting ba'o/_/btsun pa gtan pa'i gos gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gtan pa'i gos gang zhe na/_gos gang dbyar tha ma'i zla ba la rnyed pa'o/_/btsun pa gos zhigs pa zhig gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gos 
[\[261b.2\]]zhigs pa gang zhe na/_gos rul pa'o/_/btsun pa gos ma lags pa zhig gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa gos lags pa gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_
[\[261b.3\]]u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dus su rnyed pa'i gos gtan par thing shig ces gsungs na/_dus su rnyed pa'i gos gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes 
[\[261b.4\]]bya'o/_/dus kyi gos gang zhe na/_gos gang zla ba gsum 'das nas de nyid kyi nya bri zhag gcig la rnyed pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gyon pa'i gos gtan par bting na bting ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs na/_ma gyon pa'i gos gang lags/_sar pa btags ma thag 
[\[261b.5\]]pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gyon pa'i gos rung ba gtan par thing shig ces gsungs na/_bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya'o/_/gos ma gyon pa rung ba gang zhe na/_kha dog can no/_/btsun pa mi rung ba'i gos shig gtan par bting na 
[\[261b.6\]]bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/mi rung ba'i gos gang zhe na/_rang gi rgyud kyis mi rung ba'o/_/btsun pa gos sam gtan par bting bar ma bgos pas gtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA 
[\[261b.7\]]li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa mtshams kyi slad rol du bskos pa'i chos gos gtan par 'ding na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba chad 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]pas bcad pas gtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa de bzhin du gtan pa 'ding ba chad pa khor ba dang /_yid mgu bar spyod pa dang /_yid mgu bar spyad pa lags pa dang /_
[\[262a.2\]]bslab pa stsal ba dang /_dbyar ma mchis pa dang /_zhig pa dang /_dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa dang /_dbyar gzhan du gnas pa dang /_smyon pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o//_//
[\[262a.3\]]mdor na/_lnga pa gnyis dang sems gnyis dang /_/shol bor gnyis dang de bzhin te/_/bud med mtshan dang gtan pa dang /_/gnas la rnam pa drug tu bya/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag lnga gtan pa 'ding bar mi bsko ste/_de ni chad pa bgyid pa dang /_chad pa khor 
[\[262a.4\]]ba dang /_yid mgu bar spyod pa dang /_yid mgu bar spyad pa lags pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba rnams so zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa chad pa bgyid pa'i gang zag cig gis gtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa 
[\[262a.5\]]dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa de bzhin du chad pa khor ba dang /_yid mgu bar spyod pa dang /_yid mgu bar spyad pa lags pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba rnams kyis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das 
[\[262a.6\]]pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gzhan yang gang zag lnga gtan pa gding bar mi bsko ste/_dbyar med pa dang /_dbyar zhig pa dang /_dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa dang /_dbyar gzhan du gnas pa dang /_spangs pa rnams so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang 
[\[262a.7\]]gang zag lnga ste/_dbyar med pa dang /_dbyar zhig pa dang /_dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa dang /_dbyar gzhan du gnas pa dang /_spangs pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na bting bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa de ste dbyar ma mchis pas gtan pa bting na gtan pa 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li kha cig ni bting ba zhes bya'o/_/kha cig ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gang gis bting ba lags/_gang gis ma bting ba lags/_u pA li 'di ltar dge tshul pa dbyar tshul du zhugs pa la dbyar phyi ma'i gnas su bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[262b.2\]]te zla ba gsum 'das pas gtan pa bting na de la gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li zla ba gsum 'das nas gtan pa zhes bya ste de yang zla ba gsum du mngon no/_/u pA li gang phyi mar zhugs pa las rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs la de yang zla ba gsum 
[\[262b.3\]]du gnas pa'i dge slong dang lhan cig gtan pa bting na de ni gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/u pA li zla ba gsum lon nas gtan pa bting ba zhes bya ste/_de zla ba gsum ma lon par mngon no/_/btsun pa dbyar zhig pa zhig gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_
[\[262b.4\]]u pA li kha cig ni bting ba zhes bya'o/_/kha cig ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gang gis bting ba zhes bgyi/_gang gis ma bting ba zhes bgyi/_u pA li gang gi dbyar snga mar yang shes pa med la dbyar phyi ma'i tshul kyang med pa ste/_de zla ba gsum du dge slong dang lhan 
[\[262b.5\]]cig gnas pa dang cig char gtan pa bting na de'i gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/u pA li zla ba gsum gnas nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/_de la ni zla ba gsum du shes pa'ang med do/_/u pA li gang dbyar snga mar gnas pa'am/_phyi ma'ang shes la des zhag bdun nam/_
[\[262b.6\]]bzhi bcur byin gyis brlab par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas skya rengs shar ba de yang zla ba gsum du gnas pas gtan pa bting na de'i gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/u pA li zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/_de la yang zla ba gsum du mngon no/_/yi dam 
[\[262b.7\]]las 'gal bas nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa zhig gtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li kha cig ni gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/kha cig ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gang gi gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi/_u pA li gang 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]dbyar snga mar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gtan pa 'ding ba'i dge slong dang /_dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa de dag lhan cig tu gtan pa 'ding na de'i gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/u pA li zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/_de ni zla ba 
[\[263a.2\]]gsum du shes pa'ang med do/_/u pA li dge 'dun thams cad dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs la zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa 'ding na de dag gi gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/u pA li zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/_de dag ni zla ba gsum du mngon no/_/
[\[263a.3\]]btsun pa dbyar gzhan du gnas pa zhig gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li kha cig ni gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/kha cig ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gang gi gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi/_gang gi gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bgyi/_
[\[263a.4\]]u pA li dge slong dag mtshams so sor bcad pa'i gnas na dbyar gzhan du gnas la gzhan du song ste gtan pa bting na de'i gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/u pA li gtan pa gang zhe na/_zla ba gsum gnas nas gtan pa bting ba de la ni zla ba gsum du shes pa yang med do/_/u 
[\[263a.5\]]pA li gang zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dbyar zla ba gsum 'das pa dang /_de nyid kyi nya bri zhag gcig la mtshams chen po bkrol te gnas bzhi'am lnga'i mtshams gcig tu byas nas gtan pa bting na gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[263a.6\]]de bzhin du gnas la gnas gzhan du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa spangs pas gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li kha cig ni bting ba zhes bya'o/_/kha cig ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gang gis gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bgyi/_u pA 
[\[263a.7\]]li dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong gang la dge 'dun 'dus pa rnams kyis spang ba'i las byas pa de dag kyang bzod pa ma gsol bar dbyar gnas pa dag kyang lhan cig gtan pa bting na de'i gtan pa ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/gang gi bting ba zhes bgyi/_u pA li dge slong gang 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]dbyar tshul du zhugs pa la dge 'dun 'dus pa rnams kyis mnyam du mi spyod pa'i sdom pa bcas par gyur tam/_bkar ba'i las byas par gyur la/_des kyang bzod pa gsol na dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang lhan cig tu gtan pa bting na de'i gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[263b.2\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gtan pa 'ding bas gtan pa blangs nas bkru ba dang /_brkyang ba dang /_dra ba dang /_btsem pa thams cad dang khab so tha ma'i bar du thog mar 'gro bar byos la bdag gis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa gding bar bya ba gding ngo /_/
[\[263b.3\]]bdag gis bting ngo zhes sems rnam pa gsum skyed cig_/sems rnam pa gsum bskyed kyang chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa gding bar bya/_bdag gis bting ngo zhes sems rnam pa gnyis bskyed na gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa sems bskyed pa gcig gis 
[\[263b.4\]]gtan pa gding du rung ngam/_u pA li rung ste/_'di ltar yang gtan pa gding ba'i dge slong gis gtan pa gding bar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa gding ngo zhes sems bskyed na gtan pa gding ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa tshul nas 'byung 
[\[263b.5\]]ba'i tshe rgyal pos shol bor na dge slong de dag gis gtan pa ji ltar gding bar bgyi/_ji ltar tshul nas byung ba bzhin no/_/btsun pa gtan pa de nyid rung la de nyid mi rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar yang dge slong de dag kha cig ni shol bor/_kha 
[\[263b.6\]]cig ni shol ma bor bar tshul du zhugs te de nyid du khyim bdag gis shol ma bor ba'i gnas su tshul nas 'byung ba de nyid kyi nya bri zhag gcig la dge 'dun gnyi ga zan byin te gtan pa'i gos phul na gos de shol ma bor ba la ni rung ngo /_/shol bor ba la ni mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa gang 
[\[263b.7\]]ma lta bu'i tshig brgyad po 'di dag gis ni gtan pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la thun mong ba ni du/_thun mong ma lags pa ni du/_u pA li thog ma dang tha ma ma gtogs par lhag ma rnams ni thun mong ba'o/_/btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba'i dge slong gis gtan pa 'ding ba'i 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]tshe mtshan gyur na gtan pa 'ding ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_gtan pa sbed pa'i dge slong dad par byos shig_/btsun pa gtan pa zhes kyang bgyi/_gtan pa 'ding ba zhes kyang bgyi/_gtan pa 'byin pa zhes kyang bgyi na/_btsun pa gtan 
[\[264a.2\]]pa ni gang /_gtan pa 'ding ba ni gang /_gtan pa 'byin pa ni gang lags/_u pA li gos ni gtan pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa ni gtan pa 'ding ba'o/_/ma lta bu'i tshig brgyad po ni gtan pa 'byin pa'o/_/btsun pa dge slong rnams kyis gnas bzhi'am lnga mtshams 
[\[264a.3\]]kyi nang du bgyis nas dbyar tshul du zhugs te de dag tshul nas byung ste/_gtan pa bting na gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste gtan pa bting nas mtshams chen po bkrol te so 
[\[264a.4\]]sor mtshams bkum na gtan pa phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/de ste so sor mtshams bcad nas gtan pa phyung na gnas de dag thams cad du gtan 
[\[264a.5\]]pa phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_gang dag 'byin pa de dag ni gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/_/gang dag mi 'byin pa de dag ni gtan pa ma phyung ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa tshul nas byung ba dang dge slong rnams kyis gnas bzhi'am/_lnga mtshams gcig tu byas 
[\[264a.6\]]nas gtan pa bting na gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste gtan pa bting nas mtshams chen po bkrol te so sor mtshams bkum na gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li 
[\[264a.7\]]ma yin te/_de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste so sor mtshams bkum nas gtan pa phyung na gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_gang 'byin pa de dag ni gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/_/gang mi 'byin pa de 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]dag ni gtan pa ma phyung ba zhes bya'o//_//mdor na/_zla ba gsum dang lnga pa dang /_/gso sbyong gi ni mtha' lnga gsum/_/sbyar ma dang ni ras chen rkyen/_/'byin pa gnyis dang 'byed pa gnyis/_/tshad gnyis pa yang de bzhin te/_/khyim pa dag la sogs pa dag_/bslab pa byin 
[\[264b.2\]]pa tha ma'o/_/btsun pa ji srid cig tu gtan pa gding bar bgyi/_u pA li zla ba gsum ste/_ji ltar zla ba gsum du gnas par tshul du zhugs pa'o/_/btsun pa ji srid cig tu gtan pa bcang bar bgyi/_zla ba lnga'o/_/btsun pa gang dbyar phyi ma'i mthar gtan pa bting ba na de dag kyang zla ba 
[\[264b.3\]]lngar gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ram/_u pA li gang gis gtan pa ji ltar bting bar 'gyur ba de dag gi grangs bzhin zla ba lngar bcang bar bya'o/_/btsun pa gso sbyong gi mthar gtan pa gding bar bgyi'am/_u pA li gso sbyong gi mthar bya'o/_/btsun pa gtan pa gso sbyong gi 
[\[264b.4\]]mthar dbyung bar bgyi'am/_u pA li gso sbyong gi mthar bya'o/_/btsun pa dbyar ma rung bar gzhag pa la rgyu du/_rkyen du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rgyu lnga dang rkyen lnga ste/_lnga po de gang zhe na/_dge slong dang bcas sgo glegs dang bcas pa'i gnas su 
[\[264b.5\]]gyur pa dang /_'jigs pa dang bcas dogs pa dang bcas pa'i yul dang char 'bab pa'am/_char 'bab par dogs par gyur pa dang /_dus ma yin par grong gzhan du 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang /_gnas na gtan pa bting bar gyur pa dang /_gsol ba dang las ni tha 
[\[264b.6\]]ma'o/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi gos ras chen rung bar gzhag pa la rgyu du rkyen du/_u pA li gsum ste/_char pa mi 'bab cing char pa 'bab par mi dogs par gyur pa dang /_dus ma yin par grong gzhan nam grong khyer gzhan nam/_klung rgal 'dod par gyur pa dang /_klung 
[\[264b.7\]]gi drung ngam khron pa'i drung na mi gnas pa'o/_/btsun pa dbyar gyi gos ras chen ji srid du bcang bar bgyi/_zla ba phyed dang lnga'o/_/btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba'i gnas su rkyen med par 'gyur ba du/_u pA li bcu ste/_zhag gcig gis 'bral ba med pa dang /_zhag 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]bcu las 'da' ba med pa dang /_zla ba gcig las 'da' ba med pa dang /_gos ma bsdos pa rnams bcang ba dang /_chos gos stod g.yogs dang mthang gos gnyis pus ljongs spyod du 'gro ba dang /_mang po za ba med pa dang /_yang yang za ba med pa dang /_spyan 
[\[265a.2\]]ma drangs par 'gro ba dang /_gos rnams ci bder tshol ba dang /_ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]nas/_dpyid zla ra ba'i bar du ste/_gang gis rnyed pa thob pa de dag ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/_/btsun pa ci bslab pa'i gnas sam/_chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa de dag ma 
[\[265a.3\]]mchis par 'gyur ram/_u pA li ma yin te/_'di dag ni yon tan no/_/btsun pa gsol ba dang las ma byas pas sngar gtan pa dbyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar yang dge slong gzhi ba de dag gis de nyid kyi nya bri zhag gcig la gtan pa bting 
[\[265a.4\]]bar gyur pa dang /_dge slong glo bur ba mang zhig lhags nas de dag ni de'i nyin mo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lngar gyur te/_gso sbyong byed/_so sor thar pa klog pa dang /_de ste dge slong gzhi ba rnams kyang de dag gi rjes su zhugs nas gso sbyong byas na gsol ba dang las ma byas par gtan pa phyung ba 
[\[265a.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gzhi ba rnams kyis gtan pa bting ste mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis pa dang /_glo bur du dge slong rnams lhags te gtan pa phyung na phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li gang gis gtan pa bting ba de nyid 
[\[265a.6\]]kyis gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dbyar tshul du zhugs pa las dge 'dun bye na gang gis gding /_chos bzhin du smra ba rnams kyis so/_/btsun pa gtan pa bting ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na dbyar gyi rnyed pa sus 'thob/_phyogs gnyis kas so/_/btsun pa de ste 
[\[265a.7\]]mngon sum du gyur pa las rnyed na sus 'thob/_chos kyi phyogs kyis so/_/btsun pa tshad las chung ba'i chos gos dum bur sbyar te gos su btsems shing /_gtan par bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa tshad las chung 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]ba zhig gtan par bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gos ji lta bus gtan pa gding bar bgyi/_u pA li mchur lnga zheng du gsum pas so/_/btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba khyim pa zhig gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting 
[\[265b.2\]]ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/de bzhin du gtan pa 'ding ba ma ning dang /_mi gnas pa dang /_so sor gnas pa nas/_sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u 
[\[265b.3\]]pA li ma bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba za ma zhig gis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba 
[\[265b.4\]]dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /_nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba rnams kyis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba smyon pa zhig gis gtan pa 
[\[265b.5\]]bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma bting ba zhes bya'o/_/de ste dge slong gi 'du shes yod la bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'ding ngo /_/bdag gis bting ngo zhes sems bskyed na gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa 
[\[265b.6\]]dang /_nad kyis gzir ba rnams su shes par bya'o/_/btsun pa gtan pa gding ba glen pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_'on pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa gtan 
[\[265b.7\]]pa 'ding ba gzhan du gnas pas gtan pa bting na gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bting ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gtan pa'i dngos po rdzogs so//_//mdor na/_gang du gang gis mtshams bzhi dang /_/bsgo ba gos dang 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]gso sbyong bzhi/_/gtan bzhi bye ba gang zag go/_/btsun pa yul kau shAm+bIr dge 'dun gang gi tshe bye bar gyur/_nam mtshams kyi nang na gcig pu gnas pa las gso sbyong byed pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi don rnams tha dad par byas pa na'o/_/
[\[266a.2\]]btsun pa yul kau shAm+bIr dang por dge 'dun gang gis phye/_chos ma yin par smra bas de dag gis thog mar mtshams kyi nang du gso sbyong dang /_dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi don rnams tha dad par byas pas so/_/btsun pa yul kau shAm+bI bas mtshams bshig na 
[\[266a.3\]]mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa de ste yul yangs pa can na gnas pas mtshams bshig na mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bye nas phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su gnas pa la 
[\[266a.4\]]zla ba phyed phyed cing lung dbog pa dang bstan par bgyi'am/_'di skad du sring mo rnams je mthun par gyis zhes sgo shig_/btsun pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bye nas phyogs su gnas pa'i dge slong ma dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing lung dbog cing bstan pa btsal bar bgyi'am/_
[\[266a.5\]]btsal bar bya'o/_/su las btsal/_chos la phyogs pa las so/_/btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bye nas phyogs gnyis su gnas pa dag gis dge slong ma dag la lung dbog cing bstan pa stsal bar bgyi'am/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mi bye ba'i phyir byin cig_/btsun 
[\[266a.6\]]pa yul kau shAm+bIr phyogs gnyis ka 'dus shing 'khod par byed na gzu bos gang du dge slong ma la lung dbog par bgyi/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba'o/_/btsun pa yul kau shAm+bIr phyogs gnyis kar 'dus shing 'khod par gyur la/_dge slong gzu bo dag kyang mtshams kyi slad 
[\[266a.7\]]rol du mchis par gyur pa dang /_khyim bdag cig mchis nas dge 'dun la gos shig phul na gang gis 'thob/_phyogs gnyis kas so/_/yul kau shAm+bI na gnas pas yul yangs pa can na gnas pa dag dang lhan cig gso sbyong bgyid na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]pA li ma yin no/_yul yangs pa can na gnas pas yul kau shAm+bIr gnas pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na/_gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/gzu bo rnams yul kau shAm+bI na gnas pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na gso sbyong bgyis pa 
[\[266b.2\]]zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/gzu bo dag yul yangs pa can na gnas pa dang lhan cig gso sbyong bgyid na gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de ste byed na gzu bo'i dngos po med do/_/btsun pa gtan pa bting ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye 
[\[266b.3\]]na gtan pa gang gis gding bar bgyi/_chos su smra ba dag gis so/_btsun pa gtan pa 'ding ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na gtan pa gang gis dbyung bar bgyi/_chos su smra ba rnams kyis so/_/btsun pa gang nye bar phyogs pa de thams cad so sor gnas pa lags

[\[266b.5\]]yin pa ni gang dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par gyur pa ste/_ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis spangs par ma gyur pa dang /_slar las ma byas pa'i phyir spangs par ma gyur pa dang /_sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par ma gyur pa'o/_/so sor gnas la nye bar ma

[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]ma yin la so sor gnas pa'ang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de lta bu dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/gang nye bar phyogs pa de thams cad mi gnas pa lags sam/_nye bar phyogs la mi gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod mi gnas la nye bar ma phyogs pa yang yod/_nye bar yang

[\[267a.7\]]phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar gyur gyi ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis spang ba ma byas par gyur cing slar las ma byas pa dang /_sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par ma gyur pa'o/_/mi gnas la so sor yang gnas pa ni de 'di ltar dge 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]slong de ma mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa yang yin la/_phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar gyur pa'o/_/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin so sor gnas pa yang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de lta bu ma gtogs pa'o/_/btsun pa dge slong nyid kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'byed kyi/_

[\[269a.1\]]bzhin ma yin par mthun la ma 'dus pa dang /_chos bzhin ma yin par mthun la 'dus pa dang /_chos bzhin du mthun la ma 'dus pa dang /_chos bzhin du mthun la 'dus pa'o/_/chos bzhin ma yin par mthun la ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/_sngar las

[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun rnams ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa chad pa khor ba zhig gis dad pa blangs nas las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge slong de dag ni

[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_dad pa byin pas so/_/btsun pa las bgyid pa'i dge slong gnas gcig na mchis pas gang zag bzhi la las bgyis na las de yang bgyis par 'gyur la dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par 
[\[270a.2\]]yang mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar las byed pa'i dge slong de mtshams mnan mtshams bzung nas mtshams su 'greng ngam 'dug nas mtshams kyi nang du gnyis 'dug_/mtshams kyi phyi rol du gnyis 'dug pa la las byed pa'o//_//mdor 
[\[270a.3\]]na/_mngon sum gyur dang snga ma dag_/las rnams gsum dang shi ba dang /_mi spyad dang ni bde ba mtshams/_/nyes pa las kyang de bzhin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni mngon sum du gyur pa la las rnams gyis shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge 'dun
