[\[270a.5\]]dge 'dun gyis dge slong la smyon pa'i sdom pa byin par gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa sngar las bsgrags te phyis gsol ba bgyis na bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge slong de dag ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa bdag nyid kyis 
[\[270a.6\]]bdag nyid spangs na spangs pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa bdag nyid spangs te bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid la bzod par bgyis na bzod pa bgyid pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bzod pa byas pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa 
[\[270a.7\]]la bsdigs pa'i las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de bzhin du smad pa'i las bgyis pa la smad pa'i las bgyid pa dang /_bskrad pa'i las bgyis pa dang /_slar bsdum pa'i las bgyis pa dang /_ma mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa'i las bgyis 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]pa dang /_slar gyi las ma bgyis pa dang /_sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang ba'i phyir spang ba'i las bgyis pa dang /_chad pas bcad pa la chad pa'i dang /_yid mgu ba'i spyod pa la yid mgu ba'i dang /_dbyung ba'i phyir las bgyis pa la dbyung ba'i phyir las bgyid na 
[\[270b.2\]]las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la smad pa'i las bgyid/_bskrad pa'i dang /_slar bsdum pa'i dang /_ma mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa dang /_slar gyi las ma bgyis pa dang /_sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang 
[\[270b.3\]]ba'i phyir spang ba'i las dang /_chad pas bcad pa'i dang /_yid mgu ba'i dang /_dbyung ba'i las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du las thams cad kyang 'khor lo'i rgyud bzhin du bya'o/_/btsun pa bsdigs pa'i 
[\[270b.4\]]las su 'os pa zhig la smad pa dang /_bskrad pa dang /_slar bsdum pa'i las rnams bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/_sma dbab pa'i las so/_/btsun pa bsdigs pa'i las su 'os pa zhig la ma mthong ba'i slad du spangs 
[\[270b.5\]]pa dang /_slar las ma bgyis pa dang /_sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang ba'i slad du spang ba'i las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li sma dbab pa'i las ni gzhan no/_/spang ba'i las ni gzhan no/_/
[\[270b.6\]]btsun pa bsdigs pa'i las su 'os pa zhig la chad pas bcad pa dang /_yid mgu ba dang /_dbyung ba'i las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sma dbab pa'i las ni gzhan no/_/rnam par dag 
[\[270b.7\]]pa'i las ni gzhan no/_/btsun pa ma mthong ba'i slad du spang ba'i las su 'os pa zhig la slar las ma bgyis pa dang /_sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang ba'i slad du spang ba'i las shig bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag thams cad ni spang ba'i las so/_/btsun pa ma mthong ba'i phyir spang ba'i las su 'os pa zhig la bsdigs pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bskrad pa dang /_slar bsdum pa'i las shig bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_
[\[271a.2\]]u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li spang ba'i las ni gzhan/_sma dbab pa'i las ni gzhan no/_/btsun pa ma mthong ba'i slad du spang ba'i las su 'os pa zhig la chad pas bcad pa dang /_yid mgu ba dang /_dbyung ba'i las bgyis 
[\[271a.3\]]na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li spang ba'i las ni gzhan/_rnam par dag pa'i las ni gzhan no/_/btsun pa chad pas gcad par 'os pa zhig la yid mgu ba dang /_dbyung ba'i las bgyis 
[\[271a.4\]]na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li 'di dag thams cad ni rnam par dag pa'i las so/_/btsun pa chad pas gcad par 'os pa zhig la bsdigs pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bskrad pa dang /_slar bsdum pa'i 
[\[271a.5\]]las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li rnam par dag pa'i las ni gzhan/_sma dbab pa'i las ni gzhan no/_/btsun pa chad pas gcad par 'os pa zhig la ma mthong ba'i phyir spang ba'i las 
[\[271a.6\]]bgyis sam/_slar gyi las ma bgyis pa dang /_sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang ba'i slad du spang ba'i las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li rnam par dag pa'i las ni gzhan/_spang ba'i 
[\[271a.7\]]las ni gzhan no/_/btsun pa las gzhan gyis gsol ba bgyis la las gzhan gyis bsgrags na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni gang zag 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]byis pa dang /_glen pa dang /_mi gsal ba dang /_mi mkhas pa dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_tshig mi brtan pa dang /_yi dam las nyams pa dang /_sngon nyes pa byung ba dang /_sngar 'khrugs pa dang /_smyos pa dang rnam pa bcus 'khrugs kyang 'khrugs par mi 
[\[271b.2\]]'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa de ste chos bzhin ma lags par bgyid cing de dag kyang slar bzlog_/slar dkrugs te/_de dag gis slar bzlog slar dkrugs na slar dkrugs pa mi brtsan nam/_u pA li brtsan te/_ngas chos bzhin gyi las la 
[\[271b.3\]]dgongs te gsungs pas na/_gang la chos bzhin gyi las byed pa de la slar bzlog pa dang dkrugs pa ni mi brtsan no/_/btsun pa gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las bsko ba'i tshe dang bsnyen par rdzogs par rigs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa'i tshe dang /_dbyung bar 
[\[271b.4\]]rigs pa la byin pa'i tshe slar bzlog cing slar dkrugs te bdag la las ma byed cig ces mchi na de dag gis slar bzlog pa dang /_slar dkrugs pa mi brtsan nam/_u pA li brtsan no/_/chad pa'i las ni ngas dgongs te gsungs so/_/btsun pa las bgyid pa zhig las 
[\[271b.5\]]bgyid pa'i tshe dus las 'das na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li de ste las mang du byas la de yang dus las 'das na las byas pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa nye bar phyogs pa dang lhan cig kun du spyad par bgyi'am kun du mi spyad par bgyi/_u pA li nye bar phyogs 
[\[271b.6\]]pa dang lhan cig kun tu mi spyad par bya'o/_/btsun pa spangs pa de grogs zhes bgyi'am/_grogs ma lags pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li spangs pa thams cad ni grogs ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la bzod pa stsol 
[\[271b.7\]]cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa gang du bzod pa stsal bar bgyi/_mtshams kyi nang du'o/_/ji ltar bzod pa gsol bar bgyi/_spu 'greng ba nyal bzhin du dge 'dun la spu bsnyal te 'byung bar rtsol zhing phyag 'tshal bar ston mtshams kyi nang du 'dug nas bzod pa gsol te 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]nyes pa mthong ba'o/_/btsun pa su gang la dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum du bsgo yang slar ma btang ba de dag thams cad nongs par 'gyur ram/_su gang la nongs par byung ba de dag thams cad kyang lan gsum du bsgo bar bgyi'am/_su gang zhig dge 
[\[272a.2\]]'dun gyi nang du lan gsum du bsgo yang slar ma btang ba de dag thams cad la nyes par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa nongs pa byung yang de dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum du bsgo mi 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_bsgo ba'i rigs pa zhig bsgo bar 'os 
[\[272a.3\]]pa ma gtogs par de las nyes pa gzhan byung ba'o/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni chos gang dang ldan pa'i dge slong de la sma dbab pa'i las dang spang ba'i las dang /_rnam par dag pa'i las rnams bya'o zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa de ste dge slong ma la yang 
[\[272a.4\]]de lta bu'i chos dang ldan par gyur na de dag la yang las de rnams bgyi'am/_u pA li bya'o/_/btsun pa de ste dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_dge tshul pha rnams chos de dag dang ldan par gyur na/_de dag la yang las de rnams bgyi'am/_u pA li rnam 
[\[272a.5\]]par dag pa'i las ma gtogs par las gzhan rnams ni bya'o//_//mdor na/_smyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang /_/'on glen gnyid log ra ro ba/_/myos pa snyoms zhugs 'gro ba mtshan/_/ma ning dag la sogs pa dang /_/bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/_/btsun 
[\[272a.6\]]pa smyon pa la las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li smyon pa la sdom pa byin pa ma gtogs pa'i las lhag ma rnams ni de ste slar dge slong du 'du shes yod cing las 'di ni bdag la byed do bar shes na las byas pa zhes bya'o/_/sems 'khrugs pa dang /_nad 
[\[272a.7\]]kyis gzir ba dang /_glen pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_'on pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/btsun pa gnyid log pa zhig la las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li de ste lus sam ngag gis dmigs nas gsol ba dang las bya ba'i tshe gnyid kyis log na 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]las byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du myos pa dang /_ra ro ba dang /_snyoms par zhugs pa rnams la yang brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa zhig la las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li lhung bzed khas dbub pa ma gtogs te las 
[\[272b.2\]]lhag ma rnams ni byas pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gang la las bgyi ba de'i mtshan gyur na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa ma ning zhig la las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[272b.3\]]du dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas/_sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa za ma zhig la las bgyid na las bgyid pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma byas pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /_nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab pa 
[\[272b.4\]]stsal ba rnams la las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o//_//mdor na/_smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang /_/na ba 'on pa glen pa dang /_/khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang /_/bslab pa 
[\[272b.5\]]byin dang mtshan de bzhin/_/btsun pa las bgyid pa smyon pa zhig gis las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am ma bgyis pa zhes bgyi/_u pA li de ste dge slong du 'du shes slar rnyed cing gsol ba byas te las ma nyams na byas pa zhes bya'o/_/sems 'khrugs pa 
[\[272b.6\]]dang /_nad kyis gzir ba dang /_glen pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_'on pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/btsun pa las bgyid pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa zhig gis las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du las bgyid pa khyim pa dang /_za ma dang /_
[\[272b.7\]]ma ning dang /_lhan cig mi gnas pa dang /_so sor gnas pa nas sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag gis las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /_nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]rnams kyis las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa las bgyid pas las bgyis pa na mtshan 'phos na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byas pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[273a.2\]]ji ltar las byed pa de bzhin du grangs su bskang bas kyang brjod par bya'o/_/las kyi dngos po ste dmar skya'i dngos po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor na/_chad pa rnam pa bdun du byas/_/gnas gsum dang ni mu stegs can/_/bsgrags pa dang ni nyes pa dang /_/mtshan 
[\[273a.3\]]dang sbyin pa ma yin pa'o/_/btsun pa gang zag de nyid chad pa bgyid pa lags la de nyid chad pa khor ba yang lags/_de yid mgu bar spyod pa lags la gang zag de nyid kyis yid mgu bar spyod pa yang lags par 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar gang 
[\[273a.4\]]zag yid mgu bar spyad pa las dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung ste/_de dge 'dun la yid mgu bar bya ba gsol te dge 'dun gyis de la yid mgu bar bya ba byin te de yid mgu bar bya ba spyod pa na de yang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa gnyis byung ste/_gcig ni zhag gcig 
[\[273a.5\]]tu bcabs pa/_gcig ni zhag gnyis su bcabs nas des nyes pa de dag gi phyir dge 'dun las chad par bya bar gsol ba dang /_de la dge 'dun gyis kyang chad par byed pa byin no/_/des zhag gcig tu chad pa byas te/_de'i nyes pa gcig gi chad pa ni byas so/_/
[\[273a.6\]]gnyis pa'i chad pa ni byed/_gsum du ni yid mgu bar bya ba spyod/_bzhi pa ni yid mgu bar spyad pa'o/_/btsun pa chad pa bgyid pa'i rigs pa zhig la yid mgu ba bgyid pa stsal na stsal ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li byin pa zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 
[\[273a.7\]]'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa chad pa bgyid pa'i rigs pa'i gang zag gcig phyung na phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li phyung ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa yid mgu ba bgyid par rigs pa'i gang zag la chad pa 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]bgyid pa stsal na stsal ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_dge 'dun la yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa yid mgu ba bgyid par rigs pa'i gang zag gcig phyung na phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li phyung ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas

[\[273b.4\]]pa'i dge slong de gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/_dbyig pa'am/_re ldes mnan te las byed na rung ngo /_/btsun pa las bgyid pa'i gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/_dbyig pa'am/_re ldes mnan te gsol ba gcig dang /_las gcig gis gang zag bzhi la 
[\[273b.5\]]chad pa bgyid pa dang /_yid mgu bar bgyid pa dang /_dbyung ba'i las rnams bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li mtshams gcig pa la mang pos mang po la las byar mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa dge slong zhig 
[\[273b.6\]]gis mtshams gcig na gnas shing lhan cig tu 'khod pa'i dge slong de dag ma mchis bzhin du chad pa bgyid pa dang /_yid mgu bar bgyid pa dang /_dbyung ba'i las bgyid kyang nongs par mi 'gyur la des dge 'dun la yang mi mthun par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u

[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar las byed pa'i dge slong des mtshams mnan mtshams bzung ste mtshams su 'greng ngam 'dug kyang rung gnyis ni mtshams kyi nang du bzhag gnyis ni mtshams kyi phyi rol du bzhag ste byed pa'o/_/btsun pa

[\[274a.6\]]pA li yod de/_'di ltar dge slong de thun mong ma yin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma zhig byung bar gyur la/_de'i mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur na/_de la dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las ni byung gi nyes byas kyi ltung ba ni bshags par bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong

[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]'phos te dge slong phar gyur na dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las ni byung gi nyes byas kyi ltung ba ni bshags par bya'o/_/btsun pa dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nongs pa las byung bzhin slar yang nongs pa de bshags par 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_'di ltar yang dge slong

[\[274b.6\]]bgyi ba stsal bar rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa bslab pa stsal ba la chad par bgyi ba dang /_yid mgu bar bgyi ba stsal bar rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo //_//mdor na/_nyes dang de bzhin mtshan mo dang /_/skad rnams dang yang bzhi pa dang /_/
[\[274b.7\]]lus dang dben dang de bzhin sngags/_/bzhi pa gnyis dang sbyangs pa'o/_/btsun pa nongs pa dang bcas pas dge slong la chad pa bgyi ba dang yid mgu bar bgyi ba stsal bar rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_btsun pa nongs pa dang bcas pa las chad par 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]bgyi ba'am/_yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyad du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/de bzhin du grangs su skong ba yang brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa chad pa bgyid pa gzhi gnas gcig na chad pa bgyid dam yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyod du rung ngam/_u pA li

[\[275a.3\]]yin no/_/btsun pa 'phags pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du dge slong la nongs pa smras pa dang /_dge slong des kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na smras pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/bcabs par 'gyur ram/_u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 'phags 
[\[275a.4\]]pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dge slong la nongs pa smras pa dang /_dge slong des kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na smras pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dge slong la nongs pa smras pa dang /_
[\[275a.5\]]dge slong des kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na smras pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/bcabs par 'gyur ram/_u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du dge slong la nongs pa smras pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[275a.6\]]des kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na smras pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/bcabs par 'gyur ram/_u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa nongs pa lus kyis dmigs shing ston na smras pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa dben pa la mi 
[\[275a.7\]]dben par 'du shes nas smras na smras pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/bcabs par 'gyur ram/_u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge slong zhig gis sman nam sngags kyis bdag mi snang bar bgyis te nongs pa smras na smras pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]bcabs par 'gyur ram/_u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa sa la gnas pa dag gis nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams la chad pa bgyi'am yid mgu bar bgyid pa'am/_dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa nam 
[\[275b.2\]]mkha' la gnas pa dag gis sa la gnas pa rnams la chad pa bgyi ba'am/_yid mgu bar bgyi'am/_dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyid na bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa sa la gnas pa dag gis nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyi 
[\[275b.3\]]grangs su bskangs te chad par bgyi ba'am yid mgu bar bgyi ba'am/_dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa nam mkha' la gnas pa dag gis sa la gnas pa rnams kyi grangs su bskangs te chad pa 
[\[275b.4\]]bgyi ba'am/_yid mgu bar bgyid pa'am/_dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dang mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pa rnams su lhan cig rnam pa bzhir byos shig/_//
[\[275b.5\]]'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po nyi shu pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum po 'di rnams las khu ba las byung ba zhag gcig bcabs pa nas/_tshig bka' blo mi bde ba las byung ba zhag 
[\[275b.6\]]bcu gsum bcabs pa'i bar du ste/_btsun pa nongs pa bcu gsum po de dag dus tha dad pa mi 'dra bar bcabs pa'i rnams la gsol ba gcig dang /_las gcig gis chad pa bgyid du stsal bar rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/btsun pa chad pa khor nas yid mgu bar bgyid 
[\[275b.7\]]du stsal bar rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyad lags pa las dbyung ba stsal du rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_/btsun pa dge 'dun lhag ma nongs pa mang po mi 'dra ba las byung ba'i rnams gsol ba gcig dang las gcig gis dus gcig tu gzhan 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]la chad pa bgyid pa dang /_gzhan la yid mgu bar bgyi ba dang /_gzhan la dbyung ba stsal du rung ngam/_u pA li mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa dge 'dun gyi lhag ma nongs pa mang po mi 'dra ba las byung ba'i rnams gsol ba gcig dang /_las gcig gis dus

[\[276a.3\]]pa dag la sogs pa dang /_/bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/_/btsun pa smyon pa zhig gis nongs pa smras na smras pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/bcabs par 'gyur ram/_u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /_nad kyis gzir ba

[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]dang /_mi gnas pa dang /_so sor gnas pa dang /_nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba rnams la nongs pa smras na smras pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li smras pa zhes bya'o/_/bcabs par 'gyur ram/_u pA li mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge slong gis nongs pa smra ba

[\[277a\]]

[\[279b.7\]]nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams par byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams par ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/_/chos bzhin ma yin 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]pa dgu dang /_chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa dgu po gang zhe na/_lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang /_lhag ma med pa 
[\[280a.2\]]byas pa la gzhi med pa dang /_lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang /_lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang /_lhag ma yod pa dang lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa 
[\[280a.3\]]dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pas gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/_/lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa 
[\[280a.4\]]byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang /_lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang /_lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang /_lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang /_lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang /_lhag ma

[\[280a.6\]]bcu gang zhe na/_phas pham pa yin/_phas pham pa'i gtam la zhugs pa yin/_tshul khrims nyams pa yin/_lta ba nyams pa yin/_spyod pa nyams pa yin/_'tsho ba nyams pa yin/_bslab pa phul ba yin/_bslab pa phul ba'i gtam la zhugs pa yin/_dge 'dun la dpyas 
[\[280a.7\]]'dogs pa yin/_dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa'i gtam la zhugs pa yin no/_/de la ji ltar na phas pham pa yin zhe na/_gang gi rnam pa dang /_gang gi tshul dang /_gang gi mtshan mas dge slong phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ba de'i rnam pa dang /_de'i tshul dang /_de'i mtshan mas dge slong 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung bar mthong ba yin no/_/de des mthong bas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa yin te de ltar phas pham pa yin no/_/ji ltar na phas pham pa'i gtam la zhugs pa yin zhe na/_ji ltar yang de ni gtsug lag khang ngam/_gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol yang 
[\[280b.2\]]rung /_dge slong mang po 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa'i rnams kyang de las byung ba de dang mthun pa de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yin te/_dad pa las thos kyang rung bdag rang rnam pa la dogs pa skyes kyang rung ste/_de des thos pa dang dogs pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 
[\[280b.3\]]'gog pa'o/_/ji ltar na tshul khrims nyams pa yin zhe na/_phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung phas pham pa shin tu 'das par gyur pa'o/_/ji ltar na lta ba nyams pa yin zhe na/_lta ba drug bcu rtsa gnyis las gang yang rung ste lta bar gyur pa rab tu thob pa yin no/_/ji ltar na spyod pa 
[\[280b.4\]]nyams par gyur pa yin zhe na/_mi spyad pa'i rnams spyod pa ste/_dge slong gi bslab pa rnams la mi slob pa'o/_/ji ltar na 'tsho ba nyams pa yin zhe na/_'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/ji ltar na bslab pa phul ba yin zhe na/_gang gi rnam pa dang /_gang gi tshul dang /_gang gi 
[\[280b.5\]]mtshan mas dge slong bslab pa 'bul ba de'i rnam pa dang /_de'i tshul dang /_de'i mtshan mas dge slong du mthong ba yin te/_de des mthong nas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/_/ji ltar na bslab pa phul ba'i gtam la zhugs pa yin zhe na/_ji ltar yang de ni 
[\[280b.6\]]gtsug lag khang ngam/_gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol na'ang rung dge slong rnams 'dus te 'khod pa de dag kyang de las byung ba de dang mthun pa de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yin te/_dad pa las thos kyang rung bdag nyid rnam pa la dogs pa skyes kyang rung ste/_de des thos pa dang de'i dogs 
[\[280b.7\]]pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/_/ji ltar na dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa yin zhe na/_gang gi rnam pa dang /_gang gi tshul dang /_gang gi mtshan mas dge slong dge 'dun la smod pa de lta bu'i rnam pa dang /_de lta bu'i tshul dang /_de lta bu'i mtshan mas dge 'dun la 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]smod pa'i dge slong du mthong ba yin te/_de des mthong nas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/_/ji ltar na dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa'i gtam la zhugs pa yin zhe na/_ji ltar yang de ni gtsug lag khang ngam/_gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol na'ang rung /_

[\[281a.3\]]pa'o/_/chos bzhin bcu po 'di dag bzlog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin par sbyar bar bya'o/_/gso sbyong dgag pa'i dngos po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor na/_dge tshul lor ma lon pa gcig_/kha dog ngan dang gnas de bzhin/_/ma bskos pa dang phyag bya ba/_/mngon sum rngul zan med 
[\[281a.4\]]pa'o/_/btsun pa dge tshul pha nyi tshe dbyar tshul du zhugs na de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de dag gis mal stan blang bar bgyi'am/_u pA li blang bar ni bya'o/_/btsun pa lo ma lon pa dag cig nyi tshe dbyar tshul du zhugs na de dag gis mal stan bgo bar 
[\[281a.5\]]bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de dag gis mal stan blang bar bgyi'am/_u pA li blang bar ni bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bzhi dbyar tshul du zhugs na de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de dag gis

[\[281a.7\]]nyid spyad pas nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_gang zag gi mal stan kha dog ngan par ma bsgyur ba'am/_kha tshar ring ba spyad na nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi spyad na nyes pa med do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]gnas gzhan du khyer zhing ma spyod cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan gnas gzhan du 'tshal te spyad na cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/bar chad brgyad las gang yang rung ste/_bar chad gcig byung bar gyur pa dang /_gnas de nyid du mal stan bsrung bar mi 
[\[281b.2\]]nus pa dang /_gnas der mi gnas par sdom pa bcas pa la ni nyes pa med do/_/btsun pa ma bskos pas mal stan bgo bar bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan de nyid spyad na nongs par 'gyur ba dang /_de nyid spyad pas nongs par mi 'gyur ba 
[\[281b.3\]]mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_spu phyir bzlog ste gyon na nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/_/bting na nyes pa med do/_/rngul zan med par gyon na nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/_/rngul zan dang bcas par gyon na nyes pa med do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad du nye bar phyogs pa dang gnas 
[\[281b.4\]]par mi bya'o zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa ci nye bar ma phyogs pas nye bar phyogs pa rgan pa la'ang phyag bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin te/_nye bar phyogs pa thams cad kyis nye bar ma phyogs pa rnams la phyag byos shig_/dge slong rnams kyi tha mar gzhag go/_/btsun pa ci de dag la mal

[\[281b.6\]]la ni byin cig_/su la mi stsal/_song nas phyir mi 'ong ba la ni ma byin cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi rdzas rngul zan ma mchis par ma spyad cig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi rdzas rngul zan ma mchis par spyad kyang nongs par 
[\[281b.7\]]mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_ji ltar yang de ni khyim bdag cig gis g.yog pa'am bgo ba zhig rngul zan med par spyad par dge 'dun la phul ba yin no//_//mdor na/_kun dga' bo dang gang zag dang /_/de ltar phyag dang rung ba dang /_/tha ma dbyar du gnas pa dang /_/
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]sum cha 'bri ba de bzhin te/_/khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang /_/bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo khyod kyis mal stan lhag ma'i rnams gos shig ces gsungs na/_lhag pa gang lags/_gang gcig dang gnyis po'i phyogs

[\[282a.3\]]dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dang /_gzhi ba rnams ji ltar rgan rims bzhin phyag byos shig ces gsungs na/_btsun pa de ste chad pa bgyid pa'i dge slong rgan pa la'ang phyag bgyi'am/_u pA ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li phyag bya ba'i mi rigs pa thams cad la 
[\[282a.4\]]phyag mi bya ste/_khon yod pa ni ma gtogs so/_/u pA li dge 'dun gyi nang na phyag bya ba'i mi rigs pa'i gang zag rnams gang zhe na/_bsdigs pa'i las byas pa dang /_smad pa'i las byas pa dang /_bskrad pa'i las byas pa dang /_slar sdum pa'i las byas pa dang /_ma mthong

[\[282a.6\]]pa dang /_gzhi nas bslang ste yid mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang /_khyim pa dang /_ma ning dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_pha dang /_ma dang /_dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_mu stegs can dang /_mu stegs 
[\[282a.7\]]can du song ba dang /_rkun gnas dang /_mi gnas pa dang /_so sor gnas pa dang /_sngar nyes pa byung ba dang /_sngon 'khrugs pa dang /_nye bar phyogs pa dang /_bslab pa stsal ba dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_dge tshul pha dang /_shin tu 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]gzhon pa rnams la phyag ma byed cig_/bshang ba byed pa la phyag mi bya'o/_/bshang ba byed pas phyag mi bya'o/_/gci ba byed pa la phyag mi bya'o/_/gci ba byed pas phyag mi bya'o/_/so shing za ba la phyag mi bya'o/_/so shing za bas phyag mi bya'o/_/zas za ba la phyag mi bya'o/_/

[\[282b.7\]]bzhi nas mal stan blangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_ji ltar yang de ni dge slong zhig gis gnas bzhi'i mtshams shing ngam/_'dam bu'am/_re ldes mnan te dbyar tshul du zhugs pa yin no/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pa rnams la 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]ni rnyed pa'i sum cha byin cig gsungs na/_btsun pa ci mal stan kyang sum cha stsal tam/_u pA li ma yin te/_skal ba mnyam par byin cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge slong gsar bu rnams kyis rgan po rnams las sngon du mal stan ma blang shig

[\[283a.7\]]tshe mtshan 'phos na bskos pa zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bskos pa zhes bya'o/_/des mal stan bgo bar bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/mal stan gyi dngos po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_mdor na/_gsum du byas pa'i gzu 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]bo dang /_/rnam par zhi ba'i mtshan de bzhin/_/gso sbyong dag gi mngon sum dag_/'byung ba dag kyang de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa gzu bo chos du dang ldan na 'dul ba 'dzin cing rtsod pa rnams zhi bar bgyid nus pa lags/_

[\[283b.6\]]zhugs pa yin/_mdo sde 'byed pa yin/_'khrul pa mi 'dzin pa yin/_gsang ba'i tshig mi 'dzin pa yin/_gdon mi za bar 'dzin pa yin/_tshig mang po mi 'dzin pa yin/_dam bcas pa 'dzin pa yin/_lan gsum gyi bar du gzhog pa yin te/_u pA li chos bcu gcig 
[\[283b.7\]]po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i gzu bo ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar byed nus pa yin no/_/chos du dang ldan pas rtsod pa shin tu zhi ba lags/_u pA li nyi shu rtsa gcig ste/_nyi shu rtsa gcig po gang zhe na/_dge 'dun la bsgo ba yin/_chos dang bcas pas rgyal ba'i bka' dang 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]mthun pa yin/_phyogs dang pha rol gyi phyogs kyi dge slong dag go bar byed pa yin/_rgol ba'i dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong la chos dang mthun pas rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong la 'dul ba ma nyams par byed pa yin/_mi gtsang ba'i gang zag gi nyes pa ma 
[\[284a.2\]]bcabs pa yin/_byung ba chud ma gsan pa yin/_bcas pa chud ma gsan pa yin/_rjes su bcas pa chud ma gsan pa yin/_dgag pa chud ma gsan pa yin/_mngon par rjes su gnang ba chud ma gsan pa yin/_nyes pa chud ma gsan pa yin/_rgol ba'i dge slong gi 
[\[284a.3\]]yi dam shin tu bzung ba yin/_lan 'debs pa'i yi dam shin tu bzung ba yin/_mdo sde'i tshig kyang bstan pa yin/_'dul ba'ang mthun pa yin/_chos kyi mig rjes su bzung ba yin/_bskos nas rnam par zhi bar byed pa yin/_nyes pa ston pa yin/_chad pa'i 
[\[284a.4\]]las dmigs su bab pa yin/_rnam par dag pa ston pa yin/_chos dang 'dul ba dang ston pa'i bstan pas rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba yin te/_u pA li chos nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams dang ldan na rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o/_btsun pa rgol ba'am slar rgol ba'i dge slong 
[\[284a.5\]]mtshan 'phos na rtsod pa zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsod pa byung ba byung ma thag tu rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bdun gyis rnam par zhi bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa rtsod pa rnam pa bzhi las gang yang rung ste/_rtsod 
[\[284a.6\]]pa zhig byung na zhi bar bgyid pa'i chos bdun po las gang yang rung ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i chos kyis rnam par zhi bar ma bgyis par rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/_u pA li yod de/_de ni mthun pa'i gso sbyong ngo /_/btsun pa rtsod pa bzhi las gang yang rung ste/_rtsod pa 
[\[284a.7\]]zhig byung na rgol ba dang slar rgol ba'i dge slong rnams las gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi/_rgan rims kyi gzung ngo /_/btsun pa de ste gnyi ga'i lo grangs mnyam na gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi/_gang mang du thos pa'i yin no/_/btsun pa de ste gnyi ga'ang gzhung la mtshungs par gyur 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]na gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi/_gang byang ba yin no/_/de ste gnyi ga byang bar gyur na gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi/_gang byang ba'i shas che ba yin te/_de'i tshig gis rtsod pa rnams rnam par zhi bar bya'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang tshul shing mang pos rtsod pa zhi bar bya 
[\[284b.2\]]ba las gang gi phyogs su tshul shing gcig gis kyang lhag par gyur na/_de'i phyogs des rnam par zhi bar bya'o/_/zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa de ste phyogs gnyi ga'i tshul shing mnyam par gyur na gang gi dbang gis rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid/_u pA li phyogs gang gis dge slong dag phal 
[\[284b.3\]]cher byang ba'i shas che ba yin no/_/btsun pa gang dge slong rnams rtsod pa dge slong rnams kyis rnam par zhi bar bgyid ma nus na/_btsun pa dge slong mas rnam par zhi bar bgyir rung ngam/_u pA li rung ngo /_de bzhin du sde lnga'i rnams kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig sbyar bar bya'o//_//
[\[284b.4\]]mdor na/_phrin pa spring yig lag brda dang /_/gzhan zer ba dang gcig nas gcig_/smyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang /_/'on glen khyim pa dag la sogs/_/bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/_/btsun pa phrin gyis rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyis na rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/_
[\[284b.5\]]u pA li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/de bzhin du spring yig dang /_lag brda dang /_gzhan zer ba dang /_gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rnam par zhi bar bgyis na rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/_dge 
[\[284b.6\]]'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa smyon pa zhig gis rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyis na rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /_nad kyis gzir 
[\[284b.7\]]ba dang /_glen pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_'on pa rnams kyis rnam par zhi bar bgyis na rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_btsun pa khyim pa zhig gis rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyis na rnam par zhi ba zhes 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]bgyi'am/_u pA li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa de bzhin du ma ning nas/_bslab pa stsal ba rnams kyi bar du rgyas par de dag gis rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyis na rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li 
[\[285a.2\]]rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/_dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa rgol ba'am slar rgol ba dus bgyis na rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du khyim pa lags par khas blangs pa nas/_bslab pa stsal ba 
[\[285a.3\]]lags pa'i bar rgyas par khas blangs na rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o/_btsun pa rgol ba'am slar rgol ba'i dge slong mtshan 'phos na rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/rtsod pa'i dngos po 
[\[285a.4\]]rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor na/_bye 'byed dge 'dun ca co dang /_/tha dad pa dang tshul bzhin dang /_/bskal pa kha na ma tho log_/dge 'dun dbye dang mi mkhas pa'o/_/btsun pa dge 'dun bye ba zhes kyang bgyi/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'dus pa zhes kyang bgyi na/_btsun 
[\[285a.5\]]pa dge 'dun bye ba gang lags/_u pA li gang dbyen byed pas chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes/_'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul ba ma yin par 'du shes par gyur bzhin du des 'du shes bcabs/_bzod pa bcabs/_dad pa bcabs/_blo gros dang /_
[\[285a.6\]]lta ba dang /_rtog pa rnams bcabs te/_'di skad du 'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o zhes smras nas/_des dge slong dag la bsgo/_/yang dag par bsgo/_slob/_len du 'jug_/brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang rjes su bsgrubs 
[\[285a.7\]]te/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag las gang dad cing bzod de mos pa de dag gis ni tshul shing long shig_/de dag gis brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga bsgrags te gsol ba byas/_tshul shing brims nas mang po khrid de 'gro ba 'di ni dge 'dun bye ba zhes bya'o/_/dge 'dun 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]'dus pa gang zhe na/_dge slong mtshams kyi nang na ji snyed cig 'khod par gyur pa de dag las byed pa na de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur/_mngon sum du gyur/_dad pa blang bar rigs pa'i rnams las dad pa blangs par gyur/_dge slong rnams kyang 'thab pa med/_rtsod 
[\[285b.2\]]pa med la/_de dag chos su 'du shes/_'dul bar 'du shes shing gso sbyong gi las byed pa 'di ni dge 'dun 'dus pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa dge 'dun 'byed pas bstir med pa'i kha na ma tho ba skyes la mtshams med pa'i las su 'gyur ba gang lags/_u pA li nam dbyen 
[\[285b.3\]]byed pas chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa yin/_bye ba la'ang chos ma yin par 'du shes bzhin du des 'du shes bcabs/_bzod pa bcabs/_dad pa dang /_blo gros dang /_lta ba dang /_rtog pa rnams bcabs te/_'di skad du chos ni 'di'o/_/
[\[285b.4\]]'dul ba ni 'di'o/_/ston pas bstan pa ni 'di'o zhes smras nas des dge slong dag la bsgo/_yang dag par bsgo/_slob/_len du 'jug_/brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga rjes su bsgrags te/_gang dbyen byed pa des brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga rjes su bsgrags te/_gsol 
[\[285b.5\]]ba byas tshul shing brims nas mang po khrid de song ba 'di ni dge 'dun 'byed pa yin te bstir med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'ang bskyed/_yang dag pa bsgo ba blangs shing len du 'jug pas mtshams med pa'i las su'ang 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun 'byed pas bstir med pa'i kha na ma tho ba ni skye 
[\[285b.6\]]la de mtshams med pa'i las su mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_u pA li gang dbyen byed pas chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes par gyur la bye ba la ni chos su 'du shes pa dang /_chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes par gyur la bye ba la yang chos ma yin par 
[\[285b.7\]]'du shes pa dang /_chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes par gyur la bye ba la the tshom za ba dang /_chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes la bye ba la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /_chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes la bye ba la yang chos su 'du shes pa dang /_
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes la bye ba la the tshom du gyur pa dang /_chos la chos su 'du shes la bye ba la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /_chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes la bye ba la chos su 'du shes pa dang /_chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes la 
[\[286a.2\]]bye ba la the tshom du gyur pa dang /_chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes la bye ba la'ang chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /_chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes la bye ba la chos su 'du shes pa dang /_chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes la bye ba la the tshom du gyur pa dang /_chos 
[\[286a.3\]]dang chos ma yin pa la the tshom du gyur la bye ba la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /_chos ma yin pa la the tshom du gyur la bye ba la chos su 'du shes pa dang /_chos ma yin pa la the tshom du gyur la bye ba la yang the tshom du gyur pa dang /_chos la the tshom du gyur la bye ba la 
[\[286a.4\]]chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /_chos la the tshom du gyur la bye ba la chos su 'du shes pa dang /_chos la the tshom du gyur la bye ba la'ang the tshom du gyur pa ste/_des 'du shes bcabs/_bzod pa bcabs/_dad pa bcabs/_blo gros dang /_lta ba dang /_rtog 
[\[286a.5\]]pa rnams bcabs te/_'di skad du 'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o zhes smras nas/_des yang dge slong rnams la bsgo/_yang dag par bsgo/_slob/_len du 'jug_/dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir brtson pa ni dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa 
[\[286a.6\]]ste/_bstir med pa'i kha na ma tho ba ni skye la/_de mtshams med pa'i las su mi 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gang la las dge 'dun bye ba de dag thams cad dge 'dun ca cor 'gyur lags sam/_dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun ca co med pa yang yod la/_dge 'dun ca cor gyur 
[\[286a.7\]]la dge 'dun mi 'bye ba yang yod/_dge 'dun kyang bye la dge 'dun ca cor yang 'gyur ba yod/_dge 'dun yang mi 'bye la dge 'dun ca cor yang mi 'gyur ba yod de/_de la dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun ca co med pa gang zhe na/_gang chos su 'du shes la dge 'dun 'byed 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]pa'o/_/dge 'dun ca cor gyur la dge 'dun mi 'bye ba gang zhe na/_dbyen du 'gyur ba'i dngos po bcu bzhi las gang yang rung ste dbyen du 'gyur ba'i dngos po zhig shin tu gdon mi za bar bzung bar gyur la dge 'dun ni bye bar ma gyur pa'o/_/dge 'dun yang bye la dge 'dun gyi ca cor yang 
[\[286b.2\]]'gyur la gang zhe na/_'di ltar dge 'dun de dag bye bar gyur la dbyen du 'gyur ba'i dngos po bcu bzhi las gang yang rung ste dbyen du 'gyur ba'i dngos po zhig shin tu gdon mi za bar bzung bar gyur pa'o/_/dge 'dun yang mi bye la dge 'dun gyi ca cor mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_rnam 
[\[286b.3\]]pa 'di la bu dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/btsun pa gang dge 'dun bye ba de thams cad dge 'dun tha dad par gyur pa lags sam/_dge 'dun tha dad par gyur la dge 'dun mi 'bye ba yang yod/_dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad par mi 'gyur ba yod/_dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun 
[\[286b.4\]]tha dad par 'gyur ba yang yod/_dge 'dun mi 'bye la dge 'dun tha dad par mi 'gyur ba'ang yod de/_dge 'dun tha dad par gyur la dge 'dun mi 'bye ba ni de 'di ltar dge 'dun rnam gnyis so so na gzhi la gnas par gyur/_rnyed pa yang tha dad gnas kyang tha dad/_mtshams 
[\[286b.5\]]kyang tha dad par gyur la dge 'dun ni ma bye ba'o/_/dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad par mi 'gyur ba ni gang chos su 'du shes pas dge 'dun phye ba'o/_/dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad pa ni 'di ltar dge 'dun bye bar gyur la dge 'dun rnam gnyis so so na gnas par gyur/_
[\[286b.6\]]rnyed pa tha dad pa dang /_gnas tha dad pa dang /_mtshams tha dad par gyur pa'o/_/dge 'dun ma bye la dge 'dun tha dad par kyang ma gyur pa ni rnam pa de lta bu dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/ji ltar dge 'dun tha dad pa la rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ba bzhin du dge 'dun gyi tshul la yang rnam pa 
[\[286b.7\]]bzhir brjod par bya'o/_/btsun pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa de dag thams cad bskal par gnas sam/_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas la bskal par mi gnas pa'ang yod/_bskal par gnas la dge 'dun gyi dbyen ma byas pa yang yod/_dge 'dun gyi 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]dbyen byas la bskal par gnas pa'ang yod/_dge 'dun gyi dbyen ma byas pa la bskal par mi gnas pa'ang yod do/_/dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas la bskal par mi gnas pa ni gang gis chos su 'du shes pas dge 'dun phye ba'o/_/bskal par gnas la dge 
[\[287a.2\]]'dun gyi dbyen ma byas pa ni glang po'i rgyal po e ra ba na dang /_glang po'i rgyal po shin tu brtan pa dang /_glang po'i rgyal po yid du 'ong ba dang /_glang po'i rgyal po gshin rje dang /_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams so/_/dge 'dun phye la bskal par gnas pa ni lha sbyin no/_/dge 
[\[287a.3\]]'dun kyang ma phye la bskal par yang mi gnas pa ni rnam pa de lta bu dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/gang la las dge 'dun phye na de dag thams cad bskal par gnas pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye ba yang rnam pa bzhir brjod par bya ste/_de yang de bzhin du dbye bar bya'o/_/gang la las dge 
[\[287a.4\]]'dun 'byed pa de dag thams cad log par nges pa lags sam/_dge 'dun 'byed la log par nges pa ma yin pa'ang yod/_log par nges la dge 'dun mi 'byed pa'ang yod/_dge 'dun 'byed la log par nges pa'ang yod/_dge 'dun 'byed pa yang ma yin la log 
[\[287a.5\]]par nges pa ma yin pa'ang yod de/_dge 'dun 'byed la log par nges pa ma yin pa ni gang chos su 'du shes shing dge 'dun 'byed pa'o/_/log par nges la dge 'dun 'byed pa ma yin pa ni de mtshams med pa bzhi'o/_/dge 'dun 'byed la log par kyang nges pa ni lha sbyin no/_/
[\[287a.6\]]dge 'dun 'byed pa'ang ma yin la log par nges pa'ang ma yin pa ni rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/gang la las dge 'dun 'byed pa de dag thams cad mi mkhas pa dang ma rig par gyur pa lags sam/_dge 'dun 'byed la mi mkhas pa ma yin zhing ma rig par gyur 
[\[287a.7\]]pa ma yin pa'ang yod/_mi mkhas pa dang ma rig pa yin la dge 'dun mi 'byed pa'ang yod/_dge 'dun 'byed la mi mkhas pa ma rig par gyur pa'ang yod/_dge 'dun yang mi 'byed la mkhas pa'ang yin ma rig par gyur pa'ang ma yin pa'ang yod de/_dge 'dun 'byed la 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]mi mkhas pa'ang ma yin ma rig par gyur pa ma yin pa ni gang chos su 'du shes pas dge 'dun 'byed pa'o/_/mi mkhas pa dang ma rig par gyur la dge 'dun mi 'byed pa ni ston pa drug go/_/dge 'dun 'byed la mi mkhas pa dang ma rig pa ni lha sbyin no/_/dge 'dun yang mi 'byed 
[\[287b.2\]]la mi mkhas pa'ang ma yin ma rig par gyur pa'ang ma yin pa ni rnam pa 'di dag ma gtogs pa'o//_//mdor na/_phye ba rnam pa drug tu byas/_/rgol ba rnam bzhi gso sbyong dang /_/mtshams la rnam bzhi gsum pa dang /_/bskal pa brtan min de bzhin te/_/khyim pa dag la 
[\[287b.3\]]sogs pa dang /_/bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/_/btsun pa phye ba dang ldan pa gang lags/_kha na ma tho ba gang lags/_u pA li dge 'dun ni phye ba dang ldan pa'o/_/'byed pa ni kha na ma tho ba'o/_/btsun pa dge 'dun phye na cir 'gyur/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge 
[\[287b.4\]]'dun phye na nongs pa gang bshags par bgyi/_nyes pa sbom po'o/_/btsun pa 'di ltar dge slong dag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'byed kyi/_dge slong mas ma lags/_dge slob mas ma lags/_dge tshul mas ma lags/_dge tshul phas ma lags sam/_u pA li de bzhin 
[\[287b.5\]]te/_dge slong dag gis dge 'dun 'byed kyi/_dge slong mas ma yin/_dge slob mas ma yin/_dge tshul mas ma yin/_dge tshul phas ma yin no/_/u pA li de bzhin du dge slong ma dag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'byed kyi dge slong gis ma yin/_dge slob mas ma yin/_
[\[287b.6\]]dge tshul mas ma yin/_dge tshul phas ma yin te/_'on kyang dge 'dun 'byed pa'i phyir ni rtsol lo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa gnyis kyi slad du dge 'dun 'bye ste/_rjes su bsgrags pa dang /_tshul shing len pa'o zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa gang rtsed mor 'tshal 
[\[287b.7\]]ba'am/_ma 'tshal ba zhig gis rjes su bsgrags shing tshul shing brims na dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/'o na cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_dge 'dun 'byed pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun 'byed pa na mtshan 'phos na dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi'am/_u 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bye nas phyogs dang pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas na dge slong ma la zla ba phyed phyed cing bstan pa'i lung stsal tam/_u pA li ma sbyin par 'di skad du sring mo'i rnams rjes su mthun par gyis shig ces sgo shig_/btsun 
[\[288a.2\]]pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bye ste phyogs dang pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas na dge slong mas zla ba phyed cing bstan pa'i lung gsol bar bgyi'am/_u pA li gsol bar bya'o/_gang las gsol/_rjes su ma phyogs pa rnams so/_btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun phye ste phyogs dang pha rol gyi 
[\[288a.3\]]phyogs su gnas na dge slong ma la bstan pa'i lung stsol bar bgyi'am/_u pA li dge slong ma yang bye bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir bas na byin cig_/btsun pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bye ste phyogs dang pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas pa la gang gis dge slong ma la lung stsal bar bgyi/_
[\[288a.4\]]rjes su ma phyogs pa rnams kyis sbyin no/_btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bye ste phyogs dang pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas na dge slong mas gso sbyong bgyi'am/_u pA li bya'o/_/btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bye ste phyogs dang pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas na nye bar phyogs 
[\[288a.5\]]pa'i dge slong rnams kyis gso sbyong bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge 'dun 'dus pa las ni gso sbyong bya'o/_/btsun pa nye bar phyogs pas nye bar ma phyogs pa rnams kyi mtshams bkrol na mtshams bkrol ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin 
[\[288a.6\]]no/_/btsun pa nye bar ma phyogs pa rnams kyis nye bar phyogs pa rnams kyi mtshams bkrol na mtshams bkrol ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li bkrol ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gang la la zhig nye bar phyogs pa de dag thams cad so sor gnas pa zhes bgyi'am/_rnam pa 
[\[288a.7\]]bzhir rgyas par brjod do/_/btsun pa gang la la zhig nye bar phyogs nas de dag thams cad mi gnas pa zhes bgyi'am/_rnam pa bzhir rgyas par brjod do/_/btsun pa gang la la so sor gnas na de dag thams cad mi gnas pa zhes bgyi'am/_rnam pa bzhir rgyas par 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]brjod do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags rnam pa brgyar gyes pa'i dum bu yang btsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/_lcags kyi dum bu zhes bgyi ba gang lags/_dad pa btsal bar bya ba dang /_mos pa btsal bar bya ba dang /_'dum pa btsal bar bya ba dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[288b.2\]]'dus pa btsal bar bya ste/_dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir ni btsal bar mi bya'o/_/btsun pa dge 'dun bye ste phyogs dang pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas na gtan pa gang gis dbyung bar bgyi/_nye bar ma phyogs pa rnams kyis so/_/btsun pa ma ning zhig gis dge 'dun phye na phye ba zhes 
[\[288b.3\]]bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa de bzhin du dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas/_bslab pa stsal ba'i bar du rgyas par de dag gis dge 'dun phye na dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa smyon pa zhig gis dge 'dun phye na dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi'am/_
[\[288b.4\]]u pA li ma yin no/_/btsun pa de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /_nad kyis gzir ba dang /_glen pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_'on pa rnams kyis dge 'dun phye na dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi'am/_u pA li ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_u pA li rang bzhin du gnas pa ma yin pas ni 
[\[288b.5\]]dge 'dun dbye bar mi nus so/_/ji ltar dge 'dun 'byed pa de bzhin du grangs su mi 'gyur bar yang brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi dbyen gyi dngos po rdzogs te/_u pA lis dris pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mdor na/_bzang byin rdo rje 'du shes dang /_/bal glang mo dang rgod ma 
[\[288b.6\]]dang /_/ba dang rnga mo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo/_/bong lug khyi phag mo rnams so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing 'gram gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na zhugs so/_/ka lan da ka'i bu bzang byin la bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pas las dang po pa la nyes pa med pa 
[\[288b.7\]]na bdag gis bslab pa ma bcas pa'i tshe lan mang zhig tu mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos byas na bdag gi las dang po gang yin zhes the tshom du gyur nas sems la dogs pa dang 'gyod pa rnams skyes te/_des de lta bur gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras nas/_dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa na ka lan da ka'i bu bzang byin gyis shin tu 'das par gyur pa ni thams cad kyang las dang po pa yin te/_las dang po pa la ni nyes 
[\[289a.2\]]pa med do/_/dge slong rdo rje'i bu zhes bya bas bslab pa ma phul/_bslab pa nyams pa ma bshags par khyim par gyur te/_des de na mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos byas nas de 'di snyam du gyur to/_/re zhig dge slong rnams la dris la de ste bdag rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen 
[\[289a.3\]]par rdzogs par rung na ni rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de ste mi rung na 'di nyid na 'dug go snyam bsams nas des de ltar gyur pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i bar du rgyas par byas te/_dge slong dag bslab pa ma phul bslab pa nyams pa ma bshags par khyim pa'i 
[\[289a.4\]]dngos por gyur te mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos la bsten na gang zag de slar yang rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mi rung gis de bzhin du bslab pa'i gnas bshad par bya'o/_/yang dge slong gang bslab pa ma phul bslab pa nyams pa ma bshags bzhin du mi tshangs 
[\[289a.5\]]par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos byas na dge slong de yang phas pham pa yin gyis lhan cig ma gnas shig_/dge slong gcig pu zhig dgon pa na 'dug ste de las mi ring ba zhig na bal glang mo zhig la bu byung ste/_bal glang mo de las be'u mo zhig byung ngo /_/de'i ma de ni zas la song nas dge 
[\[289a.6\]]slong des rtswa blangs te de la rtswa byin chu blud pa dang /_des de 'dug pa la mo mtshan bye bar mthong ste/_des de mthong nas chags par gyur te der log par zhugs pa dang /_de ngo tsha ba'i chos su gyur nas/_des bdag phas pham pa'i nyes pa ma byung grang snyam bsams nas the tshom skyes te/_
[\[289a.7\]]des de lta bur gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa nas rgyas par brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag der reg par ma gyur pas phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med kyi nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/nam bal glang gi phru gu de chen por gyur pa dang /_des de'i 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]mo mtshan mthong ste/_des de mthong nas chags pa dang /_des der gzhug snyam nas mo mtshan gyi khar btsugs pa dang /_des de la phra ba cig brgyab nas skrag par gyur te/_bdag la phas pham pa'i ltung ba ma byung grang snyam bsams nas/_des de lta bur gyur pa rgyas 
[\[289b.2\]]par smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag skrag pa la ni chags pa med pas phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med kyi nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bal glang mo bzhin du rgod ma dang /_rnga mo dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo dang /_bong mo dang /_lug mo 
[\[289b.3\]]dang /_khyi mo dang /_phag mo rnams kyang de bzhin no//_//mdor na/_smyon par gyur dang sems 'khrugs dang /_/nad kyis gzir dang mi rnams dang /_/lam min lam du 'du shes dang /_/lam gsum rab tu bsgrags pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[289b.4\]]kyis smyon pa la nongs pa ma mchis so zhes gsungs na/_ji tsam gyis na smyon pa zhes bgyi/_rnam pa lngas smyon par gyur te/_gnyen bshes zad pa dang /_longs spyod zad pa dang /_nor zad pa dang /_khams ma mnyam pa dang /_mi ma yin pas brlams pa dang /_sngon gyi las 
[\[289b.5\]]kyi rnam par smin pa ste/_rnam pa 'di lngas smyon par 'gyur ro/_/de ste dge slong gi dngos por shes na ni dngos po ji lta ba bzhin no/_/de ste dge slong gi dngos por mi shes na smyon pa la nyes pa med do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sems 'khrugs pa la nongs pa ma 
[\[289b.6\]]mchis so zhes gsungs na/_ji tsam gyis na sems 'khrugs pa zhes bgyi/_rnam pa lngas ni sems 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/_mi ma yin pas de'i sems 'khrugs pa dang /_mi ma yin pas de la brlams pa dang /_mi ma yin pas de'i mdangs phrogs pa dang /_khams 
[\[289b.7\]]ma mnyam pa dang /_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ste/_rnam pa 'di lngas ni sems 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste rgyas par ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis nad kyis gzir ba la nongs pa ma mchis so/_/zhes gsungs na/_ji tsam gyis na nad kyis gzir ba zhes bgyi/_rnam 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]pa lngas na nad kyis gzir ba zhes bya ste/_de la rlung gis bskyod pa dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_'dus pa dang /_dus gyur pa rnams te/_rnam pa 'di lnga ni nad kyis gzir ba zhes bya'o/_/dge slong gis lam la lam ma yin par 'du 
[\[290a.2\]]shes nas mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos byas te/_dge slong de la bdag la phas pham pa'i nyes pa ma byung grang snyam bsams te the tshom skyes nas des de ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lam la lam ma yin par 'du shes 
[\[290a.3\]]na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/lam la the tshom za bar 'du shes na'ang phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/lam ma yin pa la lam du 'du shes na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/lam ma yin pa la the tshom za na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/lam gsum la bshang ba'i lam 
[\[290a.4\]]dang /_gci ba'i lam dang /_kha'i lam mo/_/dge slong gis gci ba'i lam du dkris kha shun 'das na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bshang ba'i lam du dkris rkub kha 'das na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis kha'i lam du dkris so 'das na phas 
[\[290a.5\]]pham par 'gyur ro//_//mdor na/_spre'u mo seng ge khrung khrung mo/_/rma bya khyim bya'ang de bzhin te/_/mtshan ring dang ni rgyab gnyen dang /_/nan di ka dang kha gnyis so/_/nyes pa sbom po bzhi ste/_spre'u mo dang /_mtshan ring ni ji ltar rnam par 'byed pa las 'byung ba 
[\[290a.6\]]bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/rgyab gnyen kyang phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/nan da ki la bslab pa byin pa ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin no/_/dge slong zhig bla gab med par 'dug nas sgren mor khrus byed de/_de'i nye g.yog ni mi 
[\[290a.7\]]bzhi zhig byed de de'i lus la reg pas pho mtshan las su rung bar gyur te 'dod chags kun du gnas pa dang /_dge slong gzhan zhig mdun na 'dug par gyur pa des de'i pho mtshan bdag gi khar bcug pa dang /_des kyang lus btud de khu ba phyung nas dge slong de the tshom skyes nas bdag 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]la phas pham pa'i nyes pa ma byung grang snyam du bsams te/_des de lta bur gyur pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i bar du rgyas par byas te/_de la phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med mod kyi/_bla gab med pa la 'greng ngam 'dug kyang rung gzhan las byed pa bdag gir 
[\[290b.2\]]ma byed cig_/dge slong zhig 'dod chags kun du gnas pas gzir ba dang /_de la dge slong mdza' bo zhig yod de de de'i drung du song nas des tshe dang ldan pa 'dod chags kyis kun du khebs shing gzir to zhes smras na/_de na re song la mi tshangs par spyod cig ces bsgo ba dang /_
[\[290b.3\]]de yang song nas mi tshangs par spyod pa byas so/_/de la bsgo bas bdag la phas pham pa'i nyes pa ma byung grang zhes the tshom skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med kyi nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[290b.4\]]'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis zhus pa/_btsun pa nyes pa sbom por ji lta ba mthol bar bgyi/_u pA li nyes pa sbom po ni 'di bzhi ste/_phas pham pa las byung ba'i lci ba dang /_phas pham pa las byung ba yang ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las byung ba 
[\[290b.5\]]lci ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las byung ba yang ba rnams te/_de la u pA li gang phas pham pa las byung ba'i nyes pa sbom po lci ba de ni mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun thams cad kyi mdun du bshags par bya'o/_/gang phas pham pa las byung ba'i yang ba de ni 
[\[290b.6\]]mtshams kyi phyi rol du dge slong bzhi'i mdun du bshags par bya'o/_/gang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las byung ba'i nyes pa sbom po lci ba ni mtshams kyi phyi rol du dge slong bzhi'i mdun du bshags par bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las byung ba'i yang ba ni mtshams kyi nang du 
[\[290b.7\]]dge slong gcig gi mdun du bshags par bya'o//_//mdor na/_glal dang las su rung bar gyur/_/ma dang dur khrod pa dag dang /_/'od bzang dang ni bzang skyes dang /_/shin tu bzang ba smyugs pa dang /_/rab tu bzang zhes bya ba'o/_/dge slong gis ma 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]bkag par glal ba dang /_'dod chags kyis kun du gzir ba'i dge slong zhig de'i mdun na 'dug pas pho mtshan de'i khar bcug nas des lus btud de khu ba phyung nas dge slong de bdag la phas pham pa'i nyes pa ma byung grang zhes the tshom skyes pa 
[\[291a.2\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni ma byung mod kyi/_da phan chad dge slong gis ma bkag par glal bar ma byed cig_/glal na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig pho mtshan sgreng bzhin las su rung bar gyur nas 
[\[291a.3\]]des bdag gis mo mtshan gyi nang du bcug kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams te/_des bud med kyi mo mtshan du bcug nas bdag la phas pham pa'i nyes pa ma byung grang zhes the tshom skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bcug ma thag tu 
[\[291a.4\]]phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig 'dod chags kyis kun du khebs shing gzir ba dang /_de ma'i drung du song nas 'di skad du ma 'dod chags kun du gnas pas gzir to zhes smras pa dang /_ma na re bu khyod ni 'di nyid nas byung ba yin gyis da'ang 'di nyid du chug 
[\[291a.5\]]shig ces smras pa dang /_des de nyid du gzhug snyam ste rma khar btsugs na de ngo tsha ba'i chos su gyur te/_dge slong de bdag la phas pham pa'i chos su ma gyur grang zhes the tshom skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngo tsha ba ni chags pa med pas phas pham 
[\[291a.6\]]pa'i nyes pa med mod kyi/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig mi ro la brtag pa'i phyir dur khrod du song ba dang /_des de na bud med rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du bor ba'i ro zhig mthong ngo /_/des de mthong nas chags pa'i chos skyes te/_des de'i nang du gzhug ces 
[\[291a.7\]]rma khar btsugs pa dang de'i nang srin bus gang zhing 'dug ste/_dge slong de bdag la phas pham pa'i nyes pa ma byung grang zhes the tshom skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nyams pa de la rnam pa gnyis te/_nang nyams pa dang /_phyi nyams pa ste/_
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med mod kyi nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'od bzang mo zhes bya ba'i dge bsnyen ma zhig nub mo dus byas nas de brgyan bzhin du dur khrod du bor ba dang /_dge slong zhig mi ro la brtag pa'i phyir dur khrod du song ba des de mthong nas de la chags 
[\[291b.2\]]pa'i chos skyes te/_des de'i nang du gzhug ces rma khar btsugs pa dang de yang langs te 'dug nas dge slong de 'jigs par gyur te/_bdag la phas pham pa'i nyes pa ma byung grang zhes the tshom skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[291b.3\]]'jigs pa ni chags pa med pas phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med mod kyi nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag bzang skyes zhes bya ba'i chung ma de'i grong du nye bar 'gro ba dang /_dge slong zhig yod pa de der song nas de la 'di skad du khyim bdag gi chung ma 'dod chags kyis 
[\[291b.4\]]khebs shing gzir to zhes smras pa dang /_mos smras pa/_'og mar smyugs la steng mar khu ba thong shig_/steng mar smyugs la 'og mar khu ba thong shig dang /_de la kho mos mi tshangs par spyad par mi shes so zhes smras pa dang /_des kyang 'di snyam du bsams te/_
[\[291b.5\]]'di ni bzang ngo /_/'di ni legs so/_/de lta bur ni rung ngo snyam du bsams nas/_'og mar smyugs te steng mar khu ba btang ba dang /_dge slong de the tshom skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bcug ma thag tu phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/shin 
[\[291b.6\]]tu bzang mo'i gleng gzhi ni ji ltar rnam par 'byed pa las 'byung ba bzhin no/_/rab tu bzang zhes bya ba'i dge slong zhig gcig pu dgon pa la gnas te/_de nas rgyang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze'i zhing zhig yod de/_bram ze de zhing la rtag tu 'ong ba mthong ste/_de mthong 
[\[291b.7\]]nas dad pa skyes so/_/des de zan la mgron du bos nas des kyang de la khas blangs so/_/des nang par sngar zas rnams sbyar te bu mo chung ngu sgren mor spyad pa zhig 'bod du btang ba dang /_des de'i mo mtshan mthong ngo /_/des mthong nas chags pa skyes te byas pa dang /_
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]de'i mo mtshan ral nas de the tshom skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste mi tshangs par spyad pas dga' ba tshor na ni phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/de ste ma tshor na ni nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//_//mdor na/_las su mi

[\[292a.3\]]mi rung bzhin du bcug na nyes par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des ma bsgreng bzhin du bcug pa dang the tshom skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni med mod kyi nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bud med gnyid log pa la 
[\[292a.4\]]byas pa dang /_dge slong de the tshom skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste lag pas ni lag par rkang pas ni rkang par/_brlas ni brlar/_'grong gis ni 'grong la 'byar na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'byor na ni nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[292a.5\]]ji ltar gnyid log pa de bzhin du ra ro ba dang /_nad kyis gzir ba dang /_mi 'dod bzhin pa'o/_/ji ltar bud med la rnam pa bzhir brjod pa skyes pa dang /_ma ning la yang de bzhin no//_//'dul ba gzhung dam pa/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_
[\[292a.6\]]mdor na/_rnam pa bzhi dang lnga pa dang /_/las rnams kun dang gnyid log ma/_/lan gcig gsum pa byas pa dang /_/bud med skyes pa ma ning ngo /_/dge slong nyal ba la bud med kyis byas te de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[292a.7\]]slong khyod kyis ci dga' ba tshor ram/_gsol pa/_dga' ba tshor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes sam/_smras pa/_'tshal ba ni ma mchis te/_bdag g.yos pa tsam du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gnyid kyis 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]log pa g.yos pa tsam du gyur pa la phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig nyal ba na bud med kyis byas te de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod kyis ci dga' bar tshor ram/_
[\[292b.2\]]gsol ba/_dga' bar ma tshor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bar ma tshor na nyes pa med do/_/dge slong nyal zhing 'dug pa na bud med kyis byas te de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[292b.3\]]ci khyod kyis shes sam/_gsol pa/_ma 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes pa med na nyes pa med do/_/dge slong nyal ba zhig 'dug pa la bud med kyis byas te de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[292b.4\]]ci dge slong khyod kyis shes pa'am/_dga' ba tshor ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_'tshal ba'ang ma mchis dga' bar tshor ba'ang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes pa med pa dang /_dga' bar tshor ba med pa la nyes pa med do/_/
[\[292b.5\]]dge slong la ji lta bar dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul ma dang /_dge tshul pha la'ang de bzhin no/_/sdig can gyi dge sbyong gsum pos bud med bzung ste lam kun du byas kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras nas de dag gis de'i lam kun du byas pa dang /_de 
[\[292b.6\]]dag the tshom skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bcug ma thag tu phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/bud med la ji lta bar skyes pa dang /_ma ning thams cad la'ang de bzhin no//_//mdor na/_bud med skyes pa ma ning dang /_/sun phyung dga' ba ma 
[\[292b.7\]]tshor dang /_/dgon pa gsum dang rab byung lnga'o/_/dge slong zhig nyal ba la bud med kyis byas te/_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/_dge slong ci khyod kyis shes sam/_gsol pa/_ma 'tshal to/_/mi shes pa la nyes pa 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]med do/_/bud med la ji lta bar skyes pa dang /_ma ning la'ang de bzhin no/_/dgon pa'i dge slong sdig can gyis dge slob ma brid nas khyod ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pas mi tshangs par spyad na bdag cag gnyi ga la nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa 
[\[293a.2\]]dang /_des kyang khas blangs so/_/des khas blangs nas 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_des de ma dad bzhin du byas nas dge slob ma de bdag ni dge slob ma ma yin par ma gyur grang snyam du 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bslab pa nyams 
[\[293a.3\]]kyis slar yang byin cig nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dgon pa'i sdig can mas dge tshul pha brid nas khyod ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pas mi tshangs par spyad kyang bdag cag gnyis ka la nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras nas rgyas par te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[293a.4\]]dge tshul pha la nyes byas su 'gyur te/_dge tshul ma la'ang de bzhin no/_/dgon pa'i sdig can mas lor ma lon pa la khyod bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring por ma lon gyis mi tshangs par spyad kyang bdag cag la nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/_des kyang de la khas blangs 
[\[293a.5\]]te/_des khas blangs nas slar 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_des de la ma dad bzhin du byas nas dge slong de 'di snyam du bdag la phas pham pa'i nyes pa ma byung grang snyam ste 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bar ma tshor ba la phas pham 
[\[293a.6\]]pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis dge slong zhig nyal ba la byas pa dang /_dge slong des thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma rnams ma shes na dge slong gang gis byas pa de ma rung bar byos shig_/rgyas par ni rnam par 'byed 
[\[293a.7\]]pa las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no//_//mdor na/_bzhi pa gzugs brnyan klu mo dang /_/gnod sbyin lha mo dri za mo'o/_/lha min [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mi za mo/_/sha za mo yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong zhig gis shing gi gzugs brnyan byas pa/_gzugs legs 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa zhig mthong ste/_de mthong ba dang 'dod pa'i chos skyes nas des de nyid du gzhug snyam ste rma khar btsugs pa dang /_des kyang phye nas dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de 
[\[293b.2\]]ste yan lag thams cad du reg par byas nas phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/'on te mo mtshan sprad pa tsam gyis ni nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar shing las byas pa de bzhin du sa las byas pa dang /_rdo las byas pa dang /_gos las byas pa rnams kyang de 
[\[293b.3\]]bzhin no/_/klu'i bu mo zhig dge slong gi drung du 'ongs nas btsun pa mi tshangs par spyad kyis tshur spyon zhes smras pa dang /_des khas blangs nas des der gzhug ces rma khar btsugs pa dang /_de yang lus ring mor gyur nas dge slong de 'jigs par gyur nas 'gyod pa 
[\[293b.4\]]skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'jigs pa la chags pa med pas na phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'i bar du rgyas par byas te de yang mi snang bar gyur nas dge slong de 'gyod 
[\[293b.5\]]pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu mo dang /_dri za'i bu mo dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams kyang de bzhin du rgyas par te/_ji ltar klu'i bu mo bzhin du lus 
[\[293b.6\]]cher gyur nas/_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'jigs pa la ni 'dod chags med pas phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi bu mo de'i mo mtshan cher 
[\[293b.7\]]gyur pa dang /_des der rkang pa btsugs nas dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa mad de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gcig pu dgon pa la gnas pa dang /_der mi za mo zhig 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]'ongs te/_btsun pa mi tshangs par spyad kyis tshur spyon zhes smras na dge slong de tshul khrims dang ldan pas spro ba ma skyes pa dang /_des smras pa/_btsun pa spro ba skyed cig khyod ma rung bar byas sa re/_des de la ci dga' ba byos shig_/spro ba mi 
[\[294a.2\]]bskyed do zhes smras pa dang /_mos dge slong de nyal ba la phyar bas dkris te/_rgyal po btsun mo dang lhan cig tu gzims pa'i mchan du bcug pa dang /_rgyal po des dge slong de mthong nas khyod 'dir ci la 'ongs/_des smras pa/_bdag gcig pu dgon pa na gnas 
[\[294a.3\]]pa dang der mi za mo zhig mchis nas bdag la btsun pa mi tshangs par spyad kyis tshur spyon ces mchi nas bdag gis spro ba ma skyed pa dang /_des btsun pa spro ba skyed cig khyod ma rung bar byas sa re zhes mchi nas/_de la bdag gis ci dga' bar byos shig_/spro ba ni mi

[\[294a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_phyin chad gang du 'di ltar 'jigs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dgon par ma gnas shig_/de bzhin du sha za mos kyang byas te/_des kyang nyal ba la phyar bas dkris nas chang 'tshong ba'i spyil bur

[\[294a.7\]]rgal dang /_/nya dang sram dang shing thun mo'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs so/_/dge slong ma u pA li'i kha dog ma snga dro sham thabs bgos te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs pa nas/_rgyas par rkang pa bkrus te nang du yang dag par 'jog la

[\[294b.1\]]'jug pa'i phyir gnas khang du zhugs pa dang /_sgo phye ste 'phres nas tsha ba'i dus la bab pas gnyid log cing nyal ba dang /_g.yon can srang phran nas rgyu zhing 'dong ba rnams kyis mthong ste de dag gis nyal ba la byas so/_/de dag gis byas nas dong ba dang de yang sad nas

[\[294b.5\]]ba'o/_/khyod ni glen pa'o/_/khyod ni dge sbyong sdig can no zhes smras pa dang /_de 'di snyam du bdag gis phag gi phrug gu btang bas na bdag ni rku ba/_bdag ni glen pa/_bdag ni dge sbyong sdig can du gyur gyis bdag song la mi tshangs par spyad do snyam du bsams nas de

[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]song ba bya 'ol bas phrogs te khyer nas sha snag gu de 'ol ba'i kha nas shor te/_dge slong bsod snyoms la spyod pa de'i lhung bzed du lhung ngo /_/khyim bdag des sha snag gu de dge slong de'i lhung bzed na 'dug pa mthong ba dang /_des dge slong de'i gong ba

[\[295a.3\]]pa'o/_/bdag ni dge sbyong sdig can du gyur gyis bdag song la mi tshangs par spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams so/_/rgyas par ni ji ltar phag gi phrug gu bzhin no/_/dge slong zhig gis khyi mo'i mdun du gci ba byas pa dang /_des de'i pho mtshan khar bcug nas des khu ba phyung ste lus

[\[296a.1\]]'tshal to/_/mi shes na nyes pa med de/_bla gab med par gcig pu 'phres te ma 'dug shig_/'dug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//_//mdor na/_sa ke ma yi rtswa rnga dang /_/tsam pa ya yi rgyu lnga dang /_/rgyal po'i khab na sman dpyad dang /_/

[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]can rnams kyis bzung ste nags stug por khrid nas sun phyung ste btang ba la de dge slong ma dag gis gnas nas bskrad pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag gis dga' bar ni ma tshor ro/_/'o na kun dga' bo'i drung du song shig ces smras nas/_

[\[298a.3\]]mchong ngo snyam du bsams nas/_des bum pa bye mas bkang ba mgul du btags te klung a dzi ra ba ti ra mchongs pa dang /_tha gu ngan pa zhig pas chad de bying zhing nub pa g.yon can rnams kyis mthong nas/_de dag gis phyung ste bzhag nas nam 'du shes slar rnyed pa
