[\[298a.7\]]mdor na/_nor can dgon pa 'du shes dang /_/bsod snyoms bcu dang rkun po bcu/_/gzhan yang sho gam gnas kyi bcu/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs so/_/sngon gyi rdza pa dge slong nor can bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pas 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]las dang po pa la ni nyes pa med de/_bdag gis ni shing mang zhig ma byin par blangs te 'ongs na gang la bdag las dang po par 'gyur zhes sems la gdung zhing 'gyod de 'gyod par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bslab 
[\[298b.2\]]pa'i gnas ma bcas pas sngon gyi rdza pa dge slong nor can ni kun las kyang 'das te thams cad du las dang po pa yin pas las dang po pa la ni nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig dgon pa bdag po med pa'i yo byad la bdag po yod par 'du shes nas ma byin par blangs 
[\[298b.3\]]pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdag po yod pa la bdag po yod par 'du shes na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/bdag po yod pa la the tshom du gyur na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/bdag po med pa la bdag 
[\[298b.4\]]po yod par 'du shes na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bdag po med pa la bdag po med par 'du shes na nyes pa med do/_/dge slong gis bsod snyoms 'bras can zhig mi dbang bar blangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i 
[\[298b.5\]]nyes pa med de/_nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bsod snyoms 'bras can la ji lta ba bzhin du bsod snyoms phye dang /_phya tshal btsos pa'i bsod snyoms dang /_bsod snyoms sha dang /_bsod snyoms bag chos rnams thams cad kyang de bzhin du nyes pa sbom por 
[\[298b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig mgron du ma bos par zan zos pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ljongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyi bshos 'god pa na 
[\[298b.7\]]dge slong gzhi ba zhig grong gzhan du song ba dang /_de dang lhan cig spyod pa gnyis shig yod de/_de gnyis kas mkhan po'i zan so sor mnos pa dang /_de gnyis 'di snyam du khyod kyis kyang mnos/_kho bos kyang mnos na/_gang gang gis mi dbang bar blangs 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]mi shes te phas pham pa'i nyes par ma gyur grang snyam du bsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blangs pa la nyes pa med de/_gzhan zhes bya bar byos shig ljongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyi bshos 'god pa na dge slong gzhi 
[\[299a.2\]]ba zhig grong gzhan du song nas dge slong de'i mdza' bo des de'i zan mnos pa dang /_de 'ongs nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis kho bo'i zan mnos sam smras pa/_mnos so/_/dge slong des ngas ma bcol bar khyod kyis ci'i phyir mnos zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de 
[\[299a.3\]]'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_ma bcol par ni ma nod cig_/ljongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyi bshos 'god pa na dge slong nad pa zhig yod de de'i nad g.yog gis zan mnos te/_des mnos nas song ba dang /_dge slong 
[\[299a.4\]]de yang dus las 'das nas des ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste sngar dus las 'das la phyis mnos na ni de nyid du slar phul cig_/'on te sngar mnos la phyis dus las 'das na yo byad gzhan ji lta ba de ltar byos shig_/
[\[299a.5\]]dge slong zhig gis dge slong zhig la 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog_/rkun po la 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de gnyis dong ste lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang /_bdag cag ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bas rkun po byas na ni bdag cag gnyis mi mdzes 
[\[299a.6\]]shing mi rigs so snyam ste ngo tsha ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur nas de gnyis der ma dong ba dang /_de gnyis 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis dge slong dag gcig la tshe dang ldan 
[\[299a.7\]]pa dag tshur shog_/rkun po la 'dong ngo zhes de skad smras pa dang /_de dag dong nas lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang /_bdag cag ni mi mdzes so snyam nas ngo tsha ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur te de der ma dong ba dang /_dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]pham pa'i nyes pa med de/_nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/de dag bzhin du byas pa las gcig ni ngo tsha ba'i chos dang ldan nas de 'di snyam du de ste ma song na ni de dag gis bdag 'tsho ba dang phral bar 'gyur gyis bdag song la bdag gis ma byin par mi blang zhing bdag gi skal ba mi 
[\[299b.2\]]bkur ro snyam du bsams nas des der ma byin par yang ma blangs skal ba yang ma khyer ba dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gis dge slong dag la tshe dang ldan 
[\[299b.3\]]pa dag tshur shog rkun po la 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de dag der dong ba dang /_de dag las phyed ni las byed phyed ni lam srung ngo /_/de dag las lam srung ba gang yin pa de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis ni ma blangs shing ma brkus pas nyes par mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa dang /_de 
[\[299b.4\]]ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ste dngos po tshang na phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis dge slong zhig la tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog rkun po 
[\[299b.5\]]la 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de dag gis ma byin par blangs pa dang gzhan du ni dngos po ma tshang gi de gnyis kyis gang nas blangs pa de nyid du dngos po tshang nas dge slong de gnyis 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas gang nas bskyod pa de'i rin thang 
[\[299b.6\]]brtsi bar bya'o/_/dge slong zhig gis dge slong dag cig la tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur shog rkun po la 'dong ngo /_/gang gis ci thob pa de de nyid dbang ngo zhes smras nas de dag der dong ba dang /_de dag las kha cig gis ni thob/_kha cig gis ma thob/_de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_
[\[299b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong de dag la rkun pos kyang byin thun mong ba dang srung ba dag gis kyang byin na de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas ma blangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rjes su 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]gnang ba ni sbyin par byed pa la sbyin bdag tu sems nye bar zhog ste long shig_/dge slong zhig gi lhan cig spyod pa de rkun pos khrid pa dang /_de de nas bros te 'ongs nas dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[300a.2\]]slong bdag nyid kyis bdag brku bar rung gis nyes pa med do/_/dge slong zhig la sho gam gcad pa'i rdzas shig lag na yod na de ste sho gam gyi gnas las 'das na ni phas pham par 'gyur ro/_/des 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi ma'i'o/_/'di ni bdag gi pha'i'o/_/'di ni bdag gi 
[\[300a.3\]]bu'i'o/_/'di ni bdag gi sring mo dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_mchod rten dang /_dge 'dun rnams kyi'o snyam du bsams nas mang po la bsngos te 'das na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' las 'das na ni nyes pa med do//_//mdor na/_khri'u dang glegs 
[\[300a.4\]]bam seng ras dang /_/chang dang sha dang gos dang nang /_/phyag dar khrod dang dur khrod dang /_/dur khrod kyi ni gnas gnyis so/_/dge slong zhig gis khri'u zhig brnyas nas khyer te 'ongs nas des slar mi sbyin no snyam bsams pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[300a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong zhig gis glegs bam zhig brnyas nas khyer te 'ongs pa dang de yang rgyas par de bzhin no/_/dge slong zhig gis seng ras shig ma byin par blangs te des de brkus nas bshig pa dang /_de'i nang 
[\[300a.6\]]nas dar rin thang chen po zhig byung ste dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_seng ras kyi rin thang brtsi bar bya'o/_/rkun po dag cig gis chang zhig khyer te dgon pa la dong nas chang kha cig ni 'thungs/_kha cig ni sbas te dong ba dang /_dge slong dag kyang 
[\[300a.7\]]gnas der nyin par spyod pa'i phyir dong ba dang /_de dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis tshwar 'gyur gyis song la gtsug lag khang du skyol cig ces smras nas de gtsug lag khang du bskyal to/_/rkun po dag kyang skom nas der song ste btsal ba dang ma rnyed nas de dag gis dge slong de dag mthong ste 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]de dag la btsun pa kye khyed kyis chang zhig ma bsnams sam zhes dris pa dang /_dge slong dag gis khyer ro zhes smras pa dang /_rkun pos btsun pa kho bo cag gi chang brkus pas na khyod ni rkun ma'o zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[300b.2\]]nyes pa med de/_bdag po yod dam med shin tu brtags la blang bar bya'o/_/de ltar sha'ang de bzhin no/_/rkun pos grong bcom nas ra mda' bas bsnyags pa dang /_gtsug lag khang du phyin te de dag skrag pas gtsug lag khang du song nas gos kyang dge slong dag la phul nas dgon 
[\[300b.3\]]pa la bros pa dang /_khyim bdag de dag gis gtsug lag khang de bskor nas de gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang /_de dag gis dge slong dag gi lag pa na gos de dag 'dug par mthong nas de dag gis gos 'di ni bdag gi'o zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis kho bo cag la ni rkun 
[\[300b.4\]]pos byin no zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_rkun pos brkus nas brtan pa'i nor ma len cig_/'on te rkun po rgyal mtshan can zhig gis byin na ni de las blang bar byos la gos gris dros la kha dog 
[\[300b.5\]]sgyur te chongs shig_/de kha dog bsgyur kyang slar slong na de yang byin cig_/btso blag mkhan zhig gis gos thal chu'i nang du bcug pa dang /_des brjed de grong du song ngo /_/des yang gos dran par gyur nas de slar log ste song ba dang dge slong zhig kyang phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing 
[\[300b.6\]]gnas der phyin nas des gos de mthong ste/_dge slong des gos de blangs nas song ba dang /_btso blag mkhan des mthong nas btsun pa gos ma rku zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong gis kho bo phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol ba las 'di mthong na khyod la 'di cir dgos zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[300b.7\]]btso blag mkhan gyis btsun pa kho bos gos 'di thal skyor bcug pa las brjed de 'di ni bdag gi gos lags kyis ma rku shig_/khyod kyis ni ma byin par blangs so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]med de/_bdag po gzhan yod dam med shin tu brtags la blang bar bya'o/_/btso blag mkhan gyis gos bkrus te shing drung du 'dug pa dang /_phyag dar khrod pa zhig phyag dar khrod pa'i gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin te des gos de mthong nas 
[\[301a.2\]]gos blangs te song ba dang /_btso blag mkhan de mthong nas btsun pa 'di ni bdag gi gos lags kyis ma rku shig ces smras pa dang /_de ste khyod kyi yin na slar khyer cig_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu brtags par 
[\[301a.3\]]bya ba rgyas par ro/_/khyim bdag cig gis gos bzhag ste bshang ba byed pa dang /_phyag dar khrod pa zhig phyag dar khrod pa'i gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin pa des gos de mthong nas des khyer te song ba dang /_khyim bdag de langs te btsun pa 'di ni bdag gi bgo ba lags kyis 
[\[301a.4\]]ma rku shig ces smras pa dang /_de ste khyod kyi yin na slar khyer cig_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_shin tu rtogs la khyer cig_/dze ta'i tshal nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig na zhing rmod pa'i las byed pa zhig gos rnams bzhag ste 
[\[301a.5\]]zhing rmod pa dang /_dge slong phyag dar khrod pa zhig phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin te des gos de mthong nas des gos de khyer te song ba dang /_zhing rmod pa'i las byed pa des mthong nas/_btsun pa gos ma rku shig ces smras pa dang /_des de la ma mnyan pa dang /_des kyang brgyugs 
[\[301a.6\]]te bzung nas btsun pa rigs sam gos de ma byin par ma blang shig_/'di ni kho bo phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol ba na mthong ste/_khyod la 'di cir dgos/_btsun pa gos 'di bzhag nas bdag zhing rmod rmod de gos 'di ni bdag gi'o zhes smras nas/_de ste khyod kyi na slar khyer cig_/dge slong de 
[\[301a.7\]]'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_shin tu rtogs pa gyis te long shig_/khyim bdag zhig gis dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams ni lhung ba'i gos de rnams phyag dar khrod kyi gos so zhes nas khyer ro zhes thos pa dang /_des ras rin che ba zhig la kAR+ShA 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]pa Na brgyad phur pa phur te phyag dar spungs pa'i khrod du brkos nas sbas te kha tshar tsam zhig snang bar byas te song ba dang /_dge slong zhig phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin te des kha tshar mthong nas des de nas drangs te khyer ba dang /_khyim bdag des mthong nas/_
[\[301b.2\]]btsun pa ras ma rku shig ces smras pa dang /_dge slong gis ngas 'di ni phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol ba las rnyed na de khyed la cir dgos zhes smras pa dang /_btsun pa bdag gis ni dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyis lhung ba'i gos gang rnyed pa de phyag dar khrod pa'o zhes te khyer ro/_/
[\[301b.3\]]zhes thos nas bdag gis ras la kAR+ShA pa Na brgyad phur pas phur te phyag dar spungs par sbas pas so/_/dge slong des kAr+ShA pa Na brgyad po de mthong nas/_de ste khyod kyi yin na khyer cig ces smras nas/_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[301b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_shin tu brtags la bkur bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag gi khye'u zhig gis srang du gos bzhag ste rtsed mo rtse'o/_/de rtses nas khyim du song ba dang /_dge slong zhig phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der 'ongs pa dang 
[\[301b.5\]]des gos de mthong nas des de blangs te song ba dang /_bud med cig kyang khyim de nas byung ste/_des kyang dge slong de mthong nas btsun pa gos ma rku shig ces smras pa dang /_'di ni kho bos phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol na rnyed do/_/btsun pa kho mo'i khye'u rtse ba na gos 
[\[301b.6\]]brjed de khyim du mchis so/_/zhes smras pa dang /_de ste khyod kyi yin na khyer cig_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_shin tu brtags la blang bar byos shig_/dge slong zhig gis phyag dar khrod pa'i gos 
[\[301b.7\]]sbas te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_dge slong gzhan zhig kyang phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin nas/_des de mthong ste bkrus pa dang /_dge slong des kyang phyag dar khrod kyi gos btsal na ma rnyed nas des dge slong de 'khru ba mthong 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]nas/_des tshe dang ldan pa khyod la ni phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ngo /_/zhes smras pa dang /_ci'i phyir/_kho bo'i phyag dar khrod kyi gos 'di ma byin par blangs pa'i phyir ro/_/'di la ni bdag po yod par kho bos ma shes so/_/
[\[302a.2\]]zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_shin tu brtags la blang bar gyis shig_/dge slong de dag gis mi gtsang bas reg pa'i phyag dar khrod kyi gos bcangs pa dang /_lha phran rnams 'phya 
[\[302a.3\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyag dar khrod kyi gos ni bkrus te legs par btsems la bcang bar bya bas na dge slong dge slong dag gis mi gtsang bas reg pa'i phyag dar khrod kyi gos ma 'chang shig_/'chang ba gang yin pa de ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[302a.4\]]dge slong de dag gis bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod nas gos blangs pa dang /_rigs ngan rnams kyis gang cung zad bdag cag gis las su byas pa thams cad 'di dag gi phyir byed na 'di nas gos ma rku shig ces de skad mi snyan par smra ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[302a.5\]]stsal pa/_bdag po dang bcas pa'i dur khrod nas gos ma len cig_/blangs na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig na log pa'i lha khang zhig yod de/_de nas ras zhig rlung gis khyer nas dur khrod du lhung ba dang dge slong zhig phyag dar khrod kyi 
[\[302a.6\]]gos tshol zhing dur khrod du 'ongs pa des ras de rnyed nas de blangs te khyer ba dang /_log pa'i lha khang na gnas pa de dag gis mthong nas/_btsun pa bdag cag gis ras 'di log pa'i lha khang nas dur khrod du lhung ba yin gyis ras 'di ma rku shig ces smras pa dang /_de ste 
[\[302a.7\]]khyod kyi yin na slar khyer cig_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes pa med de/_bdag po gzhan yod dam med pa shin tu rtogs la long shig/_//
